303 /**
304  * Nothing player can interact with here.
305  */
306 void iexamine::none( Character &/*p*/, const tripoint &examp )
307 {
308  add_msg( _( "That is a %s." ), get_map().name( examp ) );
309 }
310 
311 bool iexamine::always_false( const tripoint &/*examp*/ )
312 {
313  return false;
314 }
315 
316 bool iexamine::false_and_debugmsg( const tripoint &examp )
317 {
318  debugmsg( "Called false_and_debugmsg on %s - was a terrain with an actor configured incorrectly?",
319  get_map().tername( examp ) );
320  return false;
321 }
322 
323 bool iexamine::always_true( const tripoint &/*examp*/ )
324 {
325  return true;
326 }
327 
328 bool iexamine::harvestable_now( const tripoint &examp )
329 {
330  const harvest_id hid = get_map().get_harvest( examp );
331  return !hid->is_null() && !hid->empty();
332 }
333 
334 /**
335  * Pick an appropriate item and apply diamond coating if possible.
336  */
337 void iexamine::cvdmachine( Character &you, const tripoint & )
338 {
339  // Select an item to which it is possible to apply a diamond coating
340  item_location loc = g->inv_map_splice( []( const item & e ) {
341  return e.has_edged_damage() &&
342  !e.has_flag( flag_DIAMOND ) && !e.has_flag( flag_NO_CVD ) &&
343  ( e.made_of( material_steel ) || e.made_of( material_ch_steel ) ||
344  e.made_of( material_hc_steel ) || e.made_of( material_lc_steel ) ||
345  e.made_of( material_mc_steel ) || e.made_of( material_qt_steel ) );
346  }, _( "Apply diamond coating" ), 1, _( "You don't have a suitable item to coat with diamond" ) );
347 
348  if( !loc ) {
349  return;
350  }
351 
352  // Require materials proportional to selected item volume
353  auto qty = loc->volume() / units::legacy_volume_factor;
354  qty = std::max( 1, qty );
355  requirement_data reqs = *requirement_data_cvd_diamond * qty;
356 
357  if( !reqs.can_make_with_inventory( you.crafting_inventory(), is_crafting_component ) ) {
358  popup( "%s", reqs.list_missing() );
359  return;
360  }
361 
362  // Consume materials
363  for( const auto &e : reqs.get_components() ) {
364  you.consume_items( e, 1, is_crafting_component );
365  }
366  for( const auto &e : reqs.get_tools() ) {
367  you.consume_tools( e );
368  }
369  you.invalidate_crafting_inventory();
370 
371  // Apply flag to item
372  loc->set_flag( flag_DIAMOND );
373  add_msg( m_good, _( "You apply a diamond coating to your %s" ), loc->type_name() );
374  you.mod_moves( -to_moves<int>( 10_seconds ) );
375 }
376 
377 /**
378  * Change player eye and skin color
379  */
380 void iexamine::change_appearance( Character &you, const tripoint & )
381 {
382  uilist amenu;
383  amenu.title = _( "Change what?" );
384  amenu.addentry( 0, true, MENU_AUTOASSIGN, _( "Change eye color" ) );
385  amenu.addentry( 1, true, MENU_AUTOASSIGN, _( "Change skin color" ) );
386 
387  amenu.query();
388  if( amenu.ret == 0 ) {
389  you.customize_appearance( customize_appearance_choice::EYES );
390  } else if( amenu.ret == 1 ) {
391  you.customize_appearance( customize_appearance_choice::SKIN );
392  }
393 }
394 
395 /**
396  * TEMPLATE FABRICATORS
397  * Generate items from found blueprints.
398  */
399 void iexamine::nanofab( Character &you, const tripoint &examp )
400 {
401  bool table_exists = false;
402  std::list<item_location> on_table;
403  item_location nanofab_template;
404  tripoint spawn_point;
405  map &here = get_map();
406  std::set<itype_id> allowed_template = here.ter( examp )->allowed_template_id;
407  for( const tripoint &valid_location : here.points_in_radius( examp, 1 ) ) {
408  if( here.has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_NANOFAB_TABLE, valid_location ) ) {
409  spawn_point = valid_location;
410  table_exists = true;
411  on_table = here.items_with( valid_location, [&]( const item & it ) {
412  return it.has_flag( flag_NANOFAB_REPAIR );
413  } );
414  break;
415  }
416  }
417  if( !table_exists ) {
418  return;
419  }
420 
421  item new_item;
422  requirement_data reqs;
423 
424  // If there is something on the table that can be repaired suggest to repair that instead of printing something new
425  if( !on_table.empty() ) {
426  new_item = item( on_table.front()->typeId(), calendar::turn );
427  int damage = on_table.front()->damage_level();
428  if( damage <= 0 ) {
429  popup( _( "FABRICATOR COMPLIANT ITEM %s DETECTED, BUT NOT DAMAGED REMOVE WORKING ITEM FROM FABRICATOR" ),
430  new_item.display_name() );
431  sounds::sound( spawn_point, 10, sounds::sound_t::speech,
432  _( "REMOVE WORKING ITEM FROM FABRICATOR." ), true );
433  return;
434  }
435 
436  if( !on_table.front()->empty() ) {
437  popup( _( "ITEM %s DETECTED, CONTENTS OF ITEM WILL BE DESTROYED BY FABRICATOR PLEASE EMPTY ITEM AND RETURN" ),
438  new_item.display_name() );
439  sounds::sound( spawn_point, 10, sounds::sound_t::speech,
440  _( "PLEASE EMPTY ITEM AND RETURN." ), true );
441  return;
442  }
443 
444  sounds::sound( spawn_point, 10, sounds::sound_t::speech,
445  _( "REPAIR INTEGRITY DAMAGE?" ), true );
446  if( !query_yn( _( "FABRICATOR COMPLIANT ITEM %s DETECTED, REPAIR INTEGRITY DAMAGE?" ),
447  new_item.display_name() ) ) {
448  return;
449  }
450 
451  // multiplier for the item being not completely destroyed
452  float dam_mult = .05f * damage;
453 
454  int qty = std::max( 1, static_cast<int>( dam_mult * new_item.volume() / 250_ml ) );
455  std::vector<std::vector<item_comp>> requirement_comp_vector;
456  std::vector<std::vector<quality_requirement>> quality_comp_vector;
457  std::vector<std::vector<tool_comp>> tool_comp_vector;
458  std::vector<item_comp> nano_req = { item_comp( itype_nanomaterial, 5 * qty ) };
459  requirement_comp_vector.push_back( nano_req );
460  std::vector<item_comp> item_req = { item_comp( on_table.front()->typeId(), 1 ) };
461  requirement_comp_vector.push_back( item_req );
462  reqs = requirement_data( tool_comp_vector, quality_comp_vector, requirement_comp_vector );
463  } else {
464  //Create a list of the names of all acceptable templates.
465  std::set<std::string> templatenames;
466  for( const itype_id &id : allowed_template ) {
467  templatenames.insert( id->nname( 1 ) );
468  }
469  std::string name_list = enumerate_as_string( templatenames );
470 
471  //Template selection
472  nanofab_template = g->inv_map_splice( [&]( const item & e ) {
473  return std::any_of( allowed_template.begin(), allowed_template.end(),
474  [&e]( const itype_id itid ) {
475  return e.typeId() == itid;
476  } );
477  }, _( "Introduce a compatible template." ), PICKUP_RANGE,
478  _( "You don't have any usable templates.\n\nCompatible templates are: " ) + name_list );
479 
480  if( !nanofab_template ) {
481  return;
482  }
483 
484  new_item = item( nanofab_template->get_var( "NANOFAB_ITEM_ID" ), calendar::turn );
485  int qty = std::max( 1, new_item.volume() / 250_ml );
486  reqs = *nanofab_template->type->template_requirements * qty;
487  }
488 
489  // either way the new item should have the nanofabricator flag
490  if( !new_item.has_flag( flag_NANOFAB_REPAIR ) ) {
491  new_item.set_flag( flag_NANOFAB_REPAIR );
492  }
493 
494  if( !reqs.can_make_with_inventory( you.crafting_inventory(), is_crafting_component ) ) {
495  popup( "%s", reqs.list_missing() );
496  return;
497  }
498 
499  // Consume materials
500  for( const auto &e : reqs.get_components() ) {
501  you.consume_items( e, 1, is_crafting_component );
502  }
503  for( const auto &e : reqs.get_tools() ) {
504  you.consume_tools( e );
505  }
506  you.invalidate_crafting_inventory();
507 
508  if( new_item.is_armor() && new_item.has_flag( flag_VARSIZE ) ) {
509  new_item.set_flag( flag_FIT );
510  }
511 
512  here.add_item_or_charges( spawn_point, new_item );
513 
514  // if this template is single use
515  // also check if the template exists at all
516  if( nanofab_template && nanofab_template->has_flag( flag_NANOFAB_TEMPLATE_SINGLE_USE ) ) {
517  nanofab_template.remove_item();
518  }
519 }
520 
521 /// @brief Use "gas pump."
522 /// @details Will pump any liquids on tile.
523 void iexamine::gaspump( Character &you, const tripoint &examp )
524 {
525  map &here = get_map();
526  if( !query_yn( _( "Use the %s?" ), here.tername( examp ) ) ) {
527  none( you, examp );
528  return;
529  }
530 
531  map_stack items = here.i_at( examp );
532  for( auto item_it = items.begin(); item_it != items.end(); ++item_it ) {
533  if( item_it->made_of( phase_id::LIQUID ) ) {
534  /// @note \EFFECT_DEX decreases chance of spilling gas from a pump
535  if( one_in( 10 + you.get_dex() ) ) {
536  add_msg( m_bad, _( "You accidentally spill the %s." ), item_it->type_name() );
537  static const auto max_spill_volume = units::from_liter( 1 );
538  const int max_spill_charges = std::max( 1, item_it->charges_per_volume( max_spill_volume ) );
539  /// @note \EFFECT_DEX decreases amount of gas spilled, if gas is spilled from pump
540  const int qty = rng( 1, max_spill_charges * 8.0 / std::max( 1, you.get_dex() ) );
541 
542  item spill = item_it->split( qty );
543  if( spill.is_null() ) {
544  here.add_item_or_charges( you.pos(), *item_it );
545  items.erase( item_it );
546  } else {
547  here.add_item_or_charges( you.pos(), spill );
548  }
549 
550  } else {
551  liquid_handler::handle_liquid_from_ground( item_it, examp, 1 );
552  }
553  return;
554  }
555  }
556  add_msg( m_info, _( "Out of order." ) );
557 }
558 
559 static bool has_attunement_spell_prereqs( Character &you, const trait_id &attunement )
560 {
561  // for each prereq we need to check that the player has 2 level 15 spells
562  for( const trait_id &prereq : attunement->prereqs ) {
563  int spells_known = 0;
564  for( const spell &sp : you.spells_known_of_class( prereq ) ) {
565  if( sp.get_level() >= 15 ) {
566  spells_known++;
567  }
568  }
569  if( spells_known < 2 ) {
570  return false;
571  }
572  }
573  return true;
574 }
575 
576 void iexamine::attunement_altar( Character &you, const tripoint & )
577 {
578  std::set<trait_id> attunements;
579  for( const mutation_branch &mut : mutation_branch::get_all() ) {
580  if( mut.flags.count( json_flag_ATTUNEMENT ) ) {
581  attunements.emplace( mut.id );
582  }
583  }
584  // remove the attunements the player does not have prereqs for
585  for( auto iter = attunements.begin(); iter != attunements.end(); ) {
586  bool has_prereq = true;
587  // the normal usage of prereqs only needs one, but attunements put all their prereqs into the same array
588  // each prereqs is required for it as well
589  for( const trait_id &prereq : ( *iter )->prereqs ) {
590  if( !you.has_trait( prereq ) ) {
591  has_prereq = false;
592  break;
593  }
594  }
595  if( has_prereq ) {
596  ++iter;
597  } else {
598  iter = attunements.erase( iter );
599  }
600  }
601  if( attunements.empty() ) {
602  // the player doesn't have at least two base classes
603  you.add_msg_if_player( _( "This altar gives you the creeps." ) );
604  return;
605  }
606  // remove the attunements the player has conflicts for
607  for( auto iter = attunements.begin(); iter != attunements.end(); ) {
608  if( !you.has_opposite_trait( *iter ) && you.mutation_ok( *iter, true, true, true ) ) {
609  ++iter;
610  } else {
611  iter = attunements.erase( iter );
612  }
613  }
614  if( attunements.empty() ) {
615  you.add_msg_if_player( _( "You've attained what you can for now." ) );
616  return;
617  }
618  for( auto iter = attunements.begin(); iter != attunements.end(); ) {
619  if( has_attunement_spell_prereqs( you, *iter ) ) {
620  ++iter;
621  } else {
622  iter = attunements.erase( iter );
623  }
624  }
625  if( attunements.empty() ) {
626  you.add_msg_if_player( _( "You feel that the altar does not deem you worthy, yet." ) );
627  return;
628  }
629  uilist attunement_list;
630  attunement_list.title = _( "Pick an Attunement to show the world your Worth." );
631  for( const trait_id &attunement : attunements ) {
632  // There's no way for you to have this mutation, so a variant is pointless
633  attunement_list.addentry( attunement->name() );
634  }
635  attunement_list.query();
636  if( attunement_list.ret == UILIST_CANCEL ) {
637  you.add_msg_if_player( _( "Maybe later." ) );
638  return;
639  }
640  auto attunement_iter = attunements.begin();
641  std::advance( attunement_iter, attunement_list.ret );
642  const trait_id &attunement = *attunement_iter;
643  // There's no way for you to have this mutation, so a variant is pointless
644  if( query_yn( string_format( _( "Are you sure you want to pick %s? This selection is permanent." ),
645  attunement->name() ) ) ) {
646  you.toggle_trait( attunement );
647  // There's no way for you to have this mutation, so a variant is pointless
648  you.add_msg_if_player( m_info, attunement->desc() );
649  } else {
650  you.add_msg_if_player( _( "Maybe later." ) );
651  }
652 }
653 
654 void iexamine::translocator( Character &, const tripoint &examp )
655 {
656  /// @todo fix point types
657  const tripoint_abs_omt omt_loc( ms_to_omt_copy( get_map().getabs( examp ) ) );
658  avatar &player_character = get_avatar();
659  const bool activated = player_character.translocators.knows_translocator( omt_loc );
660  if( !activated ) {
661  player_character.translocators.activate_teleporter( omt_loc, examp );
662  add_msg( m_info, _( "Translocator gate active." ) );
663  } else {
664  if( query_yn( _( "Do you want to deactivate this active Translocator?" ) ) ) {
665  player_character.translocators.deactivate_teleporter( omt_loc, examp );
666  }
667  }
668 }
669 
670 namespace
671 {
672 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
673 //! Implements iexamine::atm(...)
674 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
675 class atm_menu
676 {
677  public:
678  // menu choices
679  enum options : int {
680  cancel, purchase_card, deposit_money, withdraw_money, exchange_cash, transfer_all_money
681  };
682 
683  atm_menu() = delete;
684  atm_menu( atm_menu const & ) = delete;
685  atm_menu( atm_menu && ) = delete;
686  atm_menu &operator=( atm_menu const & ) = delete;
687  atm_menu &operator=( atm_menu && ) = delete;
688 
689  explicit atm_menu( Character &you ) : you( you ) {
690  reset( false );
691  }
692 
693  void start() {
694  for( bool result = false; !result; ) {
695  switch( choose_option() ) {
696  case purchase_card:
697  result = do_purchase_card();
698  break;
699  case deposit_money:
700  result = do_deposit_money();
701  break;
702  case withdraw_money:
703  result = do_withdraw_money();
704  break;
705  case exchange_cash:
706  result = do_exchange_cash();
707  break;
708  case transfer_all_money:
709  result = do_transfer_all_money();
710  break;
711  default:
712  return;
713  }
714  if( !you.activity.is_null() ) {
715  break;
716  }
717  }
718  }
719  private:
720  void add_choice( const int i, const char *const title ) {
721  amenu.addentry( i, true, -1, title );
722  }
723  void add_info( const int i, const char *const title ) {
724  amenu.addentry( i, false, -1, title );
725  }
726 
727  options choose_option() {
728  if( you.activity.id() == ACT_ATM ) {
729  return static_cast<options>( you.activity.index );
730  }
731  amenu.query();
732  uistate.iexamine_atm_selected = amenu.selected;
733  return amenu.ret < 0 ? cancel : static_cast<options>( amenu.ret );
734  }
735 
736  //! Reset and repopulate the menu; with a fair bit of work this could be more efficient.
737  void reset( const bool clear = true ) {
738  const int card_count = you.amount_of( itype_cash_card );
739  const int charge_count = card_count ? you.charges_of( itype_cash_card ) : 0;
740 
741  if( clear ) {
742  amenu.reset();
743  }
744 
745  amenu.selected = uistate.iexamine_atm_selected;
746  amenu.text = string_format( _( "Welcome to the C.C.B.o.t.T. ATM. What would you like to do?\n"
747  "Your current balance is: %s" ),
748  format_money( you.cash ) );
749 
750  if( you.cash >= 1000 ) {
751  add_choice( purchase_card, _( "Purchase cash card?" ) );
752  } else {
753  add_info( purchase_card, _( "You need $10.00 in your account to purchase a card." ) );
754  }
755 
756  if( card_count && you.cash > 0 ) {
757  add_choice( withdraw_money, _( "Withdraw Money" ) );
758  } else if( you.cash > 0 ) {
759  add_info( withdraw_money, _( "You need a cash card before you can withdraw money!" ) );
760  } else if( you.cash < 0 ) {
761  add_info( withdraw_money,
762  _( "You need to pay down your debt first!" ) );
763  } else {
764  add_info( withdraw_money,
765  _( "You need money in your account before you can withdraw money!" ) );
766  }
767 
768  if( charge_count ) {
769  add_choice( deposit_money, _( "Deposit Money" ) );
770  } else {
771  add_info( deposit_money,
772  _( "You need a charged cash card before you can deposit money!" ) );
773  }
774 
775  if( card_count >= 1 && you.cache_has_item_with( flag_OLD_CURRENCY ) ) {
776  add_choice( exchange_cash, _( "Exchange Cash for eCash (1%% fee)" ) );
777  }
778 
779  if( card_count >= 2 && charge_count ) {
780  add_choice( transfer_all_money, _( "Transfer All Money" ) );
781  }
782  }
783 
784  //! print a bank statement for @p print = true;
785  void finish_interaction( const bool print = true ) {
786  if( print ) {
787  if( you.cash < 0 ) {
788  add_msg( m_info, _( "Your debt is now %s." ), format_money( you.cash ) );
789  } else {
790  add_msg( m_info, _( "Your account now holds %s." ), format_money( you.cash ) );
791  }
792  }
793 
794  you.mod_moves( -to_moves<int>( 5_seconds ) );
795  }
796 
797  //! Prompt for an integral value clamped to [0, max].
798  static int prompt_for_amount( const char *const msg, const int max ) {
799  const std::string formatted = string_format( msg, max );
800  const int amount = string_input_popup()
801  .title( formatted )
802  .width( 20 )
803  .text( std::to_string( max ) )
804  .only_digits( true )
805  .query_int();
806 
807  return clamp( amount, 0, max );
808  }
809 
810  //!Get a new cash card. $10.00 fine.
811  bool do_purchase_card() {
812  const char *prompt =
813  _( "This will automatically deduct $10.00 from your bank account. Continue?" );
814 
815  if( !query_yn( prompt ) ) {
816  return false;
817  }
818 
819  item card( "cash_card", calendar::turn );
820  card.ammo_set( card.ammo_default(), 0 );
821  you.i_add( card );
822  you.cash -= 1000;
823  you.mod_moves( -to_moves<int>( 5_seconds ) );
824  finish_interaction();
825 
826  return true;
827  }
828 
829  //!Deposit money from cash card into bank account.
830  bool do_deposit_money() {
831  int money = you.charges_of( itype_cash_card );
832 
833  if( !money ) {
834  popup( _( "You can only deposit money from charged cash cards!" ) );
835  return false;
836  }
837 
838  const int amount = prompt_for_amount( n_gettext(
839  "Deposit how much? Max: %d cent. (0 to cancel) ",
840  "Deposit how much? Max: %d cents. (0 to cancel) ", money ), money );
841 
842  if( !amount ) {
843  return false;
844  }
845 
846  add_msg( m_info, _( "You deposit %s into your account." ), format_money( amount ) );
847  you.use_charges( itype_cash_card, amount );
848  you.cash += amount;
849  you.mod_moves( -to_moves<int>( 10_seconds ) );
850  finish_interaction();
851 
852  return true;
853  }
854 
855  //!Move money from bank account onto cash card.
856  bool do_withdraw_money() {
857 
858  std::vector<item *> cash_cards_on_hand = you.cache_get_items_with( "is_cash_card",
859  &item::is_cash_card );
860  if( cash_cards_on_hand.empty() ) {
861  //Just in case we run into an edge case
862  popup( _( "You do not have a cash card to withdraw money!" ) );
863  return false;
864  }
865 
866  const int amount = prompt_for_amount( n_gettext(
867  "Withdraw how much? Max: %d cent. (0 to cancel) ",
868  "Withdraw how much? Max: %d cents. (0 to cancel) ", you.cash ), you.cash );
869 
870  if( !amount ) {
871  return false;
872  }
873 
874  int inserted = 0;
875  int remaining = amount;
876 
877  std::sort( cash_cards_on_hand.begin(), cash_cards_on_hand.end(), []( item * one, item * two ) {
878  int balance_one = one->ammo_remaining();
879  int balance_two = two->ammo_remaining();
880  return balance_one > balance_two;
881  } );
882 
883  for( item * const &cc : cash_cards_on_hand ) {
884  if( inserted == amount ) {
885  break;
886  }
887  int max_cap = cc->ammo_capacity( ammo_money ) - cc->ammo_remaining();
888  int to_insert = std::min( max_cap, remaining );
889  // insert whatever there's room for + the old balance.
890  cc->ammo_set( cc->ammo_default(), to_insert + cc->ammo_remaining() );
891  inserted += to_insert;
892  remaining -= to_insert;
893  }
894 
895  if( remaining ) {
896  add_msg( m_info, _( "All cash cards at maximum capacity." ) );
897  }
898 
899  //dst->charges += amount;
900  you.cash -= amount - remaining;
901  you.mod_moves( -to_moves<int>( 10_seconds ) );
902  finish_interaction();
903 
904  return true;
905  }
906 
907  //!Deposit pre-Cataclysm currency and receive equivalent amount minus fees on a card.
908  bool do_exchange_cash() {
909  item *dst;
910  if( you.activity.id() == ACT_ATM ) {
911  dst = you.activity.targets.front().get_item();
912  you.activity.set_to_null();
913  if( dst->is_null() || dst->typeId() != itype_cash_card ) {
914  debugmsg( "do_exchange_cash lost the destination card" );
915  return false;
916  }
917  } else {
918  const std::vector<item *> cash_cards = you.cache_get_items_with( "is_cash_card",
919  &item::is_cash_card );
920  if( cash_cards.empty() ) {
921  popup( _( "You do not have a cash card." ) );
922  return false;
923  }
924  dst = *std::max_element( cash_cards.begin(), cash_cards.end(), []( const item * a,
925  const item * b ) {
926  return a->ammo_remaining() < b->ammo_remaining();
927  } );
928  if( !query_yn( _( "Exchange all paper bills and coins in inventory?" ) ) ) {
929  return false;
930  }
931  }
932 
933  item *cash_item = nullptr;
934  you.visit_items( [&]( item * e, const item * ) {
935  if( e->type->has_flag( flag_OLD_CURRENCY ) ) {
936  cash_item = e;
937  return VisitResponse::ABORT;
938  }
939  return VisitResponse::NEXT;
940  } );
941  if( !cash_item ) {
942  return false;
943  }
944  // Feeding a bill into the machine takes at least one turn
945  you.mod_moves( -std::max( 100, you.get_moves() ) );
946  int value = units::to_cent( cash_item->type->price );
947  value *= 0.99; // subtract fee
948  if( value > dst->ammo_capacity( ammo_money ) - dst->ammo_remaining() ) {
949  popup( _( "Destination card is full." ) );
950  return false;
951  }
952  if( cash_item->charges > 1 ) {
953  cash_item->charges--;
954  } else {
955  item_location( you, cash_item ).remove_item();
956  }
957  dst->ammo_set( dst->ammo_default(), dst->ammo_remaining() + value );
958  you.assign_activity( ACT_ATM, 0, exchange_cash );
959  you.activity.targets.emplace_back( you, dst );
960  return true;
961  }
962 
963  //!Move the money from all the cash cards in inventory to a single card.
964  bool do_transfer_all_money() {
965  item *dst;
966  std::vector<item *> cash_cards_on_hand = you.cache_get_items_with( "is_cash_card",
967  &item::is_cash_card );
968  if( you.activity.id() == ACT_ATM ) {
969  dst = you.activity.targets.front().get_item();
970  you.activity.set_to_null(); // stop for now, if required, it will be created again.
971  if( dst->is_null() || dst->typeId() != itype_cash_card ) {
972  debugmsg( "do_transfer_all_money lost the destination card" );
973  return false;
974  }
975  } else {
976 
977  if( cash_cards_on_hand.empty() ) {
978  return false;
979  }
980  dst = *cash_cards_on_hand.begin();
981  }
982 
983  for( item *i : cash_cards_on_hand ) {
984  if( i == dst || i->ammo_remaining() <= 0 || i->typeId() != itype_cash_card ) {
985  continue;
986  }
987  if( you.get_moves() < 0 ) {
988  // Money from `*i` could be transferred, but we're out of moves, schedule it for
989  // the next turn. Putting this here makes sure there will be something to be
990  // done next turn.
991  you.assign_activity( ACT_ATM, 0, transfer_all_money );
992  you.activity.targets.emplace_back( you, dst );
993  break;
994  }
995  // should we check for max capacity here?
996  if( i->ammo_remaining() > dst->ammo_capacity( ammo_money ) - dst->ammo_remaining() ) {
997  popup( _( "Destination card is full." ) );
998  return false;
999  }
1000  dst->ammo_set( dst->ammo_default(), i->ammo_remaining() + dst->ammo_remaining() );
1001  i->ammo_set( i->ammo_default(), 0 );
1002  you.mod_moves( -to_moves<int>( 1_seconds ) * 0.1 );
1003  }
1004 
1005  return true;
1006  }
1007 
1008  Character &you;
1009  uilist amenu;
1010 };
1011 } //namespace
1012 
1013 /**
1014  * launches the atm menu class which then handles all the atm interactions.
1015  */
1016 void iexamine::atm( Character &you, const tripoint & )
1017 {
1018  atm_menu {you}.start();
1019 }
1020 
1021 /**
1022  * Generates vending machine UI and allows players to purchase contained items with a cash card.
1023  */
1024 void iexamine::vending( Character &you, const tripoint &examp )
1025 {
1026  constexpr int moves_cost = to_moves<int>( 5_seconds );
1027  int money = you.charges_of( itype_cash_card );
1028  map_stack vend_items = get_map().i_at( examp );
1029 
1030  if( vend_items.empty() ) {
1031  add_msg( m_info, _( "The vending machine is empty." ) );
1032  return;
1033  }
1034 
1035  if( !money ) {
1036  popup( _( "You need some money on a cash card to buy things." ) );
1037  }
1038 
1039  int w_items_w = 0;
1040  int w_info_w = 0;
1041  int list_lines = 0;
1042  int lines_above = 0;
1043  int lines_below = 0;
1044  constexpr int first_item_offset = 3; // header size
1045 
1046  catacurses::window w;
1047  catacurses::window w_item_info;
1048 
1049  ui_adaptor ui;
1050  ui.on_screen_resize( [&]( ui_adaptor & ui ) {
1051  const point padding( std::max( 0, TERMX - FULL_SCREEN_WIDTH ) / 4, std::max( 0,
1052  TERMY - FULL_SCREEN_HEIGHT ) / 6 );
1053  const int window_h = FULL_SCREEN_HEIGHT + std::max( 0, TERMY - FULL_SCREEN_HEIGHT ) * 2 / 3;
1054  const int window_w = FULL_SCREEN_WIDTH + std::max( 0, TERMX - FULL_SCREEN_WIDTH ) / 2;
1055  w_items_w = window_w / 2;
1056  w_info_w = window_w - w_items_w;
1057  list_lines = window_h - 4; // minus for header and footer
1058 
1059  lines_above = list_lines / 2; // lines above the selector
1060  lines_below = list_lines / 2 + list_lines % 2; // lines below the selector
1061 
1062  w = catacurses::newwin( window_h, w_items_w,
1063  padding );
1064  w_item_info = catacurses::newwin( window_h, w_info_w,
1065  padding + point( w_items_w, 0 ) );
1066 
1067  ui.position( padding, point( window_w, window_h ) );
1068  } );
1069  ui.mark_resize();
1070 
1071  bool used_machine = false;
1072  input_context ctxt( "VENDING_MACHINE" );
1073  ctxt.register_navigate_ui_list();
1074  ctxt.register_action( "SCROLL_ITEM_INFO_UP" );
1075  ctxt.register_action( "SCROLL_ITEM_INFO_DOWN" );
1076  ctxt.register_action( "CONFIRM" );
1077  ctxt.register_action( "QUIT" );
1078  ctxt.register_action( "HELP_KEYBINDINGS" );
1079 
1080  // Collate identical items.
1081  // First, build a map {item::tname} => {item_it, item_it, item_it...}
1082  using iterator_t = decltype( std::begin( vend_items ) ); // map_stack::iterator doesn't exist.
1083 
1084  std::map<std::string, std::vector<iterator_t>> item_map;
1085  for( auto it = std::begin( vend_items ); it != std::end( vend_items ); ++it ) {
1086  // |# {name}|
1087  // 123 4
1088  std::string suffix = it->count() > 1 ? string_format( " (%d)", it->count() ) : "";
1089  item_map[it->tname() + suffix].push_back( it );
1090  }
1091 
1092  // Next, put pointers to the pairs in the map in a vector to allow indexing.
1093  std::vector<std::map<std::string, std::vector<iterator_t>>::value_type *> item_list;
1094  item_list.reserve( item_map.size() );
1095  for( auto &pair : item_map ) {
1096  item_list.emplace_back( &pair );
1097  }
1098 
1099  int cur_pos = 0;
1100  int item_info_scroll_pos = 0;
1101  const int &item_info_scroll_delta = list_lines;
1102 
1103  ui.on_redraw( [&]( const ui_adaptor & ) {
1104  const int num_items = item_list.size();
1105  const int page_size = std::min( num_items, list_lines );
1106 
1107  werase( w );
1108  wborder( w, LINE_XOXO, LINE_XOXO, LINE_OXOX, LINE_OXOX,
1109  LINE_OXXO, LINE_OOXX, LINE_XXOO, LINE_XOOX );
1110  mvwhline( w, point( 1, first_item_offset - 1 ), LINE_OXOX, w_items_w - 2 );
1111  mvwaddch( w, point( 0, first_item_offset - 1 ), LINE_XXXO ); // |-
1112  mvwaddch( w, point( w_items_w - 1, first_item_offset - 1 ), LINE_XOXX ); // -|
1113 
1114  trim_and_print( w, point( 2, 1 ), w_items_w - 3, c_light_gray,
1115  _( "Money left: %s" ), format_money( money ) );
1116 
1117  // Keep the item selector centered in the page.
1118  int page_beg;
1119  if( cur_pos < num_items - cur_pos ) {
1120  page_beg = std::max( 0, cur_pos - lines_above );
1121  } else {
1122  int page_end = std::min( num_items, cur_pos + lines_below );
1123  page_beg = std::max( 0, page_end - list_lines );
1124  }
1125 
1126  for( int line = 0; line < page_size; ++line ) {
1127  const int i = page_beg + line;
1128  const nc_color color = ( i == cur_pos ) ? h_light_gray : c_light_gray;
1129  const auto &elem = item_list[i];
1130  const int count = elem->second.size();
1131  const char c = ( count < 10 ) ? ( '0' + count ) : '*';
1132  trim_and_print( w, point( 1, first_item_offset + line ), w_items_w - 3, color, "%c %s", c,
1133  elem->first.c_str() );
1134  }
1135 
1136  draw_scrollbar( w, cur_pos, list_lines, num_items, point( 0, first_item_offset ) );
1137  wnoutrefresh( w );
1138 
1139  // Item info
1140  auto &cur_items = item_list[static_cast<size_t>( cur_pos )]->second;
1141  auto &cur_item = cur_items.back();
1142 
1143  std::vector<iteminfo> cur_item_info;
1144  cur_item->info( true, cur_item_info );
1145 
1146  item_info_data data( cur_item->display_name(), "", cur_item_info, {}, item_info_scroll_pos );
1147  data.without_getch = true;
1148  draw_item_info( w_item_info, data );
1149  } );
1150 
1151  for( ;; ) {
1152  ui_manager::redraw();
1153 
1154  const int num_items = item_list.size();
1155 
1156  // Item info
1157  auto &cur_items = item_list[static_cast<size_t>( cur_pos )]->second;
1158  auto &cur_item = cur_items.back();
1159 
1160  const std::string &action = ctxt.handle_input();
1161  if( navigate_ui_list( action, cur_pos, 3, num_items, true ) ) {
1162  item_info_scroll_pos = 0;
1163  } else if( action == "SCROLL_ITEM_INFO_UP" ) {
1164  // clamping to min/max is done in draw_item_info
1165  item_info_scroll_pos -= item_info_scroll_delta;
1166  } else if( action == "SCROLL_ITEM_INFO_DOWN" ) {
1167  item_info_scroll_pos += item_info_scroll_delta;
1168  } else if( action == "CONFIRM" ) {
1169  const int iprice = cur_item->price( false );
1170 
1171  if( iprice > money ) {
1172  popup( _( "You can't afford that item." ) );
1173  continue;
1174  }
1175 
1176  if( !used_machine ) {
1177  used_machine = true;
1178  you.mod_moves( -moves_cost );
1179  }
1180 
1181  money -= iprice;
1182  you.use_charges( itype_cash_card, iprice );
1183  you.i_add_or_drop( *cur_item );
1184 
1185  vend_items.erase( cur_item );
1186  cur_items.pop_back();
1187  if( !cur_items.empty() ) {
1188  continue;
1189  }
1190 
1191  item_info_scroll_pos = 0;
1192  item_list.erase( std::begin( item_list ) + cur_pos );
1193  if( item_list.empty() ) {
1194  add_msg( _( "With a beep, the empty vending machine shuts down." ) );
1195  return;
1196  } else if( cur_pos == num_items - 1 ) {
1197  cur_pos--;
1198  }
1199  } else if( action == "QUIT" ) {
1200  break;
1201  }
1202  }
1203 }
1204 
1205 namespace
1206 {
1207 int _get_rot_delta( tripoint_abs_omt const &this_omt, tripoint_abs_omt const &that_omt )
1208 {
1209  om_direction::type const this_dir = overmap_buffer.ter( that_omt )->get_dir();
1210  om_direction::type const that_dir = overmap_buffer.ter( this_omt )->get_dir();
1211  int const diff = static_cast<int>( this_dir ) - static_cast<int>( that_dir );
1212  return diff >= 0 ? diff : 4 + diff;
1213 }
1214 
1215 tripoint _rotate_point_sm( tripoint const &p, int erot, tripoint const &orig )
1216 {
1217  tripoint const p_sm( p - orig.xy() );
1218  tripoint const rd = p_sm.rotate( erot, { SEEX * 2, SEEY * 2 } );
1219  return tripoint{ rd + orig.xy() };
1220 }
1221 
1222 constexpr int uilist_positive = 10000; // workaround for uilist retval autoassign when retval == -1
1223 
1224 int _choose_elevator_destz( tripoint const &examp, tripoint_abs_omt const &this_omt,
1225  tripoint const &sm_orig )
1226 {
1227  map &here = get_map();
1228  uilist choice;
1229  choice.title = _( "Select destination floor" );
1230  for( int z = OVERMAP_HEIGHT; z >= -OVERMAP_DEPTH; z-- ) {
1231  tripoint_abs_omt const that_omt( this_omt.xy(), z );
1232  tripoint const zp =
1233  _rotate_point_sm( { examp.xy(), z }, _get_rot_delta( this_omt, that_omt ), sm_orig );
1234 
1235  if( here.ter( zp )->has_examine( iexamine::elevator ) ) {
1236  std::string const omt_name = overmap_buffer.ter_existing( that_omt )->get_name();
1237  std::string const name = string_format(
1238  "%i %s%s", z, omt_name, z == examp.z ? _( " (this floor)" ) : std::string() );
1239  choice.addentry( z + uilist_positive, z != examp.z, MENU_AUTOASSIGN, name );
1240  }
1241  }
1242  choice.query();
1243  return choice.ret;
1244 }
1245 
1246 struct elevator_vehicles {
1247  bool blocking = false;
1248  std::vector<vehicle *> v;
1249 };
1250 
1251 elevator_vehicles _get_vehicles_on_elevator( std::vector<tripoint> const &elevator )
1252 {
1253  std::vector<vehicle *> ret;
1254  VehicleList const vehs = get_map().get_vehicles();
1255  for( wrapped_vehicle const &v : vehs ) {
1256  bool inbounds = true;
1257  bool can_block = false;
1258  for( const vpart_reference &vp : v.v->get_all_parts() ) {
1259  tripoint const p = v.pos + vp.part().precalc[0];
1260  auto const eit = std::find( elevator.cbegin(), elevator.cend(), p );
1261  inbounds &= eit != elevator.cend();
1262  if( !inbounds ) {
1263  break;
1264  }
1265  can_block = true;
1266  }
1267  if( inbounds ) {
1268  ret.emplace_back( v.v );
1269  } else if( can_block ) {
1270  return { true, { v.v } };
1271  }
1272  }
1273 
1274  return { false, ret };
1275 }
1276 } // namespace
1277 
1278 void iexamine::elevator( Character &you, const tripoint &examp )
1279 {
1280  map &here = get_map();
1281  tripoint_abs_ms const old_abs_pos = you.get_location();
1282  tripoint_abs_omt const this_omt = project_to<coords::omt>( here.getglobal( examp ) );
1283  tripoint const sm_orig = here.getlocal( project_to<coords::ms>( this_omt ) );
1284  std::vector<tripoint> this_elevator;
1285 
1286  for( tripoint const &pos : closest_points_first( examp, SEEX - 1 ) ) {
1287  if( here.has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_ELEVATOR, pos ) ) {
1288  this_elevator.emplace_back( pos );
1289  }
1290  }
1291 
1292  auto const uit = std::find( this_elevator.cbegin(), this_elevator.cend(), you.pos() );
1293  if( uit == this_elevator.cend() ) {
1294  popup( _( "You must stand inside the elevator to use it." ) );
1295  return;
1296  }
1297 
1298  elevator_vehicles const vehs = _get_vehicles_on_elevator( this_elevator );
1299  if( vehs.blocking ) {
1300  popup( string_format( _( "The %s is blocking the elevator" ), vehs.v.front()->name ) );
1301  return;
1302  }
1303 
1304  int const movez = _choose_elevator_destz( examp, this_omt, sm_orig ) - uilist_positive;
1305  if( movez < -OVERMAP_DEPTH ) {
1306  return;
1307  }
1308 
1309  tripoint_abs_omt const that_omt( this_omt.xy(), movez );
1310  int const erot = _get_rot_delta( this_omt, that_omt );
1311  std::vector<tripoint> that_elevator;
1312  std::transform( this_elevator.begin(), this_elevator.end(), std::back_inserter( that_elevator ),
1313  [&erot, &sm_orig, &movez]( tripoint const & p ) {
1314  return _rotate_point_sm( { p.xy(), movez }, erot, sm_orig );
1315  } );
1316 
1317  creature_tracker &creatures = get_creature_tracker();
1318  // first find critters in the destination elevator and move them out of the way
1319  for( Creature &critter : g->all_creatures() ) {
1320  tripoint const cr_pos = here.getlocal( critter.get_location() );
1321  auto const eit = std::find( that_elevator.cbegin(), that_elevator.cend(), cr_pos );
1322  if( eit != that_elevator.cend() ) {
1323  for( const tripoint &candidate : closest_points_first( *eit, 10 ) ) {
1324  if( !here.has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_ELEVATOR, candidate ) &&
1325  here.passable( candidate ) &&
1326  creatures.creature_at( candidate ) == nullptr ) {
1327  critter.setpos( candidate );
1328  break;
1329  }
1330  }
1331  }
1332  }
1333 
1334  const auto move_item = [&]( map_stack & items, const tripoint & src, const tripoint & dest ) {
1335  for( auto it = items.begin(); it != items.end(); ) {
1336  here.add_item_or_charges( dest, *it );
1337  it = here.i_rem( src, it );
1338  }
1339  };
1340 
1341  // move along every item in the elevator
1342  for( decltype( this_elevator )::size_type i = 0; i < this_elevator.size(); i++ ) {
1343  tripoint const &src = this_elevator[i];
1344  map_stack items = here.i_at( src );
1345  move_item( items, src, that_elevator[i] );
1346  }
1347 
1348  // move along all creatures on the elevator
1349  for( Creature &critter : g->all_creatures() ) {
1350  auto const eit = std::find( this_elevator.cbegin(), this_elevator.cend(), critter.pos() );
1351  if( eit != this_elevator.cend() ) {
1352  critter.setpos( that_elevator[ std::distance( this_elevator.cbegin(), eit ) ] );
1353  }
1354  }
1355 
1356  for( vehicle *v : vehs.v ) {
1357  tripoint const p = _rotate_point_sm( { v->global_pos3().xy(), movez }, erot, sm_orig );
1358  here.displace_vehicle( *v, p - v->global_pos3() );
1359  v->turn( erot * 90_degrees );
1360  v->face = tileray( v->turn_dir );
1361  v->precalc_mounts( 0, v->turn_dir, v->pivot_anchor[0] );
1362  }
1363  here.rebuild_vehicle_level_caches();
1364  if( you.is_avatar() ) {
1365  g->vertical_shift( movez );
1366  g->update_map( you, true );
1367  cata_event_dispatch::avatar_moves( old_abs_pos.raw(), *you.as_avatar(), get_map() );
1368  }
1369 }
1370 
1371 /**
1372  * Open gate.
1373  */
1374 void iexamine::controls_gate( Character &you, const tripoint &examp )
1375 {
1376  if( !query_yn( _( "Use the %s?" ), get_map().tername( examp ) ) ) {
1377  none( you, examp );
1378  return;
1379  }
1380  g->open_gate( examp );
1381 }
1382 
1383 bool iexamine::can_hack( Character &you )
1384 {
1385  if( you.has_trait( trait_ILLITERATE ) ) {
1386  add_msg( _( "You cannot read!" ) );
1387  return false;
1388  }
1389  item &best_hacking = you.best_item_with_quality( qual_HACK );
1390  if( best_hacking.is_null() || !item_location{you, &best_hacking}->ammo_sufficient( &you ) ) {
1391  add_msg( _( "You don't have a hacking tool with enough charges!" ) );
1392  return false;
1393  }
1394  return true;
1395 }
1396 
1397 bool iexamine::try_start_hacking( Character &you, const tripoint &examp )
1398 {
1399  if( !can_hack( you ) ) {
1400  return false;
1401  } else {
1402  item_location hacking_tool = item_location{you, &you.best_item_with_quality( qual_HACK )};
1403  hacking_tool->ammo_consume( hacking_tool->ammo_required(), hacking_tool.position(), &you );
1404  you.assign_activity( hacking_activity_actor( hacking_tool ) );
1405  you.activity.placement = get_map().getglobal( examp );
1406  return true;
1407  }
1408 }
1409 
1410 void iexamine::cardreader_robofac( Character &you, const tripoint &examp )
1411 {
1412  itype_id card_type = itype_id_science;
1413  if( you.has_amount( card_type, 1 ) && query_yn( _( "Swipe your ID card?" ) ) ) {
1414  you.mod_moves( -100 );
1415  you.use_amount( card_type, 1 );
1416  add_msg( m_bad, _( "The card reader short circuits!" ) );
1417  get_map().ter_set( examp, ter_t_card_reader_broken );
1418  intercom( you, examp );
1419  } else {
1420  add_msg( _( "You have never seen this card reader model before. Hacking it seems impossible." ) );
1421  }
1422 }
1423 
1424 void iexamine::cardreader_foodplace( Character &you, const tripoint &examp )
1425 {
1426  bool open = false;
1427  if( ( you.is_wearing( itype_foodperson_mask ) ||
1428  you.is_wearing( itype_foodperson_mask_on ) ) &&
1429  query_yn( _( "Press mask on the reader?" ) ) ) {
1430  you.mod_moves( -100 );
1431  map &here = get_map();
1432  for( const tripoint &tmp : here.points_in_radius( examp, 3 ) ) {
1433  if( here.ter( tmp ) == ter_t_door_metal_locked ) {
1434  here.ter_set( tmp, ter_t_door_metal_c );
1435  open = true;
1436  }
1437  }
1438  if( open ) {
1439  add_msg( _( "You press your face on the reader." ) );
1440  add_msg( m_good, _( "The nearby doors are unlocked." ) );
1441  sounds::sound( examp, 6, sounds::sound_t::electronic_speech,
1442  _( "\"Hello Foodperson. Welcome home.\"" ), true, "speech", "welcome" );
1443  } else {
1444  add_msg( _( "The nearby doors are already unlocked." ) );
1445  if( query_yn( _( "Lock doors?" ) ) ) {
1446  for( const tripoint &tmp : here.points_in_radius( examp, 3 ) ) {
1447  if( here.ter( tmp ) == ter_t_door_metal_o || here.ter( tmp ) == ter_t_door_metal_c ) {
1448  if( you.pos() == tmp ) {
1449  you.add_msg_if_player( m_bad, _( "You are in the way of the door, move before trying again." ) );
1450  } else {
1451  here.ter_set( tmp, ter_t_door_metal_locked );
1452  }
1453  }
1454  }
1455  }
1456  }
1457  } else if( you.has_amount( itype_foodperson_mask, 1 ) ||
1458  you.has_amount( itype_foodperson_mask_on, 1 ) ) {
1459  sounds::sound( examp, 6, sounds::sound_t::electronic_speech,
1460  _( "\"FOODPERSON DETECTED. Please make yourself presentable.\"" ), true,
1461  "speech", "welcome" );
1462  } else {
1463  sounds::sound( examp, 6, sounds::sound_t::electronic_speech,
1464  _( "\"Your face is inadequate. Please go away.\"" ), true,
1465  "speech", "welcome" );
1466  if( can_hack( you ) && query_yn( _( "Attempt to hack this card-reader?" ) ) ) {
1467  try_start_hacking( you, examp );
1468  }
1469  }
1470 }
1471 
1472 void iexamine::intercom( Character &you, const tripoint &examp )
1473 {
1474  const std::vector<npc *> intercom_npcs = g->get_npcs_if( [examp]( const npc & guy ) {
1475  return guy.myclass == NC_ROBOFAC_INTERCOM && rl_dist( guy.pos(), examp ) < 10;
1476  } );
1477  if( intercom_npcs.empty() ) {
1478  you.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "No one responds." ) );
1479  } else {
1480  // TODO: This needs to be converted a talker_console or something
1481  get_avatar().talk_to( get_talker_for( *intercom_npcs.front() ), false );
1482  }
1483 }
1484 
1485 /**
1486  * Prompt removal of rubble. Select best shovel and invoke "CLEAR_RUBBLE" on tile.
1487  */
1488 void iexamine::rubble( Character &you, const tripoint &examp )
1489 {
1490  int moves;
1491  if( you.has_quality( qual_DIG, 3 ) || you.has_trait( trait_BURROW ) ||
1492  you.has_trait( trait_BURROWLARGE ) ) {
1493  moves = to_moves<int>( 1_minutes );
1494  } else if( you.has_quality( qual_DIG, 2 ) ) {
1495  moves = to_moves<int>( 2_minutes );
1496  } else {
1497  add_msg( m_info, _( "If only you had a shovel…" ) );
1498  return;
1499  }
1500  map &here = get_map();
1501  if( ( here.veh_at( examp ) || here.can_see_trap_at( examp, you ) ||
1502  get_creature_tracker().creature_at( examp ) != nullptr ) &&
1503  !query_yn( _( "Clear up that %s?" ), here.furnname( examp ) ) ) {
1504  return;
1505  }
1506  you.assign_activity( clear_rubble_activity_actor( moves ) );
1507  you.activity.placement = here.getglobal( examp );
1508 }
1509 
1510 /**
1511  * Prompt climbing over fence. Calculates move cost, applies it to player and moves them.
1512  */
1513 void iexamine::chainfence( Character &you, const tripoint &examp )
1514 {
1515  // If player is grabbed, trapped, or somehow otherwise movement-impeded, first try to break free
1516  if( !you.move_effects( false ) ) {
1517  you.mod_moves( -to_moves<int>( 1_seconds ) );
1518  return;
1519  }
1520 
1521  if( you.get_working_arm_count() < 1 ) {
1522  add_msg( m_info, _( "You can't climb because your arms are too damaged or encumbered." ) );
1523  return;
1524  }
1525 
1526  const item_location weapon = you.get_wielded_item();
1527  if( weapon && weapon->is_two_handed( you ) ) {
1528  if( query_yn(
1529  _( "You can't climb because you have to wield a %s with both hands.\n\nPut it away?" ),
1530  weapon->tname() ) ) {
1531  if( !you.unwield() ) {
1532  return;
1533  }
1534  } else {
1535  return;
1536  }
1537  }
1538 
1539  // We're not going to do anything if we're already on that point.
1540  // Also prompt the player before taking an action.
1541  if( you.pos() == examp || !query_yn( _( "Climb obstacle?" ) ) ) {
1542  none( you, examp );
1543  return;
1544  }
1545 
1546  map &here = get_map();
1547  int move_cost = 400;
1548  // TODO: Remove hardcoded trait checks when new arthropod bits happen
1549  if( here.has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_CLIMB_SIMPLE, examp ) ) {
1550 
1551  if( you.has_proficiency( proficiency_prof_parkour ) ) {
1552  add_msg( _( "You vault over the obstacle with ease." ) );
1553  move_cost = 100; // Not tall enough to warrant spider-climbing, so only relevant trait.
1554  } else {
1555  add_msg( _( "You vault over the obstacle." ) );
1556  move_cost = 300; // Most common move cost for barricades pre-change.
1557  }
1558  } else if( you.has_trait( trait_ARACHNID_ARMS_OK ) &&
1559  !you.wearing_fitting_on( bodypart_id( "torso" ) ) ) {
1560  add_msg( _( "Climbing this obstacle is trivial for one such as you." ) );
1561  move_cost = 75; // Yes, faster than walking. 6-8 limbs are impressive.
1562  } else if( you.has_trait( trait_INSECT_ARMS_OK ) &&
1563  !you.wearing_fitting_on( bodypart_id( "torso" ) ) ) {
1564  add_msg( _( "You quickly scale the fence." ) );
1565  move_cost = 90;
1566  } else if( you.has_proficiency( proficiency_prof_parkour ) ) {
1567  add_msg( _( "This obstacle is no match for your freerunning abilities." ) );
1568  move_cost = 100;
1569  } else {
1570  move_cost = you.has_trait( trait_BADKNEES ) ? 800 : 400;
1571  if( g->slip_down( game::climb_maneuver::over_obstacle, climbing_aid_furn_CLIMBABLE ) ) {
1572  you.mod_moves( -move_cost );
1573  return;
1574  }
1575  }
1576  Character &player_character = get_player_character();
1577  sfx::play_variant_sound( "plmove", "clear_obstacle",
1578  sfx::get_heard_volume( player_character.pos() ) );
1579  add_msg_debug( debugmode::DF_IEXAMINE,
1580  "Move cost to vault: %d, limb score modifier %.1f", move_cost,
1581  you.get_modifier( character_modifier_obstacle_climb_mod ) );
1582  move_cost /= you.get_modifier( character_modifier_obstacle_climb_mod );
1583  add_msg_debug( debugmode::DF_IEXAMINE,
1584  "Final move cost %d", move_cost );
1585  you.mod_moves( -move_cost );
1586  if( you.in_vehicle ) {
1587  here.unboard_vehicle( you.pos() );
1588  }
1589  you.setpos( examp );
1590  if( examp.x < HALF_MAPSIZE_X || examp.y < HALF_MAPSIZE_Y ||
1591  examp.x >= HALF_MAPSIZE_X + SEEX || examp.y >= HALF_MAPSIZE_Y + SEEY ) {
1592  if( you.is_avatar() ) {
1593  g->update_map( you );
1594  }
1595  }
1596 }
1597 
1598 /**
1599  * If player has amorphous trait, slip through the bars.
1600  */
1601 void iexamine::bars( Character &you, const tripoint &examp )
1602 {
1603  if( !you.has_trait( trait_AMORPHOUS ) ) {
1604  none( you, examp );
1605  return;
1606  }
1607  map &here = get_map();
1608  for( const bodypart_id &bp : you.get_all_body_parts() ) {
1609  if( you.encumb( bp ) >= 10 ) {
1610  add_msg( m_info,
1611  _( "Your amorphous body could slip though the %s, but your cumbersome gear can't." ),
1612  here.tername( examp ) );
1613  return;
1614  }
1615  }
1616  if( !query_yn( _( "Slip through the %s?" ), here.tername( examp ) ) ) {
1617  none( you, examp );
1618  return;
1619  }
1620  you.mod_moves( -to_moves<int>( 2_seconds ) );
1621  add_msg( _( "You slide right between the bars." ) );
1622  you.setpos( examp );
1623 }
1624 
1625 void iexamine::deployed_furniture( Character &you, const tripoint &pos )
1626 {
1627  map &here = get_map();
1628 
1629  tripoint drop_pos = pos;
1630 
1631  if( you.pos().z != pos.z ) {
1632  drop_pos = you.pos();
1633  if( !you.query_yn( _( "Pull up the %s?" ), here.furn( pos ).obj().name() ) ) {
1634  return;
1635  }
1636  you.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You pull up the %s." ),
1637  here.furn( pos ).obj().name() );
1638  } else {
1639  if( !you.query_yn( _( "Take down the %s?" ), here.furn( pos ).obj().name() ) ) {
1640  return;
1641  }
1642  you.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You take down the %s." ),
1643  here.furn( pos ).obj().name() );
1644  }
1645 
1646  const itype_id furn_item = here.furn( pos ).obj().deployed_item;
1647  here.add_item_or_charges( drop_pos, item( furn_item, calendar::turn ) );
1648  here.furn_set( pos, furn_str_id::NULL_ID() );
1649 }
1650 
1651 static std::pair<itype_id, const deploy_tent_actor *> find_tent_itype( const furn_str_id &id )
1652 {
1653  const itype_id &iid = id->deployed_item;
1654  if( item::type_is_defined( iid ) ) {
1655  const itype &type = *item::find_type( iid );
1656  for( const auto &pair : type.use_methods ) {
1657  const deploy_tent_actor *actor = dynamic_cast<const deploy_tent_actor *>
1658  ( pair.second.get_actor_ptr() );
1659  if( !actor ) {
1660  continue;
1661  }
1662  if( ( actor->floor_center && *actor->floor_center == id ) || ( !actor->floor_center &&
1663  actor->floor == id ) ) {
1664  return std::make_pair( iid, actor );
1665  }
1666  }
1667  }
1668  return std::make_pair( iid, nullptr );
1669 }
1670 
1671 /**
1672  * Determine structure's type and prompts its removal.
1673  */
1674 void iexamine::portable_structure( Character &you, const tripoint &examp )
1675 {
1676  map &here = get_map();
1677  const furn_str_id fid = here.furn( examp ).id();
1678  const std::pair<itype_id, const deploy_tent_actor *> tent_item_type = find_tent_itype( fid );
1679  if( tent_item_type.first.is_null() ) {
1680  debugmsg( "unknown furniture %s: don't know how to transform it into an item", fid.str() );
1681  return;
1682  }
1683 
1684  itype_id dropped = tent_item_type.first;
1685  std::string name = item::nname( dropped );
1686  int radius;
1687 
1688  if( tent_item_type.second ) {
1689  const deploy_tent_actor &actor = *tent_item_type.second;
1690  if( !actor.check_intact( examp ) ) {
1691  if( !actor.broken_type ) {
1692  add_msg( _( "The %s is broken and can not be picked up." ), name );
1693  none( you, examp );
1694  return;
1695  }
1696  dropped = *actor.broken_type;
1697  name = string_format( _( "damaged %s" ), name );
1698  }
1699  radius = actor.radius;
1700  } else {
1701  radius = std::max( 1, fid->bash.collapse_radius );
1702  }
1703 
1704  if( !query_yn( _( "Take down the %s?" ), name ) ) {
1705  none( you, examp );
1706  return;
1707  }
1708 
1709  tent_deconstruct_activity_actor actor( to_moves<int>( 20_minutes ), radius, examp, dropped );
1710  you.assign_activity( actor );
1711 }
1712 
1713 /**
1714  * If there is a 2x4 around, prompt placing it across pit.
1715  */
1716 void iexamine::pit( Character &you, const tripoint &examp )
1717 {
1718  const inventory &crafting_inv = you.crafting_inventory();
1719  if( !crafting_inv.has_amount( itype_2x4, 1 ) ) {
1720  none( you, examp );
1721  return;
1722  }
1723  std::vector<item_comp> planks;
1724  planks.emplace_back( itype_2x4, 1 );
1725 
1726  map &here = get_map();
1727  if( query_yn( _( "Place a plank over the pit?" ) ) ) {
1728  you.consume_items( planks, 1, is_crafting_component );
1729  const ter_id &ter_pit = here.ter( examp );
1730  if( ter_pit == ter_t_pit ) {
1731  here.ter_set( examp, ter_t_pit_covered );
1732  } else if( ter_pit == ter_t_pit_spiked ) {
1733  here.ter_set( examp, ter_t_pit_spiked_covered );
1734  } else if( ter_pit == ter_t_pit_glass ) {
1735  here.ter_set( examp, ter_t_pit_glass_covered );
1736  }
1737  add_msg( _( "You place a plank of wood over the pit." ) );
1738  you.mod_moves( -to_moves<int>( 1_seconds ) );
1739  }
1740 }
1741 
1742 /**
1743  * Prompt removing the 2x4 placed across the pit
1744  */
1745 void iexamine::pit_covered( Character &you, const tripoint &examp )
1746 {
1747  if( !query_yn( _( "Remove cover?" ) ) ) {
1748  none( you, examp );
1749  return;
1750  }
1751 
1752  map &here = get_map();
1753  item plank( "2x4", calendar::turn );
1754  add_msg( _( "You remove the plank." ) );
1755  here.add_item_or_charges( you.pos(), plank );
1756  const ter_id &ter_pit = here.ter( examp );
1757  if( ter_pit == ter_t_pit_covered ) {
1758  here.ter_set( examp, ter_t_pit );
1759  } else if( ter_pit == ter_t_pit_spiked_covered ) {
1760  here.ter_set( examp, ter_t_pit_spiked );
1761  } else if( ter_pit == ter_t_pit_glass_covered ) {
1762  here.ter_set( examp, ter_t_pit_glass );
1763  }
1764  you.mod_moves( -to_moves<int>( 1_seconds ) );
1765 }
1766 
1767 
1768 
1769 /**
1770  * Attempt to crack safe through audio-feedback manual lock manipulation.
1771  *
1772  * Try to unlock the safe by moving the dial and listening for the mechanism to "click into place."
1773  * Time per attempt affected by perception and mechanics. 30 minutes per attempt minimum.
1774  * Small chance of just guessing the combo without listening device.
1775  */
1776 void iexamine::safe( Character &you, const tripoint &examp )
1777 {
1778  bool has_cracking_tool = you.has_flag( json_flag_SAFECRACK_NO_TOOL );
1779  // short-circuit to avoid the more expensive iteration over items
1780  has_cracking_tool = has_cracking_tool || you.cache_has_item_with( flag_SAFECRACK );
1781 
1782  if( !has_cracking_tool ) {
1783  you.mod_moves( -to_moves<int>( 10_seconds ) );
1784  // Assume a 3 digit 100-number code. Many safes allow adjacent + 1 dial locations to match,
1785  // so 1/20^3, or 1/8,000 odds.
1786  // Additionally, safes can be left-handed or right-handed, doubling the problem space.
1787  // The dialing procedures for safes vary, I'm estimating 5 procedures.
1788  // See https://hoogerhydesafe.com/resources/combination-lock-dialing-procedures/
1789  // At the end of the day, that means a 1 / 80,000 chance per attempt.
1790  // If someone is interested, they can feel free to add a proficiency for
1791  // "safe recognition" to mitigate or eliminate this 2x and 5x factor.
1792  if( one_in( 80000 ) ) {
1793  you.add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "You mess with the dial for a little bit… and it opens!" ) );
1794  get_map().furn_set( examp, furn_f_safe_o );
1795  return;
1796  } else {
1797  you.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You mess with the dial for a little bit." ) );
1798  return;
1799  }
1800  }
1801 
1802  if( you.is_deaf() ) {
1803  add_msg( m_info, _( "You can't crack a safe while deaf!" ) );
1804  return;
1805  } else if( you.has_effect( effect_earphones ) ) {
1806  add_msg( m_info, _( "You can't crack a safe while listening to music!" ) );
1807  return;
1808  } else if( query_yn( _( "Attempt to crack the safe?" ) ) ) {
1809  you.assign_activity( safecracking_activity_actor( examp ) );
1810  }
1811 }
1812 
1813 /**
1814  * Attempt to "hack" the gunsafe's electronic lock and open it.
1815  */
1816 void iexamine::gunsafe_el( Character &you, const tripoint &examp )
1817 {
1818  if( query_yn( _( "Attempt to hack this safe?" ) ) ) {
1819  try_start_hacking( you, examp );
1820  }
1821 }
1822 
1823 /**
1824  * Checks whether PC has a crowbar then calls iuse.crowbar.
1825  */
1826 void iexamine::locked_object( Character &you, const tripoint &examp )
1827 {
1828  map &here = get_map();
1829  item &best_prying = you.best_item_with_quality( qual_PRY );
1830  item &best_lockpick = you.best_item_with_quality( qual_LOCKPICK );
1831  optional_vpart_position veh = here.veh_at( examp );
1832  int locked_part = -1;
1833 
1834  // Check if the locked thing is a lockable door part.
1835  if( veh ) {
1836  std::vector<vehicle_part *> parts_at_target = veh->vehicle().get_parts_at(
1837  examp, "LOCKABLE_DOOR", part_status_flag::available );
1838  if( !parts_at_target.empty() ) {
1839  locked_part = veh->vehicle().next_part_to_unlock(
1840  veh->vehicle().index_of_part( parts_at_target.front() ) );
1841  }
1842  }
1843 
1844  const std::string target_name = here.has_furn( examp ) ? here.furnname( examp ) :
1845  locked_part >= 0 ? veh->vehicle().part( locked_part ).name() :
1846  here.tername( examp );
1847  const bool has_prying = !best_prying.is_null();
1848  const bool can_pick = ( here.has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_PICKABLE, examp ) ||
1849  locked_part >= 0 ) &&
1850  ( !best_lockpick.is_null() || you.has_bionic( bio_lockpick ) );
1851  enum act {
1852  pick = 0,
1853  pry = 1,
1854  none = 2
1855  };
1856  int action = act::none;
1857 
1858  if( has_prying && can_pick ) {
1859  const int pry_has = best_prying.get_quality( qual_PRY );
1860  const int pry_req = here.has_furn( examp ) ?
1861  here.furn( examp )->prying->prying_data().prying_level :
1862  here.ter( examp )->prying->prying_data().prying_level;
1863  if( pry_has < pry_req ) {
1864  action = act::pick;
1865  } else {
1866  uilist amenu;
1867  amenu.text = string_format( _( "What to do with the %s?" ),
1868  target_name );
1869  amenu.addentry( 0, true, 'l', _( "Pick the lock" ) );
1870  amenu.addentry( 1, true, 'p', _( "Pry open" ) );
1871  amenu.query();
1872  if( amenu.ret < act::pick || amenu.ret > act::pry ) {
1873  return;
1874  }
1875  action = amenu.ret;
1876  }
1877  } else {
1878  action = has_prying ? act::pry : can_pick ? act::pick : act::none;
1879  }
1880 
1881  if( action == act::none ) {
1882  add_msg( m_info, _( "The %s is locked. You could pry it open with the right tool…" ),
1883  target_name );
1884  return;
1885  } else if( action == act::pry ) {
1886  //~ %1$s: terrain/furniture name, %2$s: prying tool name
1887  you.add_msg_if_player( _( "You attempt to pry open the %1$s using your %2$s…" ),
1888  target_name, best_prying.tname() );
1889  iuse::crowbar( &you, &best_prying, examp );
1890  } else if( action == act::pick ) {
1891  locked_object_pickable( you, examp );
1892  }
1893 }
1894 
1895 /**
1896 * Checks whether PC has picklocks then calls pick_lock iuse function OR assigns ACT_LOCKPICK
1897 */
1898 void iexamine::locked_object_pickable( Character &you, const tripoint &examp )
1899 {
1900  map &here = get_map();
1901  const optional_vpart_position veh = here.veh_at( examp );
1902  int locked_part = -1;
1903 
1904  if( veh ) {
1905  const std::vector<vehicle_part *> parts_at_target = veh->vehicle().get_parts_at(
1906  examp, "LOCKABLE_DOOR", part_status_flag::available );
1907  if( !parts_at_target.empty() ) {
1908  locked_part = veh->vehicle().next_part_to_unlock(
1909  veh->vehicle().index_of_part( parts_at_target.front() ) );
1910  }
1911  }
1912 
1913  const std::string target_name = here.has_furn( examp ) ? here.furnname( examp ) :
1914  locked_part >= 0 ? veh->vehicle().part( locked_part ).name() : here.tername( examp );
1915 
1916  if( you.has_bionic( bio_lockpick ) ) {
1917  if( you.get_power_level() >= bio_lockpick->power_activate ) {
1918  you.mod_power_level( -bio_lockpick->power_activate );
1919  you.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You activate your %s." ), bio_lockpick->name );
1920  you.assign_activity( lockpick_activity_actor::use_bionic( here.getabs( examp ) ) );
1921  return;
1922  } else {
1923  you.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You don't have enough power to activate your %s." ),
1924  bio_lockpick->name );
1925  }
1926  }
1927 
1928  std::vector<item *> picklocks = you.items_with( [&you]( const item & it ) {
1929  // Don't include worn items such as hairpins
1930  if( !you.is_worn( it ) ) {
1931  return it.type->get_use( "PICK_LOCK" ) != nullptr;
1932  }
1933  return false;
1934  } );
1935 
1936  if( picklocks.empty() ) {
1937  add_msg( m_info, _( "The %s is locked. If only you had something to pick its lock with…" ),
1938  target_name );
1939  return;
1940  }
1941 
1942  // Sort by their picklock level.
1943  std::sort( picklocks.begin(), picklocks.end(), [&]( const item * a, const item * b ) {
1944  int a_quality = a->get_quality( qual_LOCKPICK );
1945  int b_quality = b->get_quality( qual_LOCKPICK );
1946  // Sort by durability to spend most broken item
1947  if( a_quality == b_quality ) {
1948  return a->damage() > b->damage();
1949  }
1950  return a_quality > b_quality;
1951  } );
1952 
1953  for( item *it : picklocks ) {
1954  if( !query_yn( _( "Pick the lock of %1$s using your %2$s?" ),
1955  target_name, it->tname() ) ) {
1956  return;
1957  }
1958  const use_function *iuse_fn = it->type->get_use( "PICK_LOCK" );
1959  you.add_msg_if_player( _( "You attempt to pick the lock of %1$s using your %2$s…" ),
1960  target_name, it->tname() );
1961  const ret_val<void> can_use = iuse_fn->can_call( you, *it, examp );
1962  if( can_use.success() ) {
1963  iuse_fn->call( &you, *it, examp );
1964  return;
1965  } else {
1966  you.add_msg_if_player( m_bad, can_use.str() );
1967  }
1968  }
1969 }
1970 
1971 void iexamine::bulletin_board( Character &you, const tripoint &examp )
1972 {
1973  g->validate_camps();
1974  map &here = get_map();
1975  // TODO: fix point types
1976  point_abs_omt omt( ms_to_omt_copy( here.getabs( examp.xy() ) ) );
1977  std::optional<basecamp *> bcp = overmap_buffer.find_camp( omt );
1978  if( bcp ) {
1979  basecamp *temp_camp = *bcp;
1980  temp_camp->validate_bb_pos( here.getabs( examp ) );
1981  temp_camp->validate_assignees();
1982  temp_camp->validate_sort_points();
1983  temp_camp->scan_pseudo_items();
1984 
1985  const std::string title = "Base Missions";
1986  mission_data mission_key;
1987  temp_camp->set_by_radio( false );
1988  temp_camp->get_available_missions( mission_key, here );
1989  if( talk_function::display_and_choose_opts( mission_key, temp_camp->camp_omt_pos(),
1990  "FACTION_CAMP", title ) ) {
1991  temp_camp->handle_mission( mission_key.cur_key.id );
1992  }
1993  } else {
1994  you.add_msg_if_player( _( "This bulletin board is not inside a camp" ) );
1995  }
1996 }
1997 
1998 /**
1999  * Spawn 1d4 wyrms and sink pedestal into ground.
2000  */
2001 void iexamine::pedestal_wyrm( Character &you, const tripoint &examp )
2002 {
2003  map &here = get_map();
2004  map_stack items = here.i_at( examp );
2005  if( !items.empty() ) {
2006  if( items.only_item().typeId() == itype_petrified_eye &&
2007  query_yn( _( "Remove the petrified eye from the pedestal?" ) ) ) {
2008  here.i_clear( examp );
2009 
2010  item eye( itype_petrified_eye );
2011  you.i_add_or_drop( eye );
2012 
2013  // Send in a few wyrms to start things off.
2014  get_event_bus().send<event_type::awakes_dark_wyrms>();
2015  for( const tripoint &p : here.points_on_zlevel() ) {
2016  if( here.ter( p ) == ter_t_orifice ) {
2017  g->place_critter_around( mon_dark_wyrm, p, 1 );
2018  }
2019  }
2020 
2021  sounds::sound( examp, 80, sounds::sound_t::combat, _( "an ominous grinding noise…" ), true,
2022  "misc", "stones_grinding" );
2023  add_msg( _( "The pedestal sinks into the ground…" ) );
2024  here.ter_set( examp, ter_t_rock_floor );
2025  get_timed_events().add( timed_event_type::SPAWN_WYRMS,
2026  calendar::turn + rng( 30_seconds, 60_seconds ) );
2027  } else {
2028  none( you, examp );
2029  add_msg( _( "You decided to leave the petrified eye on the pedestal…" ) );
2030  return;
2031  }
2032  }
2033 }
2034 
2035 /**
2036  * Put petrified eye on pedestal causing it to sink into ground and open temple.
2037  */
2038 void iexamine::pedestal_temple( Character &you, const tripoint &examp )
2039 {
2040  map &here = get_map();
2041  map_stack items = here.i_at( examp );
2042  if( !items.empty() && items.only_item().typeId() == itype_petrified_eye ) {
2043  add_msg( _( "The pedestal sinks into the ground…" ) );
2044  here.ter_set( examp, ter_t_dirt );
2045  here.i_clear( examp );
2046  get_timed_events().add( timed_event_type::TEMPLE_OPEN, calendar::turn + 10_seconds );
2047  } else if( you.has_amount( itype_petrified_eye, 1 ) &&
2048  query_yn( _( "Place your petrified eye on the pedestal?" ) ) ) {
2049  you.use_amount( itype_petrified_eye, 1 );
2050  add_msg( _( "The pedestal sinks into the ground…" ) );
2051  here.ter_set( examp, ter_t_dirt );
2052  get_timed_events().add( timed_event_type::TEMPLE_OPEN, calendar::turn + 10_seconds );
2053  } else {
2054  add_msg( _( "This pedestal is engraved in eye-shaped diagrams, and has a "
2055  "large semi-spherical indentation at the top." ) );
2056  }
2057 }
2058 
2059 /**
2060  * Unlock/open door or attempt to peek through peephole.
2061  */
2062 void iexamine::door_peephole( Character &you, const tripoint &examp )
2063 {
2064  map &here = get_map();
2065  if( here.is_outside( you.pos() ) ) {
2066  // if door is a locked type attempt to open
2067  if( here.has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_OPENCLOSE_INSIDE, examp ) ) {
2068  locked_object( you, examp );
2069  } else {
2070  you.add_msg_if_player( _( "You cannot look through the peephole from the outside." ) );
2071  }
2072 
2073  return;
2074  }
2075 
2076  // Peek through the peephole, or open the door.
2077  const int choice = uilist( _( "Do what with the door?" ), {
2078  _( "Peek through peephole." ),
2079  _( "Open door." )
2080  } );
2081  if( choice == 0 ) {
2082  // Peek
2083  g->peek( examp );
2084  you.add_msg_if_player( _( "You peek through the peephole." ) );
2085  } else if( choice == 1 ) {
2086  here.open_door( you, examp, true, false );
2087  you.add_msg_if_player( _( "You open the door." ) );
2088  } else {
2089  you.add_msg_if_player( _( "Never mind." ) );
2090  }
2091 }
2092 
2093 void iexamine::fswitch( Character &you, const tripoint &examp )
2094 {
2095  map &here = get_map();
2096  if( !query_yn( _( "Flip the %s?" ), here.tername( examp ) ) ) {
2097  none( you, examp );
2098  return;
2099  }
2100  ter_id terid = here.ter( examp );
2101  you.mod_moves( -to_moves<int>( 1_seconds ) );
2102  tripoint tmp;
2103  tmp.z = examp.z;
2104  for( tmp.y = examp.y; tmp.y <= examp.y + 5; tmp.y++ ) {
2105  for( tmp.x = 0; tmp.x < MAPSIZE_X; tmp.x++ ) {
2106  const ter_id &nearby_ter = here.ter( tmp );
2107  if( terid == ter_t_switch_rg ) {
2108  if( nearby_ter == ter_t_rock_red ) {
2109  here.ter_set( tmp, ter_t_floor_red );
2110  } else if( nearby_ter == ter_t_floor_red ) {
2111  here.ter_set( tmp, ter_t_rock_red );
2112  } else if( nearby_ter == ter_t_rock_green ) {
2113  here.ter_set( tmp, ter_t_floor_green );
2114  } else if( nearby_ter == ter_t_floor_green ) {
2115  here.ter_set( tmp, ter_t_rock_green );
2116  }
2117  } else if( terid == ter_t_switch_gb ) {
2118  if( nearby_ter == ter_t_rock_blue ) {
2119  here.ter_set( tmp, ter_t_floor_blue );
2120  } else if( nearby_ter == ter_t_floor_blue ) {
2121  here.ter_set( tmp, ter_t_rock_blue );
2122  } else if( nearby_ter == ter_t_rock_green ) {
2123  here.ter_set( tmp, ter_t_floor_green );
2124  } else if( nearby_ter == ter_t_floor_green ) {
2125  here.ter_set( tmp, ter_t_rock_green );
2126  }
2127  } else if( terid == ter_t_switch_rb ) {
2128  if( nearby_ter == ter_t_rock_blue ) {
2129  here.ter_set( tmp, ter_t_floor_blue );
2130  } else if( nearby_ter == ter_t_floor_blue ) {
2131  here.ter_set( tmp, ter_t_rock_blue );
2132  } else if( nearby_ter == ter_t_rock_red ) {
2133  here.ter_set( tmp, ter_t_floor_red );
2134  } else if( nearby_ter == ter_t_floor_red ) {
2135  here.ter_set( tmp, ter_t_rock_red );
2136  }
2137  } else if( terid == ter_t_switch_even ) {
2138  if( ( tmp.y - examp.y ) % 2 == 1 ) {
2139  if( nearby_ter == ter_t_rock_red ) {
2140  here.ter_set( tmp, ter_t_floor_red );
2141  } else if( nearby_ter == ter_t_floor_red ) {
2142  here.ter_set( tmp, ter_t_rock_red );
2143  } else if( nearby_ter == ter_t_rock_green ) {
2144  here.ter_set( tmp, ter_t_floor_green );
2145  } else if( nearby_ter == ter_t_floor_green ) {
2146  here.ter_set( tmp, ter_t_rock_green );
2147  } else if( nearby_ter == ter_t_rock_blue ) {
2148  here.ter_set( tmp, ter_t_floor_blue );
2149  } else if( nearby_ter == ter_t_floor_blue ) {
2150  here.ter_set( tmp, ter_t_rock_blue );
2151  }
2152  }
2153  }
2154  }
2155  }
2156  add_msg( m_warning, _( "You hear the rumble of rock shifting." ) );
2157  get_timed_events().add( timed_event_type::TEMPLE_SPAWN, calendar::turn + 3_turns );
2158 }
2159 
2160 /**
2161  * If it's winter: show msg and return true. Otherwise return false
2162  */
2163 static bool dead_plant( bool flower, Character &you, const tripoint &examp )
2164 {
2165  if( season_of_year( calendar::turn ) == WINTER ) {
2166  if( flower ) {
2167  add_msg( m_info, _( "This flower is dead. You can't get it." ) );
2168  } else {
2169  add_msg( m_info, _( "This plant is dead. You can't get it." ) );
2170  }
2171 
2172  iexamine::none( you, examp );
2173  return true;
2174  }
2175 
2176  return false;
2177 }
2178 
2179 /**
2180  * Helper method to see if player has traits, hunger and mouthwear for drinking nectar.
2181  */
2182 static bool can_drink_nectar( const Character &you )
2183 {
2184  return ( you.has_active_mutation( trait_PROBOSCIS ) ||
2185  you.has_active_mutation( trait_BEAK_HUM ) ) &&
2186  ( you.get_hunger() > 0 ) && ( !you.wearing_something_on( bodypart_id( "mouth" ) ) );
2187 }
2188 
2189 /**
2190  * Consume Nectar. -15 hunger.
2191  */
2192 bool iexamine_helper::drink_nectar( Character &you )
2193 {
2194  if( can_drink_nectar( you ) ) {
2195  add_msg( _( "You drink some nectar." ) );
2196  item nectar( "nectar", calendar::turn, 1 );
2197  you.assign_activity( consume_activity_actor( nectar ) );
2198  return true;
2199  }
2200 
2201  return false;
2202 }
2203 
2204 /**
2205  * Spawn an item after harvesting the plant
2206  */
2207 void iexamine_helper::handle_harvest( Character &you, const std::string &itemid,
2208  bool force_drop )
2209 {
2210  item harvest = item( itemid );
2211  if( harvest.has_temperature() ) {
2212  harvest.set_item_temperature( get_weather().get_temperature( you.pos() ) );
2213  }
2214  if( !force_drop && you.can_pickVolume( harvest, true ) &&
2215  you.can_pickWeight( harvest, !get_option<bool>( "DANGEROUS_PICKUPS" ) ) ) {
2216  you.i_add( harvest );
2217  you.add_msg_if_player( _( "You harvest: %s." ), harvest.tname() );
2218  } else {
2219  get_map().add_item_or_charges( you.pos(), harvest );
2220  you.add_msg_if_player( _( "You harvest and drop: %s." ), harvest.tname() );
2221  }
2222 }
2223 
2224 /**
2225  * Prompt pick (or drink nectar if able) poppy bud. Not safe for player.
2226  *
2227  * Drinking causes: -25 hunger, +20 sleepiness, pkill2-70 effect and, 1 in 20 pkiller-1 addiction.
2228  * Picking w/ env_resist < 5 causes 1 in 3 sleep for 12 min and 4 dmg to each leg
2229  */
2230 void iexamine::flower_poppy( Character &you, const tripoint &examp )
2231 {
2232  if( dead_plant( true, you, examp ) ) {
2233  return;
2234  }
2235  map &here = get_map();
2236  // TODO: Get rid of this section and move it to eating
2237  // Two y/n prompts is just too much
2238  if( can_drink_nectar( you ) ) {
2239  if( !query_yn( _( "You feel woozy as you explore the %s. Drink?" ),
2240  here.furnname( examp ) ) ) {
2241  return;
2242  }
2243  add_msg( _( "You slowly suck up the nectar." ) );
2244  item poppy( "poppy_nectar", calendar::turn, 1 );
2245  you.assign_activity( consume_activity_actor( poppy ) );
2246  you.mod_sleepiness( 20 );
2247  you.add_effect( effect_pkill2, 7_minutes );
2248  // Please drink poppy nectar responsibly.
2249  if( one_in( 20 ) ) {
2250  you.add_addiction( STATIC( addiction_id( "opiate" ) ), 1 );
2251  }
2252  }
2253  if( !query_yn( _( "Pick %s?" ), here.furnname( examp ) ) ) {
2254  none( you, examp );
2255  return;
2256  }
2257 
2258  int resist = you.get_env_resist( bodypart_id( "mouth" ) );
2259 
2260  if( resist < 10 ) {
2261  // Can't smell the flowers with a gas mask on!
2262  add_msg( m_warning, _( "This flower has a heady aroma." ) );
2263  }
2264 
2265  weather_sum recentWeather = sum_conditions( calendar::turn - 10_minutes, calendar::turn,
2266  you.get_location() );
2267 
2268  // If it has been raining recently, then this event is twice less likely.
2269  if( ( ( recentWeather.rain_amount > 1 ) ? one_in( 6 ) : one_in( 3 ) ) && resist < 5 ) {
2270  // Should user player::infect, but can't!
2271  // player::infect needs to be restructured to return a bool indicating success.
2272  add_msg( m_bad, _( "The flower's fragrance makes you extremely drowsy…" ) );
2273  you.fall_asleep( 2_hours );
2274  add_msg( m_bad, _( "Your legs are covered in the poppy's roots!" ) );
2275  you.apply_damage( nullptr, bodypart_id( "leg_l" ), 4 );
2276  you.apply_damage( nullptr, bodypart_id( "leg_r" ), 4 );
2277  you.mod_moves( -to_moves<int>( 1_seconds ) * 0.5 );
2278  }
2279 
2280  here.furn_set( examp, furn_str_id::NULL_ID() );
2281 
2282  iexamine_helper::handle_harvest( you, "poppy_bud", false );
2283  iexamine_helper::handle_harvest( you, "withered", false );
2284 }
2285 
2286 /**
2287  * Prompt pick cactus pad. Not safe for player.
2288  */
2289 void iexamine::flower_cactus( Character &you, const tripoint &examp )
2290 {
2291  if( dead_plant( true, you, examp ) ) {
2292  return;
2293  }
2294 
2295  map &here = get_map();
2296  if( !query_yn( _( "Pick %s?" ), here.furnname( examp ) ) ) {
2297  none( you, examp );
2298  return;
2299  }
2300 
2301  if( one_in( 6 ) ) {
2302  add_msg( m_bad, _( "The cactus' nettles sting you!" ) );
2303  you.apply_damage( nullptr, bodypart_id( "arm_l" ), 4 );
2304  you.apply_damage( nullptr, bodypart_id( "arm_r" ), 4 );
2305  }
2306 
2307  here.furn_set( examp, furn_str_id::NULL_ID() );
2308 
2309  iexamine_helper::handle_harvest( you, "cactus_pad", false );
2310  iexamine_helper::handle_harvest( you, "seed_cactus", false );
2311 }
2312 
2313 /**
2314  * Dig up its roots or drink its nectar if you can.
2315  */
2316 void iexamine::flower_dahlia( Character &you, const tripoint &examp )
2317 {
2318  if( dead_plant( true, you, examp ) ) {
2319  return;
2320  }
2321 
2322  if( iexamine_helper::drink_nectar( you ) ) {
2323  return;
2324  }
2325 
2326  map &here = get_map();
2327  bool can_get_root = you.has_quality( qual_DIG ) || you.has_trait( trait_BURROW ) ||
2328  you.has_trait( trait_BURROWLARGE );
2329  if( can_get_root ) {
2330  if( !query_yn( _( "Pick %s?" ), here.furnname( examp ) ) ) {
2331  none( you, examp );
2332  return;
2333  }
2334  } else {
2335  if( !query_yn( _( "You don't have a digging tool to dig up roots. Pick %s anyway?" ),
2336  here.furnname( examp ) ) ) {
2337  none( you, examp );
2338  return;
2339  }
2340  }
2341 
2342  here.furn_set( examp, furn_str_id::NULL_ID() );
2343 
2344  if( can_get_root ) {
2345  iexamine_helper::handle_harvest( you, "dahlia_root", false );
2346  }
2347  iexamine_helper::handle_harvest( you, "seed_dahlia", false );
2348  iexamine_helper::handle_harvest( you, "withered", false );
2349  // There was a bud and flower spawn here
2350  // But those were useless, don't re-add until they get useful
2351 }
2352 
2353 static bool query_pick( Character &who, const tripoint &target )
2354 {
2355  if( !who.is_avatar() ) {
2356  return false;
2357  }
2358 
2359  map &here = get_map();
2360  const harvest_id harvest = here.get_harvest( target );
2361  if( harvest.is_null() || harvest->empty() ) {
2362  who.add_msg_if_player( m_info,
2363  _( "Nothing can be harvested from this plant in current season." ) );
2364  iexamine::none( who, target );
2365  return false;
2366  }
2367 
2368  std::string query_string;
2369  if( here.has_furn( target ) ) {
2370  query_string = string_format( _( "Pick %1$s?" ), here.furnname( target ) );
2371  } else {
2372  query_string = string_format( _( "Pick %1$s?" ), here.tername( target ) );
2373  }
2374 
2375  if( who.is_avatar() && !query_yn( query_string ) ) {
2376  iexamine::none( who, target );
2377  return false;
2378  }
2379 
2380  return true;
2381 }
2382 
2383 void iexamine::harvest_furn_nectar( Character &you, const tripoint &examp )
2384 {
2385  bool auto_forage = get_option<bool>( "AUTO_FEATURES" ) &&
2386  get_option<std::string>( "AUTO_FORAGING" ) == "all";
2387  if( !auto_forage && !query_pick( you, examp ) ) {
2388  return;
2389  }
2390  you.assign_activity( harvest_activity_actor( examp, auto_forage ) );
2391 }
2392 
2393 void iexamine::harvest_furn( Character &you, const tripoint &examp )
2394 {
2395  bool auto_forage = get_option<bool>( "AUTO_FEATURES" ) &&
2396  get_option<std::string>( "AUTO_FORAGING" ) == "all";
2397  if( !auto_forage && !query_pick( you, examp ) ) {
2398  return;
2399  }
2400  you.assign_activity( harvest_activity_actor( examp, auto_forage ) );
2401 }
2402 
2403 void iexamine::harvest_ter_nectar( Character &you, const tripoint &examp )
2404 {
2405  bool auto_forage = get_option<bool>( "AUTO_FEATURES" ) &&
2406  ( get_option<std::string>( "AUTO_FORAGING" ) == "all" ||
2407  get_option<std::string>( "AUTO_FORAGING" ) == "bushes" ||
2408  get_option<std::string>( "AUTO_FORAGING" ) == "trees" );
2409  if( !auto_forage && !query_pick( you, examp ) ) {
2410  return;
2411  }
2412  you.assign_activity( harvest_activity_actor( examp, auto_forage ) );
2413 }
2414 
2415 void iexamine::harvest_ter( Character &you, const tripoint &examp )
2416 {
2417  bool auto_forage = get_option<bool>( "AUTO_FEATURES" ) &&
2418  ( get_option<std::string>( "AUTO_FORAGING" ) == "all" ||
2419  get_option<std::string>( "AUTO_FORAGING" ) == "trees" );
2420  if( !auto_forage && !query_pick( you, examp ) ) {
2421  return;
2422  }
2423  you.assign_activity( harvest_activity_actor( examp, auto_forage ) );
2424 }
2425 
2426 /**
2427  * Only harvest a plant once per season. Display message and call iexamine::none.
2428  */
2429 void iexamine::harvested_plant( Character &you, const tripoint &examp )
2430 {
2431  you.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "Nothing can be harvested from this plant in current season" ) );
2432  iexamine::none( you, examp );
2433 }
2434 
2435 void iexamine::flower_marloss( Character &you, const tripoint &examp )
2436 {
2437  if( season_of_year( calendar::turn ) == WINTER ) {
2438  add_msg( m_info, _( "This flower is still alive, despite the harsh conditions…" ) );
2439  }
2440  map &here = get_map();
2441  if( can_drink_nectar( you ) ) {
2442  if( !query_yn( _( "You feel out of place as you explore the %s. Drink?" ),
2443  here.furnname( examp ) ) ) {
2444  return;
2445  }
2446  you.mod_moves( -to_moves<int>
2447  ( 30_seconds ) ); // Takes 30 seconds, more or less if faster/slower than 100 speed
2448  add_msg( m_bad, _( "This flower tastes very wrong…" ) );
2449  // If you can drink flowers, you're post-thresh and the Mycus does not want you.
2450  you.add_effect( effect_teleglow, 10_minutes );
2451  }
2452  if( !query_yn( _( "Pick %s?" ), here.furnname( examp ) ) ) {
2453  none( you, examp );
2454  return;
2455  }
2456  here.furn_set( examp, furn_str_id::NULL_ID() );
2457  here.spawn_item( you.pos(), itype_marloss_seed, 1, 3, calendar::turn );
2458  iexamine_helper::handle_harvest( you, "withered", false );
2459 }
2460 
2461 /**
2462  * Remove furniture. Add spore effect.
2463  */
2464 void iexamine::fungus( Character &you, const tripoint &examp )
2465 {
2466  map &here = get_map();
2467  add_msg( _( "The %s crumbles into spores!" ), here.furnname( examp ) );
2468  fungal_effects().create_spores( examp, &you );
2469  here.furn_set( examp, furn_str_id::NULL_ID() );
2470  you.mod_moves( -to_moves<int>( 1_seconds ) * 0.5 );
2471 }
2472 
2473 /**
2474  * Make lists of unique seed types and names for the menu(no multiple hemp seeds etc)
2475  */
2476 std::vector<seed_tuple> iexamine::get_seed_entries( const std::vector<item *> &seed_inv )
2477 {
2478  std::map<itype_id, int> seed_map;
2479  for( const item *seed : seed_inv ) {
2480  seed_map[seed->typeId()] += ( seed->charges > 0 ? seed->charges : 1 );
2481  }
2482 
2483  std::vector<seed_tuple> seed_entries;
2484  seed_entries.reserve( seed_map.size() );
2485  for( const auto &pr : seed_map ) {
2486  seed_entries.emplace_back(
2487  pr.first, item::nname( pr.first, pr.second ), pr.second );
2488  }
2489 
2490  // Sort by name
2491  std::sort( seed_entries.begin(), seed_entries.end(),
2492  []( const seed_tuple & l, const seed_tuple & r ) {
2493  return std::get<1>( l ).compare( std::get<1>( r ) ) < 0;
2494  } );
2495 
2496  return seed_entries;
2497 }
2498 
2499 /**
