2500  * Choose seed for planting
2501  */
2502 int iexamine::query_seed( const std::vector<seed_tuple> &seed_entries )
2503 {
2504  uilist smenu;
2505 
2506  smenu.text = _( "Use which seed?" );
2507  int count = 0;
2508  for( const auto &entry : seed_entries ) {
2509  const std::string &seed_name = std::get<1>( entry );
2510  int seed_count = std::get<2>( entry );
2511 
2512  std::string format = seed_count > 0 ? "%s (%d)" : "%s";
2513 
2514  smenu.addentry( count++, true, MENU_AUTOASSIGN, format.c_str(),
2515  seed_name, seed_count );
2516  }
2517 
2518  smenu.query();
2519 
2520  if( smenu.ret >= 0 ) {
2521  return smenu.ret;
2522  } else {
2523  return seed_entries.size();
2524  }
2525 }
2526 
2527 /**
2528  * Actual planting of selected seed
2529  */
2530 void iexamine::plant_seed( Character &you, const tripoint &examp, const itype_id &seed_id )
2531 {
2532  player_activity act( ACT_PLANT_SEED, to_moves<int>( 30_seconds ) );
2533  act.placement = get_map().getglobal( examp );
2534  act.str_values.emplace_back( seed_id );
2535  you.assign_activity( act );
2536 }
2537 
2538 /**
2539  * If it's warm enough, pick one of the player's seeds and plant it.
2540  */
2541 void iexamine::dirtmound( Character &you, const tripoint &examp )
2542 {
2543 
2544  if( !warm_enough_to_plant( get_player_character().pos() ) ) {
2545  add_msg( m_info, _( "It is too cold to plant anything now." ) );
2546  return;
2547  }
2548  map &here = get_map();
2549  /* ambient_light_at() not working?
2550  if (here.ambient_light_at(examp) < LIGHT_AMBIENT_LOW) {
2551  add_msg(m_info, _("It is too dark to plant anything now."));
2552  return;
2553  }*/
2554  std::vector<item *> seed_inv = you.cache_get_items_with( "is_seed", &item::is_seed );
2555  if( seed_inv.empty() ) {
2556  add_msg( m_info, _( "You have no seeds to plant." ) );
2557  return;
2558  }
2559  if( !here.i_at( examp ).empty() ) {
2560  add_msg( _( "Something's lying there…" ) );
2561  return;
2562  }
2563 
2564  auto seed_entries = get_seed_entries( seed_inv );
2565 
2566  int seed_index = query_seed( seed_entries );
2567 
2568  // Did we cancel?
2569  if( seed_index < 0 || seed_index >= static_cast<int>( seed_entries.size() ) ) {
2570  add_msg( _( "You saved your seeds for later." ) );
2571  return;
2572  }
2573  const auto &seed_id = std::get<0>( seed_entries[seed_index] );
2574 
2575  if( !here.has_flag_ter_or_furn( seed_id->seed->required_terrain_flag, examp ) ) {
2576  add_msg( _( "This type of seed can not be planted in this location." ) );
2577  return;
2578  }
2579 
2580  plant_seed( you, examp, seed_id );
2581 }
2582 
2583 /**
2584  * Items that appear when a generic plant is harvested. Seed @ref islot_seed.
2585  * @param type The seed type, must have a @ref itype::seed slot.
2586  * @param plant_count Number of fruits to generate. For charge-based items, this
2587  * specifies multiples of the default charge.
2588  * @param seed_count Number of seeds to generate.
2589  * @param byproducts If true, byproducts (like straw, withered plants, see
2590  * @ref islot_seed::byproducts) are included.
2591  */
2592 std::list<item> iexamine::get_harvest_items( const itype &type, const int plant_count,
2593  const int seed_count, const bool byproducts )
2594 {
2595  std::list<item> result;
2596  if( !type.seed ) {
2597  return result;
2598  }
2599  const islot_seed &seed_data = *type.seed;
2600  // This is a temporary measure, itype should instead provide appropriate accessors
2601  // to expose data about the seed item to allow harvesting to function.
2602  const itype_id &seed_type = type.get_id();
2603 
2604  const auto add = [&]( const itype_id & id, const int count ) {
2605  item new_item( id, calendar::turn );
2606  if( new_item.count_by_charges() && count > 0 ) {
2607  new_item.charges *= count;
2608  new_item.charges /= seed_data.fruit_div;
2609  if( new_item.charges <= 0 ) {
2610  new_item.charges = 1;
2611  }
2612  result.push_back( new_item );
2613  } else if( count > 0 ) {
2614  result.insert( result.begin(), count, new_item );
2615  }
2616  };
2617 
2618  if( seed_data.spawn_seeds ) {
2619  add( seed_type, seed_count );
2620  }
2621 
2622  add( seed_data.fruit_id, plant_count );
2623 
2624  if( byproducts ) {
2625  for( const itype_id &b : seed_data.byproducts ) {
2626  add( b, 1 );
2627  }
2628  }
2629 
2630  return result;
2631 }
2632 
2633 // Cleaning up plants that have decayed and overgrown
2634 void iexamine::clear_overgrown( Character &you, const tripoint &examp )
2635 {
2636  map &here = get_map();
2637 
2638  if( !here.has_flag_furn( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_GROWTH_OVERGROWN, examp ) ) {
2639  debugmsg( "clear_overgrown called on tile which is not an overgrown crop!" );
2640  return;
2641  }
2642 
2643  player_activity act( ACT_HARVEST, to_moves<int>( 60_seconds ) );
2644  you.assign_activity( act );
2645  here.i_clear( examp );
2646  here.furn_set( examp, here.furn( examp )->plant->base );
2647  you.add_msg_if_player( m_neutral,
2648  _( "You pull up what's left of the planted crop and trample the rest." ) );
2649 }
2650 
2651 // Only harvest, used for autoforaging
2652 void iexamine::harvest_plant_ex( Character &you, const tripoint &examp )
2653 {
2654  map &here = get_map();
2655  // Can't use item_stack::only_item() since there might be fertilizer
2656  map_stack items = here.i_at( examp );
2657  const map_stack::iterator seed = std::find_if( items.begin(), items.end(), []( const item & it ) {
2658  return it.is_seed();
2659  } );
2660 
2661  if( seed == items.end() ) {
2662  debugmsg( "Missing seed for plant at (%d, %d, %d)", examp.x, examp.y, examp.z );
2663  here.i_clear( examp );
2664  here.furn_set( examp, furn_str_id::NULL_ID() );
2665  return;
2666  }
2667 
2668  if( here.has_flag_furn( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_GROWTH_HARVEST, examp ) ) {
2669  harvest_plant( you, examp, false );
2670  }
2671 }
2672 
2673 /**
2674  * Actual harvesting of selected plant
2675  */
2676 void iexamine::harvest_plant( Character &you, const tripoint &examp, bool from_activity )
2677 {
2678  map &here = get_map();
2679  // Can't use item_stack::only_item() since there might be fertilizer
2680  map_stack items = here.i_at( examp );
2681  const map_stack::iterator seed = std::find_if( items.begin(), items.end(), []( const item & it ) {
2682  return it.is_seed();
2683  } );
2684 
2685  if( seed == items.end() ) {
2686  debugmsg( "Missing seed for plant at (%d, %d, %d)", examp.x, examp.y, examp.z );
2687  here.i_clear( examp );
2688  here.furn_set( examp, furn_str_id::NULL_ID() );
2689  return;
2690  }
2691 
2692  const itype_id &seedType = seed->typeId();
2693  if( seedType == itype_fungal_seeds ) {
2694  fungus( you, examp );
2695  here.i_clear( examp );
2696  } else if( seedType == itype_marloss_seed ) {
2697  fungus( you, examp );
2698  here.i_clear( examp );
2699  if( you.has_trait( trait_M_DEPENDENT ) && ( you.get_kcal_percent() < 0.8f ||
2700  you.get_thirst() > 300 ) ) {
2701  here.ter_set( examp, ter_t_marloss );
2702  add_msg( m_info,
2703  _( "We have altered this unit's configuration to extract and provide local nutriment. The Mycus provides." ) );
2704  } else if( you.has_trait( trait_M_DEFENDER ) || ( ( you.has_trait( trait_M_SPORES ) ||
2705  you.has_trait( trait_M_FERTILE ) ) &&
2706  one_in( 2 ) ) ) {
2707  g->place_critter_at( mon_fungal_blossom, examp );
2708  add_msg( m_info, _( "The seed blooms forth! We have brought true beauty to this world." ) );
2709  } else if( you.has_trait( trait_THRESH_MYCUS ) || one_in( 4 ) ) {
2710  here.furn_set( examp, furn_f_flower_marloss );
2711  add_msg( m_info, _( "The seed blossoms rather rapidly…" ) );
2712  } else {
2713  here.furn_set( examp, furn_f_flower_fungal );
2714  add_msg( m_info, _( "The seed blossoms into a flower-looking fungus." ) );
2715  }
2716  } else { // Generic seed, use the seed item data
2717  const inventory &crafting_inv = you.crafting_inventory();
2718  if( seed->has_flag( flag_CUT_HARVEST ) && !crafting_inv.has_quality( qual_GRASS_CUT ) ) {
2719  you.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You will need a grass-cutting tool to harvest this plant." ) );
2720  return;
2721  } else {
2722  const itype &type = *seed->type;
2723  player_activity act( ACT_HARVEST, to_moves<int>( 60_seconds ) );
2724  you.assign_activity( act );
2725  here.i_clear( examp );
2726 
2727  int skillLevel = round( you.get_skill_level( skill_survival ) );
2728  ///\EFFECT_SURVIVAL increases number of plants harvested from a seed
2729  int plant_count = rng( skillLevel / 2, skillLevel );
2730  plant_count *= here.furn( examp )->plant->harvest_multiplier;
2731  plant_count = std::min( std::max( plant_count, 1 ), 12 );
2732  int seedCount = std::max( 1, rng( plant_count / 4, plant_count / 2 ) );
2733  for( item &i : get_harvest_items( type, plant_count, seedCount, true ) ) {
2734  if( from_activity ) {
2735  i.set_var( "activity_var", you.name );
2736  }
2737  here.add_item_or_charges( you.pos(), i );
2738  }
2739  here.furn_set( examp, furn_str_id( here.furn( examp )->plant->base ) );
2740  you.add_msg_if_player( m_neutral, _( "You harvest the plant." ) );
2741  }
2742  }
2743 }
2744 
2745 ret_val<void> iexamine::can_fertilize( Character &you, const tripoint &tile,
2746  const itype_id &fertilizer )
2747 {
2748  map &here = get_map();
2749  if( !here.has_flag_furn( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_PLANT, tile ) ) {
2750  return ret_val<void>::make_failure( _( "Tile isn't a plant" ) );
2751  }
2752  if( here.i_at( tile ).size() > 1 ) {
2753  return ret_val<void>::make_failure( _( "Tile is already fertilized" ) );
2754  }
2755  if( ( fertilizer->count_by_charges() && !you.has_charges( fertilizer, 1 ) ) ||
2756  !you.has_amount( fertilizer, 1 ) ) {
2757  return ret_val<void>::make_failure(
2758  _( "Tried to fertilize with %s, but player doesn't have any." ),
2759  fertilizer.c_str() );
2760  }
2761 
2762  return ret_val<void>::make_success();
2763 }
2764 
2765 void iexamine::fertilize_plant( Character &you, const tripoint &tile,
2766  const itype_id &fertilizer )
2767 {
2768  ret_val<void> can_fert = can_fertilize( you, tile, fertilizer );
2769  if( !can_fert.success() ) {
2770  debugmsg( can_fert.str() );
2771  return;
2772  }
2773 
2774  std::list<item> planted;
2775  if( fertilizer->count_by_charges() ) {
2776  planted = you.use_charges( fertilizer, 1 );
2777  } else {
2778  planted = you.use_amount( fertilizer, 1 );
2779  }
2780 
2781  // Reduce the amount of time it takes until the next stage of the plant by
2782  // 20% of a seasons length. (default 2.8 days).
2783  const time_duration fertilizerEpoch = calendar::season_length() * 0.2;
2784 
2785  map &here = get_map();
2786  // Can't use item_stack::only_item() since there might be fertilizer
2787  map_stack items = here.i_at( tile );
2788  const map_stack::iterator seed = std::find_if( items.begin(), items.end(), []( const item & it ) {
2789  return it.is_seed();
2790  } );
2791  if( seed == items.end() ) {
2792  debugmsg( "Missing seed for plant at (%d, %d, %d)", tile.x, tile.y, tile.z );
2793  here.i_clear( tile );
2794  here.furn_set( tile, furn_str_id::NULL_ID() );
2795  return;
2796  }
2797 
2798  // TODO: item should probably clamp the value on its own
2799  seed->set_birthday( seed->birthday() - fertilizerEpoch );
2800  // The plant furniture has the NOITEM token which prevents adding items on that square,
2801  // spawned items are moved to an adjacent field instead, but the fertilizer token
2802  // must be on the square of the plant, therefore this hack:
2803  const furn_id old_furn = here.furn( tile );
2804  here.furn_set( tile, furn_str_id::NULL_ID() );
2805  here.spawn_item( tile, itype_fertilizer, 1, 1, calendar::turn );
2806  here.furn_set( tile, old_furn );
2807  you.mod_moves( -to_moves<int>( 10_seconds ) );
2808 
2809  //~ %1$s: plant name, %2$s: fertilizer name
2810  add_msg( m_info, _( "You fertilize the %1$s with the %2$s." ), seed->get_plant_name(),
2811  planted.front().tname() );
2812 }
2813 
2814 itype_id iexamine::choose_fertilizer( Character &you, const std::string &pname,
2815  bool ask_player )
2816 {
2817  std::vector<item *> f_inv = you.cache_get_items_with( flag_FERTILIZER );
2818  if( f_inv.empty() ) {
2819  add_msg( m_info, _( "You have no fertilizer for the %s." ), pname );
2820  return itype_id();
2821  }
2822 
2823  std::vector<itype_id> f_types;
2824  std::vector<std::string> f_names;
2825  for( const item * const &f : f_inv ) {
2826  if( std::find( f_types.begin(), f_types.end(), f->typeId() ) == f_types.end() ) {
2827  f_types.push_back( f->typeId() );
2828  f_names.push_back( f->tname() );
2829  }
2830  }
2831 
2832  if( ask_player && !query_yn( _( "Fertilize the %s" ), pname ) ) {
2833  return itype_id();
2834  }
2835 
2836  // Choose fertilizer from list
2837  int f_index = 0;
2838  if( f_types.size() > 1 ) {
2839  f_index = uilist( _( "Use which fertilizer?" ), f_names );
2840  }
2841  if( f_index < 0 ) {
2842  return itype_id();
2843  }
2844 
2845  return f_types[f_index];
2846 
2847 }
2848 void iexamine::aggie_plant( Character &you, const tripoint &examp )
2849 {
2850  map &here = get_map();
2851  // Can't use item_stack::only_item() since there might be fertilizer
2852  map_stack items = here.i_at( examp );
2853  const map_stack::iterator seed = std::find_if( items.begin(), items.end(), []( const item & it ) {
2854  return it.is_seed();
2855  } );
2856 
2857  if( seed == items.end() ) {
2858  debugmsg( "Missing seed for plant at (%d, %d, %d)", examp.x, examp.y, examp.z );
2859  here.i_clear( examp );
2860  here.furn_set( examp, furn_str_id::NULL_ID() );
2861  return;
2862  }
2863 
2864  const std::string pname = seed->get_plant_name();
2865 
2866  if( here.has_flag_furn( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_GROWTH_HARVEST, examp ) &&
2867  query_yn( _( "Harvest the %s?" ), pname ) ) {
2868  harvest_plant( you, examp, false );
2869  } else if( !here.has_flag_furn( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_GROWTH_HARVEST, examp ) ) {
2870  if( here.i_at( examp ).size() > 1 ) {
2871  add_msg( m_info, _( "This %s has already been fertilized." ), pname );
2872  return;
2873  }
2874  itype_id fertilizer = choose_fertilizer( you, pname, true /*ask player for confirmation */ );
2875 
2876  if( !fertilizer.is_empty() ) {
2877  fertilize_plant( you, examp, fertilizer );
2878  }
2879  }
2880 }
2881 
2882 // Highly modified fermenting vat functions
2883 void iexamine::kiln_empty( Character &you, const tripoint &examp )
2884 {
2885  map &here = get_map();
2886  furn_id cur_kiln_type = here.furn( examp );
2887  furn_id next_kiln_type = furn_str_id::NULL_ID();
2888  if( cur_kiln_type == furn_f_kiln_empty ) {
2889  next_kiln_type = furn_f_kiln_full;
2890  } else if( cur_kiln_type == furn_f_kiln_metal_empty ) {
2891  next_kiln_type = furn_f_kiln_metal_full;
2892  } else {
2893  debugmsg( "Examined furniture has action kiln_empty, but is of type %s",
2894  here.furn( examp ).id().c_str() );
2895  return;
2896  }
2897 
2898  static const std::set<material_id> kilnable{ material_wood, material_bone };
2899  bool fuel_present = false;
2900  map_stack items = here.i_at( examp );
2901  for( const item &i : items ) {
2902  if( i.typeId() == itype_charcoal ) {
2903  add_msg( _( "This kiln already contains charcoal." ) );
2904  add_msg( _( "Remove it before firing the kiln again." ) );
2905  return;
2906  } else if( i.made_of_any( kilnable ) ) {
2907  fuel_present = true;
2908  } else {
2909  add_msg( m_bad, _( "This kiln contains %s, which can't be made into charcoal!" ), i.tname( 1,
2910  false ) );
2911  return;
2912  }
2913  }
2914 
2915  if( !fuel_present ) {
2916  add_msg( _( "This kiln is empty. Fill it with wood or bone and try again." ) );
2917  return;
2918  }
2919  // https://energypedia.info/wiki/Charcoal_Production
2920  // charcoal has about 25% of the density of wood, and wood pyrolysis produces about 10-15% charcoal by weight for a stone kiln.
2921  // listed efficiency is for primitive or DIY production, industrial process in a metal kiln is more efficient at 20-25%
2922  // 100% efficient conversion would be 1kg wood = 0.25kg charcoal, 1:1 volume conversion
2923  // fabrication should help here as kiln design and how you stack the wood matter to a degree, though the impact is low overall
2924  // For a cruddy kiln (a pit with a rock chimney) assume 10-15% efficiency, depending on fabrication (40-60% wastage)
2925  // For a well made kiln (industrial-style metal kiln) assume 20-25% efficiency, depending on fabrication (0-20% wastage)
2926  ///\EFFECT_FABRICATION decreases loss when firing a kiln
2927  const float skill = you.get_skill_level( skill_fabrication );
2928  int loss = 0;
2929  // if the current kiln is a metal one, use a more efficient conversion rate otherwise default to assuming it is a rock pit kiln
2930  if( cur_kiln_type == furn_f_kiln_metal_empty ) {
2931  loss = 20 - 2 * skill;
2932  } else {
2933  loss = 60 - 2 * skill;
2934  }
2935 
2936  // Burn stuff that should get charred, leave out the rest
2937  units::volume total_volume = 0_ml;
2938  for( const item &i : items ) {
2939  total_volume += i.volume();
2940  }
2941 
2942  const itype *char_type = item::find_type( itype_unfinished_charcoal );
2943  int char_charges = char_type->charges_per_volume( ( 100 - loss ) * total_volume / 100 );
2944  if( char_charges < 1 ) {
2945  add_msg( _( "The batch in this kiln is too small to yield any charcoal." ) );
2946  return;
2947  }
2948 
2949  if( !you.has_charges( itype_fire, 1 ) ) {
2950  add_msg( _( "This kiln is ready to be fired, but you have no fire source." ) );
2951  return;
2952  } else {
2953  add_msg( _( "This kiln contains %s %s of material, and is ready to be fired." ),
2954  format_volume( total_volume ), volume_units_abbr() );
2955  if( !query_yn( _( "Fire the kiln?" ) ) ) {
2956  return;
2957  }
2958  }
2959 
2960  you.use_charges( itype_fire, 1 );
2961  here.i_clear( examp );
2962  here.furn_set( examp, next_kiln_type );
2963  item result( "unfinished_charcoal", calendar::turn );
2964  result.charges = char_charges;
2965  here.add_item( examp, result );
2966 
2967  if( you.has_trait( trait_PYROMANIA ) ) {
2968  you.add_morale( MORALE_PYROMANIA_STARTFIRE, 5, 10, 3_hours, 2_hours );
2969  you.rem_morale( MORALE_PYROMANIA_NOFIRE );
2970  you.add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "You happily light a fire in the charcoal kiln." ) );
2971  } else {
2972  add_msg( _( "You fire the charcoal kiln." ) );
2973  }
2974 }
2975 
2976 void iexamine::kiln_full( Character &, const tripoint &examp )
2977 {
2978  map &here = get_map();
2979  furn_id cur_kiln_type = here.furn( examp );
2980  furn_id next_kiln_type = furn_str_id::NULL_ID();
2981  if( cur_kiln_type == furn_f_kiln_full ) {
2982  next_kiln_type = furn_f_kiln_empty;
2983  } else if( cur_kiln_type == furn_f_kiln_metal_full ) {
2984  next_kiln_type = furn_f_kiln_metal_empty;
2985  } else {
2986  debugmsg( "Examined furniture has action kiln_full, but is of type %s",
2987  here.furn( examp ).id().c_str() );
2988  return;
2989  }
2990  map_stack items = here.i_at( examp );
2991  if( items.empty() ) {
2992  add_msg( _( "This kiln is empty…" ) );
2993  here.furn_set( examp, next_kiln_type );
2994  return;
2995  }
2996  const itype *char_type = item::find_type( itype_charcoal );
2997  add_msg( _( "There's a charcoal kiln there." ) );
2998  const time_duration firing_time =
2999  24_hours; // internet guides claim about one day for a fairly large pot
3000  const time_duration time_left = firing_time - items.only_item().age();
3001  if( time_left > 0_turns ) {
3002  int hours = to_hours<int>( time_left );
3003  int minutes = to_minutes<int>( time_left ) + 1;
3004  if( minutes > 60 ) {
3005  add_msg( n_gettext( "It will finish burning in about %d hour.",
3006  "It will finish burning in about %d hours.",
3007  hours ), hours );
3008  } else if( minutes > 30 ) {
3009  add_msg( _( "It will finish burning in less than an hour." ) );
3010  } else {
3011  add_msg( n_gettext( "It should take about %d minute to finish burning.",
3012  "It should take about %d minutes to finish burning.",
3013  minutes ), minutes );
3014  }
3015  return;
3016  }
3017 
3018  units::volume total_volume = 0_ml;
3019  // Burn stuff that should get charred, leave out the rest
3020  for( auto item_it = items.begin(); item_it != items.end(); ) {
3021  if( item_it->typeId() == itype_unfinished_charcoal || item_it->typeId() == itype_charcoal ) {
3022  total_volume += item_it->volume();
3023  item_it = items.erase( item_it );
3024  } else {
3025  item_it++;
3026  }
3027  }
3028 
3029  item result( "charcoal", calendar::turn );
3030  result.charges = char_type->charges_per_volume( total_volume );
3031  here.add_item( examp, result );
3032  here.furn_set( examp, next_kiln_type );
3033  add_msg( _( "It has finished burning, yielding %d charcoal." ), result.charges );
3034 }
3035 //arc furnance start
3036 void iexamine::arcfurnace_empty( Character &you, const tripoint &examp )
3037 {
3038  map &here = get_map();
3039  furn_id cur_arcfurnace_type = here.furn( examp );
3040  furn_id next_arcfurnace_type = furn_str_id::NULL_ID();
3041  if( cur_arcfurnace_type == furn_f_arcfurnace_empty ) {
3042  next_arcfurnace_type = furn_f_arcfurnace_full;
3043  } else {
3044  debugmsg( "Examined furniture has action arcfurnace_empty, but is of type %s",
3045  here.furn( examp ).id().c_str() );
3046  return;
3047  }
3048 
3049  static const std::set<material_id> arcfurnaceable{ material_cac2powder };
3050  bool fuel_present = false;
3051  map_stack items = here.i_at( examp );
3052  for( const item &i : items ) {
3053  if( i.typeId() == itype_chem_carbide ) {
3054  add_msg( _( "This furnace already contains calcium carbide." ) );
3055  add_msg( _( "Remove it before activating the arc furnace again." ) );
3056  return;
3057  } else if( i.made_of_any( arcfurnaceable ) ) {
3058  fuel_present = true;
3059  } else {
3060  add_msg( m_bad, _( "This furnace contains %s, which can't be made into calcium carbide!" ),
3061  i.tname( 1, false ) );
3062  return;
3063  }
3064  }
3065 
3066  if( !fuel_present ) {
3067  add_msg( _( "This furnace is empty. Fill it with powdered coke and lime mix, and try again." ) );
3068  return;
3069  }
3070 
3071  ///\EFFECT_FABRICATION decreases loss when firing a furnace
3072  const float skill = you.get_skill_level( skill_fabrication );
3073  int loss = 60 - 2 *
3074  skill; // Inefficiency is still fine, coal and limestone is abundant
3075 
3076  // Burn stuff that should get charred, leave out the rest
3077  units::volume total_volume = 0_ml;
3078  for( const item &i : items ) {
3079  total_volume += i.volume();
3080  }
3081 
3082  const itype *char_type = item::find_type( itype_unfinished_cac2 );
3083  int char_charges = char_type->charges_per_volume( ( 100 - loss ) * total_volume / 100 );
3084  if( char_charges < 1 ) {
3085  add_msg( _( "The batch in this furnace is too small to yield usable calcium carbide." ) );
3086  return;
3087  }
3088  //arc furnaces require a huge amount of current, so 1 full storage battery would work as a stand in
3089  if( you.available_ups() < 1250_kJ ) {
3090  add_msg( _( "This furnace is ready to be turned on, but you lack a UPS with sufficient power." ) );
3091  return;
3092  } else {
3093  add_msg( _( "This furnace contains %s %s of material, and is ready to be turned on." ),
3094  format_volume( total_volume ), volume_units_abbr() );
3095  if( !query_yn( _( "Turn on the furnace?" ) ) ) {
3096  return;
3097  }
3098  }
3099 
3100  you.consume_ups( 1250_kJ );
3101  here.i_clear( examp );
3102  here.furn_set( examp, next_arcfurnace_type );
3103  item result( "unfinished_cac2", calendar::turn );
3104  result.charges = char_charges;
3105  here.add_item( examp, result );
3106  add_msg( _( "You turn on the furnace." ) );
3107 }
3108 
3109 void iexamine::arcfurnace_full( Character &, const tripoint &examp )
3110 {
3111  map &here = get_map();
3112  furn_id cur_arcfurnace_type = here.furn( examp );
3113  furn_id next_arcfurnace_type = furn_str_id::NULL_ID();
3114  if( cur_arcfurnace_type == furn_f_arcfurnace_full ) {
3115  next_arcfurnace_type = furn_f_arcfurnace_empty;
3116  } else {
3117  debugmsg( "Examined furniture has action arcfurnace_full, but is of type %s",
3118  here.furn( examp ).id().c_str() );
3119  return;
3120  }
3121 
3122  map_stack items = here.i_at( examp );
3123  if( items.empty() ) {
3124  add_msg( _( "This furnace is empty…" ) );
3125  here.furn_set( examp, next_arcfurnace_type );
3126  return;
3127  }
3128  const itype *char_type = item::find_type( itype_chem_carbide );
3129  add_msg( _( "There's an arc furnace there." ) );
3130  const time_duration firing_time = 2_hours; // Arc furnaces work really fast in reality
3131  const time_duration time_left = firing_time - items.only_item().age();
3132  if( time_left > 0_turns ) {
3133  int hours = to_hours<int>( time_left );
3134  int minutes = to_minutes<int>( time_left ) + 1;
3135  if( minutes > 60 ) {
3136  add_msg( n_gettext( "It will finish burning in about %d hour.",
3137  "It will finish burning in about %d hours.",
3138  hours ), hours );
3139  } else if( minutes > 30 ) {
3140  add_msg( _( "It will finish burning in less than an hour." ) );
3141  } else {
3142  add_msg( n_gettext( "It should take about %d minute to finish burning.",
3143  "It should take about %d minutes to finish burning.",
3144  minutes ), minutes );
3145  }
3146  return;
3147  }
3148 
3149  units::volume total_volume = 0_ml;
3150  // Burn stuff that should get charred, leave out the rest
3151  for( auto item_it = items.begin(); item_it != items.end(); ) {
3152  if( item_it->typeId() == itype_unfinished_cac2 || item_it->typeId() == itype_chem_carbide ) {
3153  total_volume += item_it->volume();
3154  item_it = items.erase( item_it );
3155  } else {
3156  item_it++;
3157  }
3158  }
3159 
3160  item result( "chem_carbide", calendar::turn );
3161  result.charges = char_type->charges_per_volume( total_volume );
3162  here.add_item( examp, result );
3163  here.furn_set( examp, next_arcfurnace_type );
3164  add_msg( _( "It has finished burning, yielding %d calcium carbide." ), result.charges );
3165 }
3166 //arc furnace end
3167 
3168 void iexamine::stook_empty( Character &, const tripoint &examp )
3169 {
3170  map &here = get_map();
3171  furn_id cur_stook_type = here.furn( examp );
3172  furn_id next_stook_type = furn_str_id::NULL_ID();
3173  if( cur_stook_type == furn_f_stook_empty ) {
3174  next_stook_type = furn_f_stook_full;
3175  } else {
3176  debugmsg( "Examined furniture has action stook_empty, but is of type %s",
3177  here.furn( examp ).id().c_str() );
3178  return;
3179  }
3180 
3181  bool grain_present = false;
3182  map_stack items = here.i_at( examp );
3183  for( const item &i : items ) {
3184  if( i.has_flag( flag_FRESH_GRAIN ) && !i.rotten() ) {
3185  grain_present = true;
3186  } else {
3187  add_msg( m_bad, _( "This pile contains %s, which can't be dried here!" ), i.tname( 1,
3188  false ) );
3189  return;
3190  }
3191  }
3192 
3193  if( !grain_present ) {
3194  add_msg( _( "Place some fresh grain here and try again." ) );
3195  return;
3196  } else if( !here.is_outside( examp ) ) {
3197  add_msg( _( "The stook will need to be set up outside to dry." ) );
3198  return;
3199  } else {
3200  add_msg( _( "This pile contains grain that is ready to be left out for drying." ) );
3201  if( !query_yn( _( "Stand the grain up to dry?" ) ) ) {
3202  return;
3203  }
3204  }
3205 
3206  here.furn_set( examp, next_stook_type );
3207  add_msg( _( "You set up the stook and leave it to dry." ) );
3208 }
3209 
3210 void iexamine::stook_full( Character &, const tripoint &examp )
3211 {
3212  map &here = get_map();
3213  furn_id cur_stook_type = here.furn( examp );
3214  furn_id next_stook_type = furn_str_id::NULL_ID();
3215  if( cur_stook_type == furn_f_stook_full ) {
3216  next_stook_type = furn_str_id::NULL_ID();
3217  } else {
3218  debugmsg( "Examined furniture has action stook_full, but is of type %s",
3219  here.furn( examp ).id().c_str() );
3220  return;
3221  }
3222  map_stack items = here.i_at( examp );
3223  if( items.empty() ) {
3224  debugmsg( _( "Examined furniture is stook_full but doesn't contain any grain." ) );
3225  here.furn_set( examp, next_stook_type );
3226  return;
3227  }
3228  add_msg( _( "There's a grain stook there." ) );
3229  const item &clock = *items.begin();
3230  const time_duration drying_time = 336_hours;
3231  const time_duration time_left = drying_time - clock.age();
3232 
3233  if( time_left > 0_turns ) {
3234  add_msg( _( "The stook will finish drying in %s." ), to_string( time_left ) );
3235  return;
3236  }
3237  for( item &it : items ) {
3238  if( it.has_flag( flag_SMOKABLE ) && it.get_comestible() ) {
3239  item result( it.get_comestible()->smoking_result, it.birthday() );
3240  recipe rec;
3241  result.inherit_flags( it, rec );
3242  if( !result.has_flag( flag_NUTRIENT_OVERRIDE ) ) {
3243  // If the item has "cooks_like" it will be replaced by that item as a component.
3244  if( !it.get_comestible()->cooks_like.is_empty() ) {
3245  // Set charges to 1 for stacking purposes.
3246  it = item( it.get_comestible()->cooks_like, it.birthday(), 1 );
3247  }
3248  result.components.add( it );
3249  }
3250  add_msg( _( "You take down the stook as the drying process is now finished." ) );
3251  it = result;
3252  }
3253  }
3254  here.furn_set( examp, next_stook_type );
3255 }
3256 
3257 void iexamine::autoclave_empty( Character &you, const tripoint &examp )
3258 {
3259  map &here = get_map();
3260  furn_id cur_autoclave_type = here.furn( examp );
3261  furn_id next_autoclave_type = furn_str_id::NULL_ID();
3262  if( cur_autoclave_type == furn_id( "f_autoclave" ) ) {
3263  next_autoclave_type = furn_id( "f_autoclave_full" );
3264  } else {
3265  debugmsg( "Examined furniture has action autoclave_empty, but is of type %s",
3266  here.furn( examp ).id().c_str() );
3267  return;
3268  }
3269 
3270  map_stack items = here.i_at( examp );
3271  bool cbms = std::all_of( items.begin(), items.end(), []( const item & i ) {
3272  return i.is_bionic();
3273  } );
3274 
3275  bool filthy_cbms = std::all_of( items.begin(), items.end(), []( const item & i ) {
3276  return i.is_bionic() && i.has_flag( flag_FILTHY );
3277  } );
3278 
3279  if( items.empty() ) {
3280  add_msg( _( "This autoclave is empty…" ) );
3281  return;
3282  }
3283  if( !cbms ) {
3284  add_msg( m_bad,
3285  _( "You need to remove all non-CBM items from the autoclave to start the program." ) );
3286  return;
3287  }
3288  if( filthy_cbms ) {
3289  add_msg( m_bad,
3290  _( "Some of those CBMs are filthy, you should wash them first for the sterilization process to work properly." ) );
3291  return;
3292  }
3293  requirement_data reqs = *requirement_data_autoclave;
3294 
3295  if( !reqs.can_make_with_inventory( you.crafting_inventory(), is_crafting_component ) ) {
3296  popup( "%s", reqs.list_missing() );
3297  return;
3298  }
3299 
3300  if( query_yn( _( "Start the autoclave?" ) ) ) {
3301 
3302  for( const auto &e : reqs.get_components() ) {
3303  you.consume_items( e, 1, is_crafting_component );
3304  }
3305  for( const auto &e : reqs.get_tools() ) {
3306  you.consume_tools( e );
3307  }
3308  you.invalidate_crafting_inventory();
3309  for( item &it : items ) {
3310  it.set_birthday( calendar::turn );
3311  }
3312  here.furn_set( examp, next_autoclave_type );
3313  add_msg( _( "You start the autoclave." ) );
3314  }
3315 }
3316 
3317 void iexamine::autoclave_full( Character &, const tripoint &examp )
3318 {
3319  map &here = get_map();
3320  furn_id cur_autoclave_type = here.furn( examp );
3321  furn_id next_autoclave_type = furn_str_id::NULL_ID();
3322  if( cur_autoclave_type == furn_id( "f_autoclave_full" ) ) {
3323  next_autoclave_type = furn_id( "f_autoclave" );
3324  } else {
3325  debugmsg( "Examined furniture has action autoclave_full, but is of type %s",
3326  here.furn( examp ).id().c_str() );
3327  return;
3328  }
3329 
3330  map_stack items = here.i_at( examp );
3331  bool cbms = std::all_of( items.begin(), items.end(), []( const item & i ) {
3332  return i.is_bionic();
3333  } );
3334 
3335  bool cbms_not_packed = std::all_of( items.begin(), items.end(), []( const item & i ) {
3336  return i.is_bionic() && i.has_flag( flag_NO_PACKED );
3337  } );
3338 
3339  if( items.empty() ) {
3340  add_msg( _( "This autoclave is empty…" ) );
3341  here.furn_set( examp, next_autoclave_type );
3342  return;
3343  }
3344  if( !cbms ) {
3345  add_msg( m_bad,
3346  _( "ERROR Autoclave can't process non CBM items." ) );
3347  return;
3348  }
3349  add_msg( _( "The autoclave is running." ) );
3350 
3351  const item &clock = *items.begin();
3352  const time_duration Cycle_time = 90_minutes;
3353  const time_duration time_left = Cycle_time - clock.age();
3354 
3355  if( time_left > 0_turns ) {
3356  add_msg( _( "The cycle will be complete in %s." ), to_string( time_left ) );
3357  return;
3358  }
3359 
3360  here.furn_set( examp, next_autoclave_type );
3361  for( item &it : items ) {
3362  if( !it.has_flag( flag_NO_PACKED ) ) {
3363  it.unset_flag( flag_NO_STERILE );
3364  }
3365  }
3366  add_msg( m_good, _( "The cycle is complete, the CBMs are now sterile." ) );
3367 
3368  if( cbms_not_packed ) {
3369  add_msg( m_info,
3370  _( "CBMs in direct contact with the environment will almost immediately become contaminated." ) );
3371  }
3372  here.furn_set( examp, next_autoclave_type );
3373 }
3374 
3375 static void add_firestarter( item *it, std::multimap<int, item *> &firestarters, Character &you,
3376  const tripoint &examp )
3377 {
3378  const use_function *usef = it->type->get_use( "firestarter" );
3379  if( usef != nullptr && usef->get_actor_ptr() != nullptr ) {
3380  const firestarter_actor *actor = dynamic_cast<const firestarter_actor *>( usef->get_actor_ptr() );
3381  if( actor->can_use( you, *it, examp ).success() ) {
3382  firestarters.insert( std::pair<int, item *>( actor->moves_cost_fast, it ) );
3383  }
3384  }
3385 }
3386 
3387 void iexamine::fireplace( Character &you, const tripoint &examp )
3388 {
3389  map &here = get_map();
3390  const bool already_on_fire = here.has_nearby_fire( examp, 0 );
3391  const bool furn_is_deployed = !here.furn( examp ).obj().deployed_item.is_empty();
3392 
3393  auto is_firestarter = []( const item & it ) {
3394  return it.has_flag( flag_FIRESTARTER ) || it.has_flag( flag_FIRE );
3395  };
3396  auto is_firequencher = []( const item & it ) {
3397  return it.damage_melee( STATIC( damage_type_id( "bash" ) ) );
3398  };
3399 
3400  std::multimap<int, item *> firestarters;
3401  std::vector<item *> firequenchers = you.items_with( is_firequencher );
3402 
3403  for( item *it : you.items_with( is_firestarter ) ) {
3404  add_firestarter( it, firestarters, you, examp );
3405  }
3406 
3407  for( const tripoint &pos : closest_points_first( you.pos(), PICKUP_RANGE ) ) {
3408  if( pos == examp ) {
3409  // stuff in the fireplace can't light or quench itself
3410  continue;
3411  }
3412  for( item_location &it : here.items_with( pos, is_firestarter ) ) {
3413  add_firestarter( &*it, firestarters, you, examp );
3414  }
3415  // anything is fine, so only check if we got nothing yet
3416  if( firequenchers.empty() ) {
3417  for( item_location &it : here.items_with( pos, is_firequencher ) ) {
3418  firequenchers.push_back( &*it );
3419  }
3420  }
3421  }
3422 
3423  const bool has_firestarter = !firestarters.empty();
3424  const bool has_bionic_firestarter = you.has_bionic( bio_lighter ) &&
3425  you.enough_power_for( bio_lighter );
3426 
3427  uilist selection_menu;
3428  selection_menu.text = _( "Select an action" );
3429  if( here.has_items( examp ) ) {
3430  // Note: This is displayed regardless of whether "examine with pickup" was used
3431  selection_menu.addentry( 0, true, 'g', _( "Get items" ) );
3432  }
3433  if( !already_on_fire ) {
3434  selection_menu.addentry( 1, has_firestarter, 'f',
3435  has_firestarter ? _( "Start a fire" ) : _( "Start a fire… you'll need a fire source." ) );
3436  if( has_bionic_firestarter ) {
3437  selection_menu.addentry( 2, true, 'b', _( "Use a CBM to start a fire" ) );
3438  }
3439  } else if( !firequenchers.empty() ) {
3440  selection_menu.addentry( 4, true, 'e', _( "Extinguish fire" ) );
3441  } else {
3442  selection_menu.addentry( 4, false, 'e', _( "Extinguish fire (bashing item required)" ) );
3443  }
3444  if( furn_is_deployed ) {
3445  selection_menu.addentry( 3, true, 't', _( "Take down the %s" ), here.furnname( examp ) );
3446  }
3447  selection_menu.query();
3448 
3449  switch( selection_menu.ret ) {
3450  case 0:
3451  none( you, examp );
3452  g->pickup( examp );
3453  return;
3454  case 1: {
3455  for( auto &firestarter : firestarters ) {
3456  item *it = firestarter.second;
3457  const use_function *usef = it->type->get_use( "firestarter" );
3458  const firestarter_actor *actor = dynamic_cast<const firestarter_actor *>( usef->get_actor_ptr() );
3459  you.add_msg_if_player( _( "You attempt to start a fire with your %s…" ), it->tname() );
3460  const ret_val<void> can_use = actor->can_use( you, *it, examp );
3461  if( can_use.success() ) {
3462  const int charges = actor->use( &you, *it, examp ).value_or( 0 );
3463  you.use_charges( it->typeId(), charges );
3464  return;
3465  } else {
3466  you.add_msg_if_player( m_bad, can_use.str() );
3467  }
3468  }
3469  you.add_msg_if_player( _( "You weren't able to start a fire." ) );
3470  return;
3471  }
3472  case 2: {
3473  if( !here.get_field( examp, fd_fire ) && here.add_field( examp, fd_fire, 1 ) ) {
3474  you.mod_power_level( -bio_lighter->power_activate );
3475  you.mod_moves( -to_moves<int>( 1_seconds ) );
3476  } else {
3477  you.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You can't light a fire there." ) );
3478  }
3479  return;
3480  }
3481  case 3: {
3482  if( already_on_fire ) {
3483  if( !query_yn( _( "Really take down the %s while it's on fire?" ), here.furnname( examp ) ) ) {
3484  return;
3485  }
3486  }
3487  you.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You take down the %s." ),
3488  here.furnname( examp ) );
3489  const itype_id furn_item = here.furn( examp ).obj().deployed_item;
3490  here.add_item_or_charges( examp, item( furn_item, calendar::turn ) );
3491  here.furn_set( examp, furn_str_id::NULL_ID() );
3492  return;
3493  }
3494  case 4: {
3495  here.remove_field( examp, fd_fire );
3496  you.mod_moves( -200 );
3497  you.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "With a few determined moves you put out the fire in the %s." ),
3498  here.furnname( examp ) );
3499  return;
3500  }
3501  default:
3502  none( you, examp );
3503  return;
3504  }
3505 }
3506 
3507 static void fvat_set_empty( const tripoint &pos )
3508 {
3509  map &here = get_map();
3510  furn_id furn = here.furn( pos );
3511  if( furn == furn_f_fvat_wood_empty || furn == furn_f_fvat_wood_full ) {
3512  here.furn_set( pos, furn_f_fvat_wood_empty );
3513  } else {
3514  here.furn_set( pos, furn_f_fvat_empty );
3515  }
3516 }
3517 
3518 static void fvat_set_full( const tripoint &pos )
3519 {
3520  map &here = get_map();
3521  furn_id furn = here.furn( pos );
3522  if( furn == furn_f_fvat_wood_empty || furn == furn_f_fvat_wood_full ) {
3523  here.furn_set( pos, furn_f_fvat_wood_full );
3524  } else {
3525  here.furn_set( pos, furn_f_fvat_full );
3526  }
3527 }
3528 
3529 void iexamine::fvat_empty( Character &you, const tripoint &examp )
3530 {
3531  itype_id brew_type;
3532  std::string brew_nname;
3533  bool to_deposit = false;
3534  static const auto vat_volume = units::from_liter( 50 );
3535  bool vat_full = false;
3536  bool ferment = false;
3537  bool brew_present = false;
3538  int charges_on_ground = 0;
3539  map &here = get_map();
3540  map_stack items = here.i_at( examp );
3541  for( auto item_it = items.begin(); item_it != items.end(); ) {
3542  if( !item_it->is_brewable() || brew_present ) {
3543  // This isn't a brew or there was already another kind of brew inside,
3544  // so this has to be moved.
3545  items.insert( *item_it );
3546  // This will add items to a space near the vat, because it's flagged as NOITEM.
3547  item_it = items.erase( item_it );
3548  } else {
3549  item_it++;
3550  brew_present = true;
3551  }
3552  }
3553  if( !brew_present ) {
3554  add_msg( _( "This keg is empty." ) );
3555  // TODO: Allow using brews from crafting inventory
3556  const auto b_inv = you.cache_get_items_with( "is_brewable", &item::is_brewable );
3557  if( b_inv.empty() ) {
3558  add_msg( m_info, _( "You have no brew to ferment." ) );
3559  return;
3560  }
3561  // Make lists of unique typeids and names for the menu
3562  // Code shamelessly stolen from the crop planting function!
3563  std::vector<itype_id> b_types;
3564  std::vector<std::string> b_names;
3565  for( const item *b : b_inv ) {
3566  if( std::find( b_types.begin(), b_types.end(), b->typeId() ) == b_types.end() ) {
3567  b_types.push_back( b->typeId() );
3568  b_names.push_back( item::nname( b->typeId() ) );
3569  }
3570  }
3571  // Choose brew from list
3572  int b_index = 0;
3573  if( b_types.size() > 1 ) {
3574  b_index = uilist( _( "Use which brew?" ), b_names );
3575  } else { //Only one brew type was in inventory, so it's automatically used
3576  if( !query_yn( _( "Set %s in the vat?" ), b_names[0] ) ) {
3577  b_index = -1;
3578  }
3579  }
3580  if( b_index < 0 ) {
3581  return;
3582  }
3583  to_deposit = true;
3584  brew_type = b_types[b_index];
3585  brew_nname = item::nname( brew_type );
3586  } else {
3587  item &brew = here.i_at( examp ).only_item();
3588  brew_type = brew.typeId();
3589  brew_nname = item::nname( brew_type );
3590  charges_on_ground = brew.charges;
3591  add_msg( _( "This keg contains %s (%d), %0.f%% full." ),
3592  brew.tname(), brew.charges, brew.volume() * 100.0 / vat_volume );
3593  enum options { ADD_BREW, REMOVE_BREW, START_FERMENT };
3594  uilist selectmenu;
3595  selectmenu.text = _( "Select an action" );
3596  selectmenu.addentry( ADD_BREW, ( you.charges_of( brew_type ) > 0 ), MENU_AUTOASSIGN,
3597  _( "Add more %s to the vat" ), brew_nname );
3598  selectmenu.addentry( REMOVE_BREW, brew.made_of( phase_id::LIQUID ), MENU_AUTOASSIGN,
3599  _( "Remove %s from the vat" ), brew.tname() );
3600  selectmenu.addentry( START_FERMENT, true, MENU_AUTOASSIGN, _( "Start fermenting cycle" ) );
3601  selectmenu.query();
3602  switch( selectmenu.ret ) {
3603  case ADD_BREW: {
3604  to_deposit = true;
3605  break;
3606  }
3607  case REMOVE_BREW: {
3608  liquid_handler::handle_liquid_from_ground( here.i_at( examp ).begin(), examp );
3609  return;
3610  }
3611  case START_FERMENT: {
3612  ferment = true;
3613  break;
3614  }
3615  default:
3616  add_msg( _( "Never mind." ) );
3617  return;
3618  }
3619  }
3620  if( to_deposit ) {
3621  item brew( brew_type, calendar::turn_zero );
3622  int charges_held = you.charges_of( brew_type );
3623  brew.charges = charges_on_ground;
3624  for( int i = 0; i < charges_held && !vat_full; i++ ) {
3625  you.use_charges( brew_type, 1 );
3626  brew.charges++;
3627  if( brew.volume() >= vat_volume ) {
3628  vat_full = true;
3629  }
3630  }
3631  add_msg( _( "Set %s in the vat." ), brew_nname );
3632  add_msg( _( "The keg now contains %s (%d), %0.f%% full." ),
3633  brew.tname(), brew.charges, brew.volume() * 100.0 / vat_volume );
3634  here.i_clear( examp );
3635  //This is needed to bypass NOITEM
3636  here.add_item( examp, brew );
3637  you.mod_moves( -to_moves<int>( 20_seconds ) );
3638  if( !vat_full ) {
3639  ferment = query_yn( _( "Start fermenting cycle?" ) );
3640  }
3641  }
3642  if( vat_full || ferment ) {
3643  here.i_at( examp ).only_item().set_age( 0_turns );
3644  fvat_set_full( examp );
3645  if( vat_full ) {
3646  add_msg( _( "The vat is full, so you close the lid and start the fermenting cycle." ) );
3647  } else {
3648  add_msg( _( "You close the lid and start the fermenting cycle." ) );
3649  }
3650  }
3651 }
3652 
3653 void iexamine::fvat_full( Character &you, const tripoint &examp )
3654 {
3655  map &here = get_map();
3656  map_stack items_here = here.i_at( examp );
3657  if( items_here.empty() ) {
3658  debugmsg( "fvat_full was empty!" );
3659  fvat_set_empty( examp );
3660  return;
3661  }
3662 
3663  for( item &it : items_here ) {
3664  if( !it.made_of_from_type( phase_id::LIQUID ) ) {
3665  add_msg( _( "You remove %s from the vat." ), it.tname() );
3666  here.add_item_or_charges( you.pos(), it );
3667  here.i_rem( examp, &it );
3668  }
3669  }
3670 
3671  if( items_here.empty() ) {
3672  fvat_set_empty( examp );
3673  return;
3674  }
3675 
3676  item &brew_i = *items_here.begin();
3677  // Does the vat contain unfermented brew, or already fermented booze?
3678  // TODO: Allow "recursive brewing" to continue without player having to check on it
3679  if( brew_i.is_brewable() ) {
3680  add_msg( _( "There's a vat of %s set to ferment there." ), brew_i.tname() );
3681 
3682  // TODO: change brew_time to return time_duration
3683  const time_duration brew_time = brew_i.brewing_time();
3684  const time_duration progress = brew_i.age();
3685  if( progress < brew_time ) {
3686  int hours = to_hours<int>( brew_time - progress );
3687  if( hours < 1 ) {
3688  add_msg( _( "It will finish brewing in less than an hour." ) );
3689  } else {
3690  add_msg( n_gettext( "It will finish brewing in about %d hour.",
3691  "It will finish brewing in about %d hours.",
3692  hours ), hours );
3693  }
3694  return;
3695  }
3696 
3697  if( query_yn( _( "Finish brewing?" ) ) ) {
3698  const std::map<itype_id, int> results = brew_i.brewing_results();
3699  const int count = brew_i.count();
3700  const time_point birthday = brew_i.birthday();
3701 
3702  here.i_clear( examp );
3703  for( const std::pair<const itype_id, int> &result : results ) {
3704  int amount = result.second * count;
3705  // TODO: Different age based on settings
3706  item booze( result.first, birthday );
3707  if( result.first->phase == phase_id::LIQUID ) {
3708  booze.charges = amount;
3709  here.add_item( examp, booze );
3710  add_msg( _( "The %s is now ready for bottling." ), result.first->nname( amount ) );
3711  } else {
3712  you.i_add_or_drop( booze, amount );
3713  add_msg( _( "You remove the %s from the vat." ), result.first->nname( amount ) );
3714  }
3715  }
3716 
3717  you.mod_moves( -to_moves<int>( 5_seconds ) );
3718  you.practice( skill_cooking, std::min( to_minutes<int>( brew_time ) / 10, 100 ) );
3719  }
3720 
3721  if( here.i_at( examp ).empty() ) {
3722  fvat_set_empty( examp );
3723  }
3724 
3725  return;
3726  } else {
3727  add_msg( _( "There's a vat of fermented %s there." ), brew_i.tname() );
3728  }
3729 
3730  const std::string booze_name = brew_i.tname();
3731  if( liquid_handler::handle_liquid_from_ground( items_here.begin(), examp ) ) {
3732  fvat_set_empty( examp );
3733  add_msg( _( "You squeeze the last drops of %s from the vat." ), booze_name );
3734  }
3735 }
3736 
3737 // Borrowed and modified fermenting vat functions
3738 static void compost_set_empty( const tripoint &pos )
3739 {
3740  map &here = get_map();
3741  furn_id furn = here.furn( pos );
3742  if( furn == furn_f_compost_empty || furn == furn_f_compost_full ) {
3743  here.furn_set( pos, furn_f_compost_empty );
3744  }
3745 }
3746 
3747 static void compost_set_full( const tripoint &pos )
3748 {
3749  map &here = get_map();
3750  furn_id furn = here.furn( pos );
3751  if( furn == furn_f_compost_empty || furn == furn_f_compost_full ) {
3752  here.furn_set( pos, furn_f_compost_full );
3753  }
3754 }
3755 
3756 void iexamine::compost_empty( Character &you, const tripoint &examp )
3757 {
3758  itype_id compost_type;
3759  std::string compost_nname;
3760  bool to_deposit = false;
3761  static const auto tank_volume = units::from_liter( 1000 );
3762  bool tank_full = false;
3763  bool ferment = false;
3764  bool compost_present = false;
3765  int charges_on_ground = 0;
3766  map &here = get_map();
3767  map_stack items = here.i_at( examp );
3768  for( auto item_it = items.begin(); item_it != items.end(); ) {
3769  if( !item_it->is_compostable() || compost_present ) {
3770  // This isn't a biomass or there was already another kind of biomass inside,
3771  // so this has to be moved.
3772  items.insert( *item_it );
3773  // This will add items to a space near the tank, because it's flagged as NOITEM.
3774  item_it = items.erase( item_it );
3775  } else {
3776  item_it++;
3777  compost_present = true;
3778  }
3779  }
3780  if( !compost_present ) {
3781  add_msg( _( "This tank is empty." ) );
3782  // TODO: Allow using biomass from crafting inventory
3783  const auto b_inv = you.cache_get_items_with( "is_compostable", &item::is_compostable );
3784  if( b_inv.empty() ) {
3785  add_msg( m_info, _( "You have no biomass to ferment." ) );
3786  return;
3787  }
3788  // Make lists of unique typeids and names for the menu
3789  // Code shamelessly stolen from the crop planting function!
3790  std::vector<itype_id> b_types;
3791  std::vector<std::string> b_names;
3792  for( const item *b : b_inv ) {
3793  if( std::find( b_types.begin(), b_types.end(), b->typeId() ) == b_types.end() ) {
3794  b_types.push_back( b->typeId() );
3795  b_names.push_back( item::nname( b->typeId() ) );
3796  }
3797  }
3798  // Choose biomass from list
3799  int b_index = 0;
3800  if( b_types.size() > 1 ) {
3801  b_index = uilist( _( "Use which biomass?" ), b_names );
3802  } else { //Only one biomass type was in inventory, so it's automatically used
3803  if( !query_yn( _( "Set %s in the tank?" ), b_names[0] ) ) {
3804  b_index = -1;
3805  }
3806  }
3807  if( b_index < 0 ) {
3808  return;
3809  }
3810  to_deposit = true;
3811  compost_type = b_types[b_index];
3812  compost_nname = item::nname( compost_type );
3813  } else {
3814  item &compost = here.i_at( examp ).only_item();
3815  compost_type = compost.typeId();
3816  compost_nname = item::nname( compost_type );
3817  charges_on_ground = compost.charges;
3818  add_msg( _( "This tank contains %s (%d), %0.f%% full." ),
3819  compost.tname(), compost.charges, compost.volume() * 100.0 / tank_volume );
3820  enum options { ADD_COMPOST, REMOVE_COMPOST, START_FERMENT };
3821  uilist selectmenu;
3822  selectmenu.text = _( "Select an action" );
3823  selectmenu.addentry( ADD_COMPOST, ( you.charges_of( compost_type ) > 0 ), MENU_AUTOASSIGN,
3824  _( "Add more %s to the tank" ), compost_nname );
3825  selectmenu.addentry( REMOVE_COMPOST, compost.made_of( phase_id::LIQUID ), MENU_AUTOASSIGN,
3826  _( "Remove %s from the tank" ), compost.tname() );
3827  selectmenu.addentry( START_FERMENT, true, MENU_AUTOASSIGN, _( "Start anaerobic digestion" ) );
3828  selectmenu.query();
3829  switch( selectmenu.ret ) {
3830  case ADD_COMPOST: {
3831  to_deposit = true;
3832  break;
3833  }
3834  case REMOVE_COMPOST: {
3835  liquid_handler::handle_liquid_from_ground( here.i_at( examp ).begin(), examp );
3836  return;
3837  }
3838  case START_FERMENT: {
3839  ferment = true;
3840  break;
3841  }
3842  default:
3843  add_msg( _( "Never mind." ) );
3844  return;
3845  }
3846  }
3847  if( to_deposit ) {
3848  item compost( compost_type, calendar::turn_zero );
3849  int charges_held = you.charges_of( compost_type );
3850  compost.charges = charges_on_ground;
3851  for( int i = 0; i < charges_held && !tank_full; i++ ) {
3852  you.use_charges( compost_type, 1 );
3853  compost.charges++;
3854  if( compost.volume() >= tank_volume ) {
3855  tank_full = true;
3856  }
3857  }
3858  add_msg( _( "Set %s in the tank." ), compost_nname );
3859  add_msg( _( "The tank now contains %s (%d), %0.f%% full." ),
3860  compost.tname(), compost.charges, compost.volume() * 100.0 / tank_volume );
3861  here.i_clear( examp );
3862  //This is needed to bypass NOITEM
3863  here.add_item( examp, compost );
3864  you.mod_moves( -to_moves<int>( 20_seconds ) );
3865  if( !tank_full ) {
3866  ferment = query_yn( _( "Start anaerobic digestion?" ) );
3867  }
3868  }
3869  if( tank_full || ferment ) {
3870  here.i_at( examp ).only_item().set_age( 0_turns );
3871  compost_set_full( examp );
3872  if( tank_full ) {
3873  add_msg( _( "The tank is full, so you close the lid and start anaerobic digestion." ) );
3874  } else {
3875  add_msg( _( "You close the lid and start anaerobic digestion." ) );
3876  }
3877  // Set timer for biogas production
3878  map &here = get_map();
3879  map_stack items_here = here.i_at( examp );
3880  item &ferm = *items_here.end();
3881  ferm.set_birthday( calendar::turn );
3882  }
3883 }
3884 
3885 void iexamine::compost_full( Character &you, const tripoint &examp )
3886 {
3887  map &here = get_map();
3888  map_stack items_here = here.i_at( examp );
3889  if( items_here.empty() ) {
3890  debugmsg( "biomass_full was empty!" );
3891  compost_set_empty( examp );
3892  return;
3893  }
3894 
3895  for( item &it : items_here ) {
3896  if( !it.made_of_from_type( phase_id::LIQUID ) ) {
3897  add_msg( _( "You remove %s from the tank." ), it.tname() );
3898  here.add_item_or_charges( you.pos(), it );
3899  here.i_rem( examp, &it );
3900  }
3901  }
3902 
3903  if( items_here.empty() ) {
3904  compost_set_empty( examp );
3905  return;
3906  }
3907 
3908  item &compost_i = *items_here.begin();
3909  item &ferm = *items_here.end();
3910  const time_duration last_open_time = ferm.age();
3911  int fermented_days = to_days<int>( last_open_time );
3912  // Biogas generating process starts after one month.
3913  int gas_gatherable = fermented_days < 30 ? fermented_days : fermented_days - 30 ;
3914  int max_gas_gatherable = gas_gatherable < 5 ? gas_gatherable : 5 ;
3915  // Does the tank contain unfermented biomass, or already fermented liquid?
3916  if( compost_i.is_compostable() ) {
3917  add_msg( _( "There's a tank of %s set to ferment there." ), compost_i.tname() );
3918 
3919  // TODO: change compost_time to return time_duration
3920  const time_duration compost_time = compost_i.composting_time();
3921  const time_duration progress = compost_i.age();
3922  if( progress < compost_time ) {
3923  int hours = to_hours<int>( compost_time - progress );
3924  int days = to_days<int>( compost_time - progress );
3925  if( hours < 1 ) {
3926  add_msg( _( "It will finish fermenting in less than an hour." ) );
3927  } else if( days < 1 ) {
3928  add_msg( n_gettext( "It will finish fermenting in about %d hour.",
3929  "It will finish fermenting in about %d hours.",
3930  hours ), hours );
3931  } else {
3932  add_msg( n_gettext( "It will finish fermenting in about %d day.",
3933  "It will finish fermenting in about %d days.",
3934  days ), days );
3935  }
3936  if( to_days<int>( progress ) >= 30 && gas_gatherable >= 1 ) {
3937  if( query_yn( _( "Gather biogas? Can't stop once releasing started." ) ) ) {
3938  const std::map<itype_id, int> results = compost_i.composting_results();
3939  const int count = compost_i.count();
3940  const time_point gas_birthday = compost_i.birthday();
3941  if( !max_gas_gatherable ) {
3942  add_msg( _( "No biogas gathered." ) );
3943  } else {
3944  for( const std::pair<const itype_id, int> &result : results ) {
3945  item biogas( result.first, gas_birthday );
3946  // 40 L biogas for 1 KG of biomass over the whole anaerobic digestion process.
3947  // 1 unit of biomass(0.5 KG) for 80 units(0.25 L for each unit) of biogas.
3948  int gas_amount = count * max_gas_gatherable * 80 / 30;
3949  if( result.first->phase == phase_id::GAS ) {
3950  if( !you.can_pickVolume_partial( biogas ) ) {
3951  add_msg( _( "You released some biogas from the tank." ) );
3952  } else {
3953  biogas.charges = result.second;
3954  you.i_add_or_drop( biogas, gas_amount );
3955  add_msg( _( "Gathered %s units of biogas." ), gas_amount );
3956  }
3957  }
3958  }
3959  }
3960  add_msg( n_gettext( "Biogas generating process started for about %d day.",
3961  "Biogas generating process started for about %d days.",
3962  max_gas_gatherable ), max_gas_gatherable );
3963  ferm.set_birthday( calendar::turn );
3964  }
3965  }
3966  return;
3967  }
3968 
3969  if( query_yn( _( "Finish fermenting?" ) ) ) {
3970  const std::map<itype_id, int> results = compost_i.composting_results();
3971  const int count = compost_i.count();
3972  const time_point birthday = compost_i.birthday();
3973 
3974  here.i_clear( examp );
3975  for( const std::pair<const itype_id, int> &result : results ) {
3976  int amount = result.second * count;
3977  // TODO: Different age based on settings
3978  item compost( result.first, birthday );
3979  if( result.first->phase == phase_id::LIQUID ) {
3980  compost.charges = amount;
3981  here.add_item( examp, compost );
3982  add_msg( _( "The %s is now ready for use." ), result.first->nname( amount ) );
3983  } else if( result.first->phase == phase_id::GAS ) {
3984  int gas_amount = count * max_gas_gatherable * 80 / 30;
3985  if( !gas_amount || !you.can_pickVolume_partial( compost ) ) {
3986  add_msg( _( "You released some biogas from the tank." ) );
3987  } else {
3988  compost.charges = result.second;
3989  you.i_add_or_drop( compost, gas_amount );
3990  add_msg( _( "Gathered %s units of biogas." ), gas_amount );
3991  }
3992  } else {
3993  you.i_add_or_drop( compost, amount );
3994  add_msg( _( "You removed the %s from the tank." ), result.first->nname( amount ) );
3995  }
3996  }
3997 
3998  you.mod_moves( -to_moves<int>( 5_seconds ) );
3999  you.practice( skill_chemistry, std::min( to_minutes<int>( compost_time ) / 10, 100 ) );
4000  }
4001 
4002  if( here.i_at( examp ).empty() ) {
4003  compost_set_empty( examp );
4004  }
4005 
4006  return;
4007  } else {
4008  add_msg( _( "There's a tank of %s there." ), compost_i.tname() );
4009  }
4010 
4011  const std::string compost_name = compost_i.tname();
4012  if( liquid_handler::handle_liquid_from_ground( items_here.begin(), examp ) ) {
4013  compost_set_empty( examp );
4014  add_msg( _( "You squeeze the last drops of %s from the tank." ), compost_name );
4015  }
4016 }
4017 
4018 static units::volume get_keg_capacity( const tripoint &pos )
4019 {
4020  const furn_t &furn = get_map().furn( pos ).obj();
4021  return furn.keg_capacity;
4022 }
4023 
4024 /**
4025  * Check whether there is a keg on the map that can be filled via @ref pour_into_keg.
4026  */
4027 bool iexamine::has_keg( const tripoint &pos )
4028 {
4029  return get_keg_capacity( pos ) > 0_ml;
4030 }
4031 
4032 static void displace_items_except_one_liquid( const tripoint &examp )
4033 {
4034  map &here = get_map();
4035  // Temporarily replace the real furniture with a fake furniture with NOITEM
4036  const furn_id previous_furn = here.furn( examp );
4037  here.furn_set( examp, furn_id( "f_no_item" ) );
4038 
4039  bool liquid_present = false;
4040  map_stack items = here.i_at( examp );
4041  for( map_stack::iterator it = items.begin(); it != items.end(); ) {
4042  if( !it->made_of_from_type( phase_id::LIQUID ) || liquid_present ) {
4043  // This isn't a liquid or there was already another kind of liquid inside,
4044  // so this has to be moved.
4045  // This will add items to a space near the vat, because it's flagged as NOITEM.
4046  items.insert( *it );
4047  it = items.erase( it );
4048  } else {
4049  it++;
4050  liquid_present = true;
4051  }
4052  }
4053 
4054  // Replace the real furniture
4055  here.furn_set( examp, previous_furn );
4056 }
4057 
4058 void iexamine::keg( Character &you, const tripoint &examp )
4059 {
4060  none( you, examp );
4061  map &here = get_map();
4062  const std::string keg_name = here.name( examp );
4063  const units::volume keg_cap = get_keg_capacity( examp );
4064 
4065  const bool has_container_with_liquid = map_cursor( examp ).has_item_with( []( const item & it ) {
4066  return !it.is_container_empty() && it.can_unload_liquid();
4067  } );
4068  const bool liquid_present = map_cursor( examp ).has_item_with( []( const item & it ) {
4069  return it.made_of_from_type( phase_id::LIQUID );
4070  } );
4071 
4072  if( !liquid_present || has_container_with_liquid ) {
4073  add_msg( m_info, _( "It is empty." ) );
4074  // Get list of all drinks
4075  auto drinks_inv = you.items_with( []( const item & it ) {
4076  return it.made_of( phase_id::LIQUID );
4077  } );
4078  if( drinks_inv.empty() ) {
4079  add_msg( m_info, _( "You don't have any drinks to fill the %s with." ), keg_name );
4080  return;
4081  }
4082  // Make lists of unique drinks... about third time we do this, maybe we ought to make a function next time
4083  std::vector<itype_id> drink_types;
4084  std::vector<std::string> drink_names;
4085  std::vector<double> drink_rot;
4086  std::vector<time_point> drink_bday;
4087  for( item *&drink : drinks_inv ) {
4088  auto found_drink = std::find( drink_types.begin(), drink_types.end(), drink->typeId() );
4089  if( found_drink == drink_types.end() ) {
4090  drink_types.push_back( drink->typeId() );
4091  drink_names.push_back( item::nname( drink->typeId() ) );
4092  drink_rot.push_back( drink->get_relative_rot() );
4093  drink_bday.push_back( drink->birthday() );
4094  } else {
4095  auto rot_iter = std::next( drink_rot.begin(), std::distance( drink_types.begin(), found_drink ) );
4096  // Yep, worst rot wins.
4097  *rot_iter = std::max( *rot_iter, drink->get_relative_rot() );
4098  }
4099  }
4100  // Choose drink to store in keg from list
4101  int drink_index = 0;
4102  if( drink_types.size() > 1 ) {
4103  drink_index = uilist( _( "Store which drink?" ), drink_names );
4104  if( drink_index < 0 || static_cast<size_t>( drink_index ) >= drink_types.size() ) {
4105  drink_index = -1;
4106  }
4107  } else { //Only one drink type was in inventory, so it's automatically used
4108  if( !query_yn( _( "Fill the %1$s with %2$s?" ),
4109  keg_name, drink_names[0].c_str() ) ) {
4110  drink_index = -1;
4111  }
4112  }
4113  if( drink_index < 0 ) {
4114  return;
4115  }
4116 
4117  // First empty the keg of foreign objects
4118  displace_items_except_one_liquid( examp );
4119 
4120  //Store liquid chosen in the keg
4121  itype_id drink_type = drink_types[ drink_index ];
4122  int charges_held = you.charges_of( drink_type );
4123  item drink( drink_type, drink_bday[ drink_index ] );
4124  drink.set_relative_rot( drink_rot[ drink_index ] );
4125  drink.charges = 0;
4126  bool keg_full = false;
4127  Character &player_character = get_player_character();
4128  for( int i = 0; i < charges_held && !keg_full; i++ ) {
4129  player_character.use_charges( drink.typeId(), 1 );
4130  drink.charges++;
4131  keg_full = drink.volume() >= keg_cap;
4132  }
4133  if( keg_full ) {
4134  add_msg( _( "You completely fill the %1$s with %2$s." ),
4135  keg_name, item::nname( drink_type ) );
4136  } else {
4137  add_msg( _( "You fill the %1$s with %2$s." ),
4138  keg_name, item::nname( drink_type ) );
4139  }
4140  you.mod_moves( -to_moves<int>( 10_seconds ) );
4141  here.i_clear( examp );
4142  here.add_item( examp, drink );
4143  return;
4144  } else {
4145  // First empty the keg of foreign objects
4146  displace_items_except_one_liquid( examp );
4147 
4148  map_stack items = here.i_at( examp );
4149  item &drink = items.only_item();
4150  const std::string drink_tname = drink.tname();
4151  const std::string drink_nname = item::nname( drink.typeId() );
4152  enum options {
4153  DISPENSE,
4154  HAVE_A_DRINK,
4155  REFILL,
4156  };
4157  uilist selectmenu;
4158  //~ $1 - furniture name, $2 - liquid name, $3 - liquid charges, $4 - liquid volume, $5 - liquid capacity
4159  selectmenu.text = string_format( _( "%1$s with %2$s (%3$d) %4$s / %5$s" ),
4160  uppercase_first_letter( keg_name ), drink_tname, drink.charges,
4161  vol_to_string( drink.volume(), true, true ), vol_to_string( keg_cap, true, true ) );
4162  selectmenu.addentry( DISPENSE, drink.made_of( phase_id::LIQUID ), MENU_AUTOASSIGN,
4163  _( "Dispense or dump %s" ), drink_tname );
4164  selectmenu.addentry( HAVE_A_DRINK, drink.is_food() && drink.made_of( phase_id::LIQUID ),
4165  MENU_AUTOASSIGN, _( "Have a drink" ) );
4166  selectmenu.addentry( REFILL, true, MENU_AUTOASSIGN, _( "Refill" ) );
4167  selectmenu.query();
4168 
4169  switch( selectmenu.ret ) {
4170  case DISPENSE:
4171  if( liquid_handler::handle_liquid_from_ground( items.begin(), examp ) ) {
4172  add_msg( _( "You squeeze the last drops of %1$s from the %2$s." ),
4173  drink_tname, keg_name );
4174  }
4175  return;
4176 
4177  case HAVE_A_DRINK:
4178  if( !you.can_consume_as_is( drink ) ) {
4179  return; // They didn't actually drink
4180  }
4181  you.assign_activity( consume_activity_actor( drink ) );
4182  drink.charges--;
4183  if( drink.charges == 0 ) {
4184  add_msg( _( "You squeeze the last drops of %1$s from the %2$s." ),
4185  drink_tname, keg_name );
4186  here.i_clear( examp );
4187  }
4188  return;
4189 
4190  case REFILL: {
4191  if( drink.volume() >= keg_cap ) {
4192  add_msg( _( "The %s is completely full." ), keg_name );
4193  return;
4194  }
4195  int charges_held = you.charges_of( drink.typeId() );
4196  if( charges_held < 1 ) {
4197  add_msg( m_info, _( "You don't have any %1$s to fill the %2$s with." ),
4198  drink_nname, keg_name );
4199  return;
4200  }
4201  item tmp( drink.typeId(), calendar::turn, charges_held );
4202  pour_into_keg( examp, tmp );
4203  you.use_charges( drink.typeId(), charges_held - tmp.charges );
4204  add_msg( _( "You fill the %1$s with %2$s." ), keg_name, drink_nname );
4205  you.mod_moves( -to_moves<int>( 10_seconds ) );
4206  return;
4207  }
4208 
4209  default:
4210  return;
4211  }
4212  }
4213 }
4214 
4215 /**
4216  * Pour liquid into a keg (furniture) on the map. The transferred charges (if any)
4217  * will be removed from the liquid item.
4218  * @return Whether any charges have been transferred at all.
4219  */
4220 bool iexamine::pour_into_keg( const tripoint &pos, item &liquid )
4221 {
4222  const units::volume keg_cap = get_keg_capacity( pos );
4223  if( keg_cap <= 0_ml ) {
4224  return false;
4225  }
4226  map &here = get_map();
4227  const std::string keg_name = here.name( pos );
4228 
4229  map_stack stack = here.i_at( pos );
4230  if( stack.empty() ) {
4231  here.add_item( pos, liquid );
4232  here.i_at( pos ).only_item().charges = 0; // Will be set later
4233  } else if( stack.only_item().typeId() != liquid.typeId() ) {
4234  add_msg( _( "The %s already contains some %s, you can't add a different liquid to it." ),
4235  keg_name, item::nname( stack.only_item().typeId() ) );
4236  return false;
4237  }
4238 
4239  item &drink = stack.only_item();
4240  if( drink.volume() >= keg_cap ) {
4241  add_msg( _( "The %s is full." ), keg_name );
4242  return false;
4243  }
4244 
4245  add_msg( _( "You pour %1$s into the %2$s." ), liquid.tname(), keg_name );
4246  while( liquid.charges > 0 && drink.volume() < keg_cap ) {
4247  drink.charges++;
4248  liquid.charges--;
4249  }
4250  return true;
4251 }
4252 
4253 static void pick_plant( Character &you, const tripoint &examp,
4254  const itype_id &itemType, ter_id new_ter, bool seeds = false )
4255 {
4256  map &here = get_map();
4257  bool auto_forage = get_option<bool>( "AUTO_FEATURES" ) &&
4258  get_option<std::string>( "AUTO_FORAGING" ) != "off";
4259  if( you.is_avatar() && !auto_forage &&
4260  !query_yn( _( "Harvest the %s?" ), here.tername( examp ) ) ) {
4261  iexamine::none( you, examp );
4262  return;
4263  }
4264 
4265  const float survival = you.get_skill_level( skill_survival );
4266  you.practice( skill_survival, 6 );
4267 
4268  int plantBase = rng( 2, 5 );
4269  ///\EFFECT_SURVIVAL increases number of plants harvested
4270  int plantCount = rng( plantBase, round( plantBase + survival / 2 ) );
4271  plantCount = std::min( plantCount, 12 );
4272 
4273  here.spawn_item( you.pos(), itemType, plantCount, 0, calendar::turn );
4274 
4275  if( seeds ) {
4276  // FIXME: shouldn't derive seed type by string manipulation
4277  here.spawn_item( you.pos(), itype_id( "seed_" + itemType.str() ), 1,
4278  rng( plantCount / 4, plantCount / 2 ), calendar::turn );
4279  }
4280 
4281  here.ter_set( examp, new_ter );
4282 }
4283 
4284 void iexamine::tree_hickory( Character &you, const tripoint &examp )
4285 {
4286  bool auto_forage = get_option<bool>( "AUTO_FEATURES" ) &&
4287  ( get_option<std::string>( "AUTO_FORAGING" ) == "all" ||
4288  get_option<std::string>( "AUTO_FORAGING" ) == "trees" );
4289 
4290  bool digging_up = false;
4291 
4292  map &here = get_map();
4293  if( !auto_forage && you.is_avatar() && you.has_quality( qual_DIG ) &&
4294  query_yn( _( "Dig up %s? This kills the tree!" ), here.tername( examp ) ) ) {
4295  digging_up = true;
4296  /** @EFFECT_SURVIVAL increases hickory root number per tree */
4297  here.spawn_item( you.pos(), itype_hickory_root, rng( 1,
4298  round( 3 + you.get_skill_level( skill_survival ) ) ),
4299  0,
4300  calendar::turn );
4301  here.ter_set( examp, ter_t_tree_hickory_dead );
4302  /** @EFFECT_SURVIVAL speeds up hickory root digging */
4303  you.mod_moves( -to_moves<int>( 20_seconds ) / ( you.get_skill_level( skill_survival ) + 1 ) + 100 );
4304  }
4305 
4306  if( !auto_forage && !digging_up && you.is_avatar() ) {
4307  you.add_msg_if_player( _( "You could dig this tree up for roots…" ) );
4308  }
4309 
4310  if( !auto_forage && !query_pick( you, examp ) ) {
4311  return;
4312  }
4313 
4314  you.assign_activity( harvest_activity_actor( examp, auto_forage ) );
4315 }
4316 
4317 static item_location maple_tree_sap_container()
4318 {
4319  const item maple_sap = item( "maple_sap", calendar::turn_zero );
4320  return g->inv_map_splice( [&]( const item & it ) {
4321  return it.get_remaining_capacity_for_liquid( maple_sap, true ) > 0;
4322  }, _( "Use which container to collect sap?" ), PICKUP_RANGE,
4323  _( "You don't have a container at hand." ) );
4324 }
4325 
4326 void iexamine::tree_maple( Character &you, const tripoint &examp )
4327 {
4328  const inventory &crafting_inv = you.crafting_inventory();
4329  if( !crafting_inv.has_quality( qual_DRILL ) ) {
4330  add_msg( m_info, _( "You need a tool to drill the crust to tap this maple tree." ) );
4331  return;
4332  }
4333 
4334  if( !crafting_inv.has_quality( qual_HAMMER ) ) {
4335  add_msg( m_info,
4336  _( "You need a tool to hammer the spile into the crust to tap this maple tree." ) );
4337  return;
4338  }
4339 
4340  map &here = get_map();
4341  item_location spile_loc = g->inv_map_splice( [&here]( const item_location & it ) {
4342  return it->get_quality_nonrecursive( qual_TREE_TAP ) > 0 &&
4343  !( here.ter( it.position() ) == ter_t_tree_maple_tapped );
4344  }, _( "Use which tapping tool?" ), PICKUP_RANGE, _( "You don't have a tapping tool at hand." ) );
4345 
4346  item *spile = spile_loc.get_item();
4347  if( !spile ) {
4348  return;
4349  }
4350  std::string spile_name = spile->tname();
4351 
4352  you.mod_moves( -to_moves<int>( 20_seconds ) );
4353  here.ter_set( examp, ter_t_tree_maple_tapped );
4354  here.add_item_or_charges( examp, *spile, false );
4355  spile_loc.remove_item();
4356  add_msg( m_info, _( "You drill the maple tree crust and tap a %s into the prepared hole." ),
4357  spile_name );
4358 
4359  item_location cont_loc = maple_tree_sap_container();
4360 
4361  item *container = cont_loc.get_item();
4362  if( container ) {
4363  here.add_item_or_charges( examp, *container, false );
4364  add_msg( m_info, _( "You hang the %s under the %s to collect sap." ), container->tname(),
4365  spile_name );
4366  cont_loc.remove_item();
4367  } else {
4368  add_msg( m_info, _( "No container added. The sap will just spill on the ground." ) );
4369  }
4370 }
4371 
4372 void iexamine::tree_maple_tapped( Character &you, const tripoint &examp )
4373 {
4374  bool has_sap = false;
4375  item *container = nullptr;
4376  item *spile = nullptr;
4377  int charges = 0;
4378 
4379  const std::string maple_sap_name = item::nname( itype_maple_sap );
4380 
4381  map &here = get_map();
4382  map_stack items = here.i_at( examp );
4383  for( item &it : items ) {
4384  if( it.will_spill() || it.is_watertight_container() ) {
4385  container = &it;
4386 
4387  it.visit_items( [&charges, &has_sap]( const item * it, item * ) {
4388  if( it->typeId() == itype_maple_sap ) {
4389  has_sap = true;
4390  charges = it->charges;
4391  return VisitResponse::ABORT;
4392  }
4393  return VisitResponse::NEXT;
4394  } );
4395  }
4396  if( it.get_quality_nonrecursive( qual_TREE_TAP ) > 0 ) {
4397  spile = &it;
4398  }
4399  }
4400 
4401  if( !spile ) {
4402  return;
4403  }
4404 
4405  enum options {
4406  REMOVE_TAP,
4407  ADD_CONTAINER,
4408  HARVEST_SAP,
4409  REMOVE_CONTAINER,
4410  };
4411  uilist selectmenu;
4412  selectmenu.addentry( REMOVE_TAP, true, MENU_AUTOASSIGN, _( "Remove tap" ) );
4413  selectmenu.addentry( ADD_CONTAINER, !container, MENU_AUTOASSIGN,
4414  _( "Add a container to receive the %s" ), maple_sap_name );
4415  selectmenu.addentry( HARVEST_SAP, has_sap, MENU_AUTOASSIGN, _( "Harvest current %s (%d)" ),
4416  maple_sap_name, charges );
4417  selectmenu.addentry( REMOVE_CONTAINER, container, MENU_AUTOASSIGN, _( "Remove container" ) );
4418 
4419  selectmenu.text = _( "Select an action" );
4420  selectmenu.query();
4421 
4422  switch( selectmenu.ret ) {
4423  case REMOVE_TAP: {
4424  if( !you.crafting_inventory().has_quality( qual_HAMMER ) ) {
4425  add_msg( m_info, _( "You need a hammering tool to remove the %s from the crust." ),
4426  spile->tname() );
4427  return;
4428  }
4429 
4430  add_msg( _( "You remove the %s." ), spile->tname() );
4431  here.add_item_or_charges( you.pos(), *spile );
4432 
4433  if( container ) {
4434  here.add_item_or_charges( you.pos(), *container );
4435  }
4436  here.i_clear( examp );
4437 
4438  you.mod_moves( -to_moves<int>( 20_seconds ) );
4439  here.ter_set( examp, ter_t_tree_maple );
4440 
4441  return;
4442  }
4443 
4444  case ADD_CONTAINER: {
4445  item_location cont_loc = maple_tree_sap_container();
4446 
4447  container = cont_loc.get_item();
4448  if( container ) {
4449  here.add_item_or_charges( examp, *container, false );
4450  you.mod_moves( -you.item_handling_cost( *container ) );
4451  add_msg( m_info, _( "You hang the %s under the spile to collect sap." ), container->tname() );
4452  cont_loc.remove_item();
4453  } else {
4454  add_msg( m_info, _( "No container added. The sap will just spill on the ground." ) );
4455  }
4456 
4457  return;
4458  }
4459 
4460  case HARVEST_SAP: {
4461  liquid_handler::handle_liquid_from_container( *container, PICKUP_RANGE );
4462  return;
4463  }
4464 
4465  case REMOVE_CONTAINER: {
4466  here.add_item_or_charges( you.pos(), *container );
4467  you.mod_moves( -you.item_handling_cost( *container ) );
4468  here.i_rem( examp, container );
4469  return;
4470  }
4471 
4472  default:
4473  return;
4474  }
4475 }
4476 
4477 void iexamine::shrub_marloss( Character &you, const tripoint &examp )
4478 {
4479  if( you.has_trait( trait_THRESH_MYCUS ) ) {
4480  pick_plant( you, examp, itype_mycus_fruit, ter_t_shrub_fungal );
4481  } else if( you.has_trait( trait_THRESH_MARLOSS ) ) {
4482  map &here = get_map();
4483  here.spawn_item( you.pos(), itype_mycus_fruit, 1, 0, calendar::turn );
4484  here.ter_set( examp, ter_t_fungus );
4485  add_msg( m_info, _( "The shrub offers up a fruit, then crumbles into a fungal bed." ) );
4486  } else {
4487  pick_plant( you, examp, itype_marloss_berry, ter_t_shrub_fungal );
4488  }
4489 }
4490 
4491 void iexamine::tree_marloss( Character &you, const tripoint &examp )
4492 {
4493  map &here = get_map();
4494  if( you.has_trait( trait_THRESH_MYCUS ) ) {
4495  pick_plant( you, examp, itype_mycus_fruit, ter_t_tree_fungal );
4496  if( you.has_trait( trait_M_DEPENDENT ) && one_in( 3 ) ) {
4497  // Folks have a better shot at keeping fed.
4498  add_msg( m_info,
4499  _( "We have located a particularly vital nutrient deposit underneath this location." ) );
4500  add_msg( m_good, _( "Additional nourishment is available." ) );
4501  here.ter_set( examp, ter_t_marloss_tree );
4502  }
4503  } else if( you.has_trait( trait_THRESH_MARLOSS ) ) {
4504  here.spawn_item( you.pos(), itype_mycus_fruit, 1, 0, calendar::turn );
4505  here.ter_set( examp, ter_t_tree_fungal );
4506  add_msg( m_info, _( "The tree offers up a fruit, then shrivels into a fungal tree." ) );
4507  } else {
4508  pick_plant( you, examp, itype_marloss_berry, ter_t_tree_fungal );
4509  }
4510 }
4511 
4512 void iexamine::shrub_wildveggies( Character &you, const tripoint &examp )
4513 {
4514  map &here = get_map();
4515  // Ask if there's something possibly more interesting than this shrub here
4516  if( ( !here.i_at( examp ).empty() ||
4517  here.veh_at( examp ) ||
4518  here.can_see_trap_at( examp, you ) ||
4519  get_creature_tracker().creature_at( examp ) != nullptr ) &&
4520  !query_yn( _( "Forage through %s?" ), here.tername( examp ) ) ) {
4521  none( you, examp );
4522  return;
4523  }
4524 
4525  add_msg( _( "You forage through the %s." ), here.tername( examp ) );
4526  ///\EFFECT_SURVIVAL speeds up foraging
4527  int move_cost = 100000 / ( 2 * you.get_skill_level( skill_survival ) + 5 );
4528  ///\EFFECT_PER randomly speeds up foraging
4529  move_cost /= rng( std::max( 4, you.per_cur ), 4 + you.per_cur * 2 );
4530  you.assign_activity( forage_activity_actor( move_cost ) );
4531  you.activity.placement = here.getglobal( examp );
4532  you.activity.auto_resume = true;
4533 }
4534 
4535 void trap::examine( const tripoint &examp ) const
4536 {
4537  avatar &player_character = get_avatar();
4538  map &here = get_map();
4539 
4540  // If the player can't see the trap, they can't interact with it.
4541  if( !can_see( examp, player_character ) ) {
4542  return;
4543  }
4544 
4545  if( player_character.cant_do_mounted() ) {
4546  return;
4547  }
4548 
4549  if( can_not_be_disarmed() ) {
4550  if( id != tr_ledge ) {
4551  add_msg( m_info, _( "That %s looks too dangerous to mess with. Best leave it alone." ), name() );
4552  }
4553  return;
4554  }
4555 
4556  // Some traps are not actual traps. Those should get a different query, no skill checks, and the option to grab it right away.
4557  // If there is a telepad and we are anchored, there is no risk involved in disarming it also.
4558  if( easy_take_down() || ( id == tr_telepad &&
4559  player_character.worn_with_flag(
4560  flag_DIMENSIONAL_ANCHOR ) ) ) { // Separated so saying no doesn't trigger the other query.
4561  if( !query_yn( _( "There is a %s there. Take down?" ), name() ) ) {
4562  return;
4563  }
4564  add_msg( _( "The %s is taken down." ), name() );
4565  on_disarmed( here, examp );
4566  return;
4567  }
4568 
4569  if( query_yn( _( "There is a %s there. Disarm?" ), name() ) ) {
4570  const float traps_skill_level = player_character.get_skill_level( skill_traps );
4571  const float traps_knowledge_level = player_character.get_knowledge_level( skill_traps );
4572  const float weighted_stat_average = ( 2.0f * player_character.per_cur + 3.0f *
4573  player_character.dex_cur +
4574  player_character.int_cur ) / 6.0f;
4575  int proficiency_effect = -2;
4576  // Without at least a basic traps proficiency, your skill level is effectively 2 levels lower.
4577  if( player_character.has_proficiency( proficiency_prof_traps ) ) {
4578  proficiency_effect = 0;
4579  // If you have the basic traps prof, negate the above penalty
4580  }
4581  if( player_character.has_proficiency( proficiency_prof_disarming ) ) {
4582  proficiency_effect = 4;
4583  // If you have the disarming proficiency, your skill level is effectively 4 levels higher.
4584  }
4585  if( player_character.has_proficiency( proficiency_prof_trapsetting ) ) {
4586  proficiency_effect += 1;
4587  // Knowing how to set traps does give you a small bonus to disarming them as well, regardless of your other bonuses.
4588  }
4589  const float mean_roll = ( ( traps_skill_level + traps_knowledge_level ) / 2 ) +
4590  ( weighted_stat_average / 4.0f ) + proficiency_effect;
4591 
4592  int roll = std::round( normal_roll( mean_roll, 3 ) );
4593 
4594  add_msg_debug( debugmode::DF_IEXAMINE, "Rolled %i, mean_roll %g. difficulty %i.", roll,
4595  mean_roll, difficulty );
4596 
4597  //Difficulty 0 traps should succeed regardless of proficiencies. (i.e caltrops and nailboards)
