4598  if( roll >= difficulty || difficulty == 0 ) {
4599  add_msg( _( "You disarm the trap!" ) );
4600  on_disarmed( here, examp );
4601  if( difficulty > 1.25 * traps_skill_level ) { // failure might have set off trap
4602  player_character.practice( skill_traps, 1.5 * ( difficulty - traps_skill_level ) );
4603  }
4604  } else if( roll >= ( difficulty * .8 ) ) {
4605  add_msg( _( "You fail to disarm the trap." ) );
4606  if( difficulty > 1.25 * traps_skill_level ) {
4607  player_character.practice( skill_traps, 1.5 * ( difficulty - traps_skill_level ) );
4608  }
4609  } else {
4610  add_msg( m_bad, _( "You fail to disarm the trap, and you set it off!" ) );
4611  trigger( examp, player_character );
4612  if( difficulty - roll <= 6 ) {
4613  // Give xp for failing, but not if we failed terribly (in which
4614  // case the trap may not be disarmable).
4615  player_character.practice( skill_traps, 2 * difficulty );
4616  }
4617  }
4618  //Picking up bubble wrap continuously could powerlevel trap proficiencies, with no risk involved.
4619  if( difficulty != 0 ) {
4620  player_character.practice_proficiency( proficiency_prof_traps, 5_minutes );
4621  // Disarming a trap gives you a token bonus to learning to set them properly.
4622  player_character.practice_proficiency( proficiency_prof_trapsetting, 30_seconds );
4623  player_character.practice_proficiency( proficiency_prof_disarming, 5_minutes );
4624  }
4625 
4626  return;
4627  }
4628 }
4629 
4630 void iexamine::part_con( Character &you, tripoint const &examp )
4631 {
4632  map &here = get_map();
4633  // TODO: fix point types
4634  if( partial_con *const pc = here.partial_con_at( tripoint_bub_ms( examp ) ) ) {
4635  if( you.fine_detail_vision_mod() > 4 &&
4636  !you.has_trait( trait_DEBUG_HS ) ) {
4637  add_msg( m_info, _( "It is too dark to construct right now." ) );
4638  return;
4639  }
4640  const construction &built = pc->id.obj();
4641  if( !query_yn( _( "Unfinished task: %s, %d%% complete here, continue construction?" ),
4642  built.group->name(), pc->counter / 100000 ) ) {
4643  if( query_yn( _( "Cancel construction?" ) ) ) {
4644  for( const item &it : pc->components ) {
4645  here.add_item_or_charges( you.pos(), it );
4646  }
4647  // TODO: fix point types
4648  here.partial_con_remove( tripoint_bub_ms( examp ) );
4649  }
4650  } else {
4651  you.assign_activity( ACT_BUILD );
4652  you.activity.placement = here.getglobal( examp );
4653  }
4654  return;
4655  }
4656 }
4657 
4658 void iexamine::water_source( Character &, const tripoint &examp )
4659 {
4660  map &here = get_map();
4661  item water = here.water_from( examp );
4662  liquid_handler::handle_liquid( water, nullptr, 0, &examp );
4663 }
4664 
4665 void iexamine::finite_water_source( Character &, const tripoint &examp )
4666 {
4667  map_stack items = get_map().i_at( examp );
4668  for( auto item_it = items.begin(); item_it != items.end(); ++item_it ) {
4669  if( item_it->made_of( phase_id::LIQUID ) ) {
4670  liquid_handler::handle_liquid_from_ground( item_it, examp );
4671  break;
4672  }
4673  }
4674 }
4675 
4676 const itype *furn_t::crafting_pseudo_item_type() const
4677 {
4678  if( crafting_pseudo_item.is_empty() ) {
4679  return nullptr;
4680  }
4681  return item::find_type( crafting_pseudo_item );
4682 }
4683 
4684 std::vector<const itype *> furn_t::crafting_ammo_item_types() const
4685 {
4686  const itype *pseudo = crafting_pseudo_item_type();
4687  std::vector<const itype *> output;
4688  if( pseudo && pseudo->tool && !pseudo->tool->ammo_id.empty() ) {
4689  for( const ammotype &atype : pseudo->tool->ammo_id ) {
4690  const itype *itype = item::find_type( atype->default_ammotype() );
4691  if( itype != nullptr ) {
4692  output.push_back( itype );
4693  }
4694  }
4695  }
4696  return output;
4697 }
4698 
4699 /**
4700 * Finds the number of charges of the first item that matches type.
4701 *
4702 * @param type Search target.
4703 * @param items Stack of items. Search stops at first match.
4704 *
4705 * @return Number of charges.
4706 * */
4707 static int count_charges_in_list( const itype *type, const map_stack &items )
4708 {
4709  for( const item &candidate : items ) {
4710  if( candidate.type == type ) {
4711  return candidate.charges;
4712  }
4713  }
4714  return 0;
4715 }
4716 
4717 /**
4718 * Finds the number of charges of the first item that matches ammotype.
4719 *
4720 * @param ammotype Search target.
4721 * @param items Stack of items. Search stops at first match.
4722 * @param [out] item_type Matching type.
4723 *
4724 * @return Number of charges.
4725 * */
4726 static int count_charges_in_list( const ammotype *ammotype, const map_stack &items,
4727  itype_id &item_type )
4728 {
4729  for( const item &candidate : items ) {
4730  if( candidate.is_ammo() && candidate.type->ammo->type == *ammotype ) {
4731  item_type = candidate.typeId();
4732  return candidate.charges;
4733  }
4734  }
4735  return 0;
4736 }
4737 
4738 static void reload_furniture( Character &you, const tripoint &examp, bool allow_unload )
4739 {
4740  map &here = get_map();
4741  const furn_t &f = here.furn( examp ).obj();
4742  const itype *pseudo_type = f.crafting_pseudo_item_type();
4743  const std::vector<const itype *> ammo_list = f.crafting_ammo_item_types();
4744  bool use_ammotype = f.has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_AMMOTYPE_RELOAD );
4745  auto can_be_reloaded = []( const std::vector<const itype *> &lst ) {
4746  for( const itype *atype : lst ) {
4747  if( atype != nullptr && atype->ammo ) {
4748  return true;
4749  }
4750  }
4751  return false;
4752  };
4753  if( pseudo_type == nullptr || !can_be_reloaded( ammo_list ) ) {
4754  add_msg( m_info, _( "This %s can not be reloaded!" ), f.name() );
4755  return;
4756  }
4757  const itype *ammo_loaded = nullptr;
4758  int amount_in_furn = 0;
4759  for( const itype *ammo : ammo_list ) {
4760  itype_id ammo_itypeID( ammo->get_id() );
4761  int amount_tmp = use_ammotype ?
4762  count_charges_in_list( &ammo->ammo->type, here.i_at( examp ), ammo_itypeID ) :
4763  count_charges_in_list( ammo, here.i_at( examp ) );
4764  if( allow_unload && amount_tmp > 0 ) {
4765  ammo_loaded = ammo;
4766  amount_in_furn = amount_tmp;
4767  if( you.query_yn( _( "The %1$s contains %2$d %3$s. Unload?" ), f.name(), amount_in_furn,
4768  ammo_itypeID->nname( amount_in_furn ) ) ) {
4769  map_stack items = here.i_at( examp );
4770  for( map_stack::iterator itm = items.begin(); itm != items.end(); ) {
4771  if( itm->typeId() == ammo_itypeID ) {
4772  if( you.can_stash( *itm ) ) {
4773  std::vector<item_location> target_items{ item_location( map_cursor( examp ), &*itm ) };
4774  you.assign_activity( pickup_activity_actor( target_items, { 0 }, you.pos(), false ) );
4775  return;
4776  } else {
4777  // get handling cost before the item reference is invalidated
4778  const int handling_cost = -you.item_handling_cost( *itm );
4779 
4780  add_msg( _( "You remove %1$s from the %2$s." ), itm->tname(), f.name() );
4781  here.add_item_or_charges( you.pos(), *itm );
4782  itm = items.erase( itm );
4783  you.mod_moves( handling_cost );
4784  return;
4785  }
4786  } else {
4787  itm++;
4788  }
4789  }
4790  }
4791  }
4792  }
4793  if( ammo_loaded ) {
4794  const int max_amount_in_furn = item( pseudo_type ).ammo_capacity( ammo_loaded->ammo->type );
4795  if( amount_in_furn >= max_amount_in_furn ) {
4796  add_msg( m_info, _( "The %s is full, cannot reload." ), f.name() );
4797  return;
4798  }
4799  }
4800  item pseudo( pseudo_type );
4801  // maybe at some point we need a pseudo item_location or something
4802  // but for now this should at least work as intended
4803  item_location pseudo_loc( map_cursor( examp ), &pseudo );
4804 
4805  // used to only allow one type of ammo, changed with move to inventory_selector
4806  // todo: use furniture name instead of pseudo item name
4807  item::reload_option opt = game_menus::inv::select_ammo( you, pseudo_loc );
4808 
4809  if( !opt ) {
4810  return;
4811  }
4812 
4813  if( ammo_loaded && opt.ammo->type != ammo_loaded ) {
4814  add_msg( m_info, _( "This %s is already loaded with %s!" ), f.name(), ammo_loaded->nname( 0 ) );
4815  return;
4816  }
4817  const int max_reload_amount = item( pseudo_type ).ammo_capacity(
4818  opt.ammo->ammo_type() ) - amount_in_furn;
4819  const itype *opt_type = opt.ammo->type;
4820  const int max_amount = std::min( opt.qty(), max_reload_amount );
4821  const std::string popupmsg = string_format( _( "Put how many of the %1$s into the %2$s?" ),
4822  opt_type->nname( max_amount ), f.name() );
4823  int amount = string_input_popup()
4824  .title( popupmsg )
4825  .width( 20 )
4826  .text( std::to_string( max_amount ) )
4827  .only_digits( true )
4828  .query_int();
4829  if( amount <= 0 || amount > max_amount ) {
4830  return;
4831  }
4832 
4833  auto place_item = [&here, &examp]( const item & it ) {
4834  for( item &e : here.i_at( examp ) ) {
4835  if( e.merge_charges( it ) ) {
4836  return;
4837  }
4838  }
4839 
4840  here.add_item( examp, it );
4841  };
4842 
4843  item moved( opt_type, opt.ammo.get_item()->birthday(), amount );
4844  place_item( moved );
4845  you.mod_moves( -you.item_handling_cost( moved ) );
4846  std::list<item>used;
4847  if( opt.ammo.get_item()->use_charges( opt_type->get_id(), amount, used,
4848  opt.ammo.position() ) ) {
4849  opt.ammo.remove_item();
4850  }
4851 
4852  const int amount_in_furn_after_placing = count_charges_in_list( opt_type,
4853  here.i_at( examp ) );
4854  //~ %1$s - furniture, %2$d - number, %3$s items.
4855  add_msg( _( "The %1$s contains %2$d %3$s." ), f.name(), amount_in_furn_after_placing,
4856  opt_type->nname( amount_in_furn_after_placing ) );
4857 
4858  add_msg( _( "You reload the %s." ), here.furnname( examp ) );
4859 
4860  you.invalidate_crafting_inventory();
4861 }
4862 
4863 void iexamine::reload_furniture( Character &you, const tripoint &examp )
4864 {
4865  return reload_furniture( you, examp, true );
4866 }
4867 
4868 void iexamine::curtains( Character &you, const tripoint &examp )
4869 {
4870  map &here = get_map();
4871  const bool closed_window_with_curtains = here.has_flag(
4872  ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_BARRICADABLE_WINDOW_CURTAINS,
4873  examp );
4874  if( here.is_outside( you.pos() ) && ( here.has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_WALL, examp ) ||
4875  closed_window_with_curtains ) ) {
4876  locked_object( you, examp );
4877  return;
4878  }
4879 
4880  const ter_id ter = here.ter( examp );
4881 
4882  // Peek through the curtains, or tear them down.
4883  uilist window_menu;
4884  window_menu.text = _( "Do what with the curtains?" );
4885  window_menu.addentry( 0, ( !ter.obj().close &&
4886  closed_window_with_curtains ), 'p', _( "Peek through the closed curtains." ) );
4887  window_menu.addentry( 1, true, 't', _( "Tear down the curtains." ) );
4888  window_menu.query();
4889  const int choice = window_menu.ret;
4890 
4891  if( choice == 0 ) {
4892  // Peek
4893  g->peek( examp );
4894  you.add_msg_if_player( _( "You carefully peek through the curtains." ) );
4895  } else if( choice == 1 ) {
4896  // Mr. Gorbachev, tear down those curtains!
4897  if( here.ter( examp )->has_curtains() ) {
4898  here.ter_set( examp, here.ter( examp )->curtain_transform );
4899  }
4900 
4901  here.spawn_item( you.pos(), itype_nail, 1, 4, calendar::turn );
4902  here.spawn_item( you.pos(), itype_sheet, 2, 0, calendar::turn );
4903  here.spawn_item( you.pos(), itype_stick, 1, 0, calendar::turn );
4904  here.spawn_item( you.pos(), itype_string_36, 1, 0, calendar::turn );
4905  you.mod_moves( -to_moves<int>( 10_seconds ) );
4906  you.add_msg_if_player( _( "You tear the curtains and curtain rod off the windowframe." ) );
4907  } else {
4908  you.add_msg_if_player( _( "Never mind." ) );
4909  }
4910 }
4911 
4912 void iexamine::sign( Character &you, const tripoint &examp )
4913 {
4914  map &here = get_map();
4915  std::string existing_signage = here.get_signage( examp );
4916  bool previous_signage_exists = !existing_signage.empty();
4917 
4918  // Display existing message, or lack thereof.
4919  if( here.furn( examp )->has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_SIGN_ALWAYS ) || previous_signage_exists ) {
4920  if( you.has_trait( trait_ILLITERATE ) ) {
4921  popup( _( "You're illiterate, and can't read the message on the sign." ) );
4922  } else if( previous_signage_exists ) {
4923  popup( existing_signage );
4924  } else {
4925  you.add_msg_if_player( m_neutral, _( "Nothing legible on the sign." ) );
4926  }
4927 
4928  // Allow chance to modify message.
4929  std::vector<tool_comp> tools;
4930  std::vector<const item *> filter = you.crafting_inventory().items_with( []( const item & it ) {
4931  return it.has_flag( flag_WRITE_MESSAGE ) && it.charges > 0;
4932  } );
4933  tools.reserve( filter.size() );
4934  for( const item *writing_item : filter ) {
4935  tools.emplace_back( writing_item->typeId(), 1 );
4936  }
4937  if( !tools.empty() ) {
4938  // Different messages if the sign already has writing associated with it.
4939  std::string query_message = previous_signage_exists ?
4940  _( "Overwrite the existing message on the sign?" ) :
4941  _( "Add a message to the sign?" );
4942  std::string ignore_message = _( "You leave the sign alone." );
4943  if( query_yn( query_message ) ) {
4944  std::string signage = string_input_popup()
4945  .title( _( "Write what?" ) )
4946  .identifier( "signage" )
4947  .query_string();
4948  if( signage.empty() ) {
4949  you.add_msg_if_player( m_neutral, ignore_message );
4950  } else {
4951  std::string spray_painted_message = previous_signage_exists ?
4952  _( "You overwrite the previous message on the sign with your graffiti." ) :
4953  _( "You graffiti a message onto the sign." );
4954  here.set_signage( examp, signage );
4955  you.add_msg_if_player( m_info, spray_painted_message );
4956  you.mod_moves( - 20 * signage.length() );
4957  you.consume_tools( tools, 1 );
4958  }
4959  } else {
4960  you.add_msg_if_player( m_neutral, ignore_message );
4961  }
4962  }
4963  }
4964 }
4965 
4966 static int getNearPumpCount( const tripoint &p, fuel_station_fuel_type &fuel_type )
4967 {
4968  int result = 0;
4969  map &here = get_map();
4970  for( const tripoint &tmp : here.points_in_radius( p, 12 ) ) {
4971  const ter_id t = here.ter( tmp );
4972  if( t == ter_t_gas_pump || t == ter_t_gas_pump_a ) {
4973  result++;
4974  fuel_type = FUEL_TYPE_GASOLINE;
4975  } else if( t == ter_t_diesel_pump || t == ter_t_diesel_pump_a ) {
4976  result++;
4977  fuel_type = FUEL_TYPE_DIESEL;
4978  }
4979  }
4980  return result;
4981 }
4982 
4983 std::optional<tripoint> iexamine::getNearFilledGasTank( const tripoint &center, int &fuel_units,
4984  fuel_station_fuel_type &fuel_type )
4985 {
4986  std::optional<tripoint> tank_loc;
4987  int distance = INT_MAX;
4988  fuel_units = 0;
4989 
4990  map &here = get_map();
4991  for( const tripoint &tmp : here.points_in_radius( center, SEEX * 2 ) ) {
4992 
4993  furn_id check_for_fuel_tank = here.furn( tmp );
4994 
4995  if( ( fuel_type == FUEL_TYPE_GASOLINE && check_for_fuel_tank != furn_f_gas_tank ) ||
4996  ( fuel_type == FUEL_TYPE_DIESEL && check_for_fuel_tank != furn_f_diesel_tank ) ) {
4997  continue;
4998  }
4999 
5000  const int new_distance = rl_dist( center, tmp );
5001 
5002  if( new_distance >= distance ) {
5003  continue;
5004  }
5005  if( !tank_loc ) {
5006  // Return a potentially empty tank, but only if we don't find a closer full one.
5007  tank_loc.emplace( tmp );
5008  }
5009  for( item &k : here.i_at( tmp ) ) {
5010  if( k.made_of( phase_id::LIQUID ) ) {
5011  distance = new_distance;
5012  tank_loc.emplace( tmp );
5013  fuel_units = k.charges;
5014  break;
5015  }
5016  }
5017  }
5018  return tank_loc;
5019 }
5020 
5021 static int getGasDiscountCardQuality( const item &it )
5022 {
5023  for( const flag_id &tag : it.type->get_flags() ) {
5024  if( string_starts_with( tag->id.str(), "DISCOUNT_VALUE_" ) ) {
5025  ret_val<int> discount_value =
5026  try_parse_integer<int>( tag->id.str().substr( 15 ), false );
5027  if( discount_value.success() ) {
5028  return discount_value.value();
5029  } else {
5030  debugmsg( "Error parsing ammo DISCOUNT_VALUE_ suffix: %s", discount_value.str() );
5031  }
5032  }
5033  }
5034  return 0;
5035 }
5036 
5037 static int findBestGasDiscount( Character &you )
5038 {
5039  int discount = 0;
5040 
5041  you.cache_visit_items_with( flag_GAS_DISCOUNT, [&discount]( const item & it ) {
5042  discount = std::max( discount, getGasDiscountCardQuality( it ) );
5043  } );
5044 
5045  return discount;
5046 }
5047 
5048 static std::string str_to_illiterate_str( std::string s )
5049 {
5050  if( !get_player_character().has_trait( trait_ILLITERATE ) ) {
5051  return s;
5052  } else {
5053  for( char &i : s ) {
5054  i = i + rng( 0, 5 ) - rng( 0, 5 );
5055  if( i < ' ' ) {
5056  // some control character, most likely not handled correctly be the print functions
5057  i = ' ';
5058  } else if( i == '%' ) {
5059  // avoid characters that trigger formatting in the various print functions
5060  i++;
5061  }
5062  }
5063  return s;
5064  }
5065 }
5066 
5067 static std::string getGasDiscountName( int discount )
5068 {
5069  if( discount == 3 ) {
5070  return str_to_illiterate_str( _( "Platinum member" ) );
5071  } else if( discount == 2 ) {
5072  return str_to_illiterate_str( _( "Gold member" ) );
5073  } else if( discount == 1 ) {
5074  return str_to_illiterate_str( _( "Silver member" ) );
5075  } else {
5076  return str_to_illiterate_str( _( "Beloved customer" ) );
5077  }
5078 }
5079 
5080 static int getGasPricePerLiter( int discount )
5081 {
5082  // Those prices are in cents
5083  static constexpr std::array<int, 4> prices = { 1400, 1320, 1200, 1000 };
5084  if( discount < 0 || discount > 3 ) {
5085  return prices[0];
5086  } else {
5087  return prices[discount];
5088  }
5089 }
5090 
5091 std::optional<tripoint> iexamine::getGasPumpByNumber( const tripoint &p, int number )
5092 {
5093  int k = 0;
5094  map &here = get_map();
5095  for( const tripoint &tmp : here.points_in_radius( p, 12 ) ) {
5096  const ter_id t = here.ter( tmp );
5097  if( ( t == ter_t_gas_pump || t == ter_t_gas_pump_a
5098  || t == ter_t_diesel_pump || t == ter_t_diesel_pump_a ) && number == k++ ) {
5099  return tmp;
5100  }
5101  }
5102  return std::nullopt;
5103 }
5104 
5105 bool iexamine::toPumpFuel( const tripoint &src, const tripoint &dst, int units )
5106 {
5107  map &here = get_map();
5108  map_stack items = here.i_at( src );
5109  for( auto item_it = items.begin(); item_it != items.end(); ++item_it ) {
5110  if( item_it->made_of( phase_id::LIQUID ) ) {
5111  if( item_it->charges < units ) {
5112  return false;
5113  }
5114 
5115  item_it->charges -= units;
5116 
5117  item liq_d( item_it->type, calendar::turn, units );
5118 
5119  here.add_item_or_charges( dst, liq_d );
5120 
5121  if( item_it->charges < 1 ) {
5122  items.erase( item_it );
5123  }
5124 
5125  return true;
5126  }
5127  }
5128 
5129  return false;
5130 }
5131 
5132 static int fromPumpFuel( const tripoint &dst, const tripoint &src )
5133 {
5134  map &here = get_map();
5135  map_stack items = here.i_at( src );
5136  for( auto item_it = items.begin(); item_it != items.end(); ++item_it ) {
5137  if( item_it->made_of( phase_id::LIQUID ) ) {
5138  // how much do we have in the pump?
5139  const int amount = item_it->charges;
5140  item liq_d( item_it->type, calendar::turn, amount );
5141 
5142  // add the charges to the destination
5143  const ter_id backup_ter = here.ter( dst );
5144  const furn_id backup_furn = here.furn( dst );
5145  here.ter_set( dst, ter_str_id::NULL_ID() );
5146  here.furn_set( dst, furn_str_id::NULL_ID() );
5147  here.add_item_or_charges( dst, liq_d );
5148  here.ter_set( dst, backup_ter );
5149  here.furn_set( dst, backup_furn );
5150 
5151  // remove the liquid from the pump
5152  items.erase( item_it );
5153  return amount;
5154  }
5155  }
5156  return -1;
5157 }
5158 
5159 static void turnOnSelectedPump( const tripoint &p, int number, fuel_station_fuel_type &fuel_type )
5160 {
5161  int k = 0;
5162  map &here = get_map();
5163  for( const tripoint &tmp : here.points_in_radius( p, 12 ) ) {
5164  const ter_id t = here.ter( tmp );
5165  if( fuel_type == FUEL_TYPE_GASOLINE ) {
5166  if( t == ter_t_gas_pump || t == ter_t_gas_pump_a ) {
5167  if( number == k++ ) {
5168  here.ter_set( tmp, ter_t_gas_pump_a );
5169  } else {
5170  here.ter_set( tmp, ter_t_gas_pump );
5171  }
5172  }
5173  } else if( fuel_type == FUEL_TYPE_DIESEL ) {
5174  if( t == ter_t_diesel_pump || t == ter_t_diesel_pump_a ) {
5175  if( number == k++ ) {
5176  here.ter_set( tmp, ter_t_diesel_pump_a );
5177  } else {
5178  here.ter_set( tmp, ter_t_diesel_pump );
5179  }
5180  }
5181  }
5182  }
5183 }
5184 
5185 void iexamine::pay_gas( Character &you, const tripoint &examp )
5186 {
5187 
5188  int choice = -1;
5189  const int buy_gas = 1;
5190  const int choose_pump = 2;
5191  const int hack = 3;
5192  const int refund = 4;
5193 
5194  if( you.has_trait( trait_ILLITERATE ) ) {
5195  popup( _( "You're illiterate, and can't read the screen." ) );
5196  }
5197 
5198  fuel_station_fuel_type fuelType = FUEL_TYPE_NONE;
5199  std::string fuelTypeStr;
5200  int pumpCount = getNearPumpCount( examp, fuelType );
5201  fuelTypeStr = fuelType == FUEL_TYPE_GASOLINE ? _( "gasoline" ) : fuelType == FUEL_TYPE_DIESEL ?
5202  _( "diesel" ) : "";
5203  if( pumpCount == 0 ) {
5204  popup( str_to_illiterate_str( string_format( _( "Failure! No %s pumps found!" ), fuelTypeStr ) ) );
5205  return;
5206  }
5207 
5208  int tankUnits;
5209  const std::optional<tripoint> pTank_ = getNearFilledGasTank( examp, tankUnits, fuelType );
5210  if( !pTank_ ) {
5211  popup( str_to_illiterate_str( string_format( _( "Failure! No %s tank found!" ), fuelTypeStr ) ) );
5212  return;
5213  }
5214  const tripoint pTank = *pTank_;
5215 
5216  if( tankUnits == 0 ) {
5217  popup( str_to_illiterate_str(
5218  string_format( _( "This station is out of %s. We apologize for the inconvenience." ),
5219  fuelTypeStr ) ) );
5220  return;
5221  }
5222 
5223  if( uistate.ags_pay_gas_selected_pump + 1 > pumpCount ) {
5224  uistate.ags_pay_gas_selected_pump = 0;
5225  }
5226 
5227  int discount = findBestGasDiscount( you );
5228  std::string discountName = getGasDiscountName( discount );
5229 
5230  int pricePerUnit = getGasPricePerLiter( discount );
5231 
5232  uilist amenu;
5233  amenu.selected = 1;
5234  amenu.text = str_to_illiterate_str( _( "Welcome to AutoGas!" ) );
5235  amenu.addentry( 0, false, -1, str_to_illiterate_str( _( "What would you like to do?" ) ) );
5236 
5237  amenu.addentry( buy_gas, true, 'b', str_to_illiterate_str( string_format( _( "Buy %s." ),
5238  fuelTypeStr ) ) );
5239  amenu.addentry( refund, true, 'r', str_to_illiterate_str( _( "Refund cash." ) ) );
5240 
5241  std::string gaspumpselected = str_to_illiterate_str( string_format( _( "Current %s pump: " ),
5242  fuelTypeStr ) + std::to_string( uistate.ags_pay_gas_selected_pump + 1 ) );
5243  amenu.addentry( 0, false, -1, gaspumpselected );
5244  amenu.addentry( choose_pump, true, 'p',
5245  str_to_illiterate_str( string_format( _( "Choose a %s pump." ), fuelTypeStr ) ) );
5246 
5247  amenu.addentry( 0, false, -1, str_to_illiterate_str( _( "Your discount: " ) ) + discountName );
5248  amenu.addentry( 0, false, -1, string_format( str_to_illiterate_str(
5249  _( "Your price per %s unit: " ) ), fuelTypeStr )
5250  +
5251  format_money( pricePerUnit ) );
5252 
5253  if( can_hack( you ) ) {
5254  amenu.addentry( hack, true, 'h', _( "Hack console." ) );
5255  }
5256 
5257  amenu.query();
5258  choice = amenu.ret;
5259 
5260  if( choose_pump == choice ) {
5261  uilist amenu;
5262  amenu.selected = uistate.ags_pay_gas_selected_pump;
5263  amenu.text = str_to_illiterate_str( string_format( _( "Please choose %s pump:" ), fuelTypeStr ) );
5264 
5265  std::vector<tripoint> pumps;
5266  for( int i = 0; i < pumpCount; i++ ) {
5267  amenu.addentry( i, true, -1,
5268  str_to_illiterate_str( _( "Pump " ) ) + std::to_string( i + 1 ) );
5269  pumps.emplace_back( getGasPumpByNumber( examp, i ).value_or( examp ) );
5270  }
5271  pointmenu_cb callback( pumps );
5272  amenu.callback = &callback;
5273  amenu.w_y_setup = 0;
5274  amenu.query();
5275  choice = amenu.ret;
5276 
5277  if( choice < 0 ) {
5278  return;
5279  }
5280 
5281  uistate.ags_pay_gas_selected_pump = choice;
5282 
5283  turnOnSelectedPump( examp, uistate.ags_pay_gas_selected_pump, fuelType );
5284 
5285  return;
5286 
5287  }
5288 
5289  if( buy_gas == choice ) {
5290  int money = you.charges_of( itype_cash_card );
5291 
5292  if( money < pricePerUnit ) {
5293  popup( str_to_illiterate_str(
5294  _( "Not enough money, please refill your cash card." ) ) ); //or ride on a solar car, ha ha ha
5295  return;
5296  }
5297 
5298  int maximum_liters = std::min( money / pricePerUnit, tankUnits / 1000 );
5299 
5300  std::string popupmsg = str_to_illiterate_str( string_format(
5301  _( "How many liters of %s to buy? Max: %d L. (0 to cancel)" ), fuelTypeStr, maximum_liters ) );
5302  int liters = string_input_popup()
5303  .title( popupmsg )
5304  .width( 20 )
5305  .text( std::to_string( maximum_liters ) )
5306  .only_digits( true )
5307  .query_int();
5308  if( liters <= 0 ) {
5309  return;
5310  }
5311  if( liters > maximum_liters ) {
5312  liters = maximum_liters;
5313  }
5314 
5315  const std::optional<tripoint> pGasPump = getGasPumpByNumber( examp,
5316  uistate.ags_pay_gas_selected_pump );
5317  if( !pGasPump || !toPumpFuel( pTank, *pGasPump, liters * 1000 ) ) {
5318  return;
5319  }
5320 
5321  sounds::sound( you.pos(), 6, sounds::sound_t::activity, _( "Glug Glug Glug" ), true, "tool",
5322  "gaspump" );
5323 
5324  int cost = liters * pricePerUnit;
5325  money -= cost;
5326  you.use_charges( itype_cash_card, cost );
5327 
5328  add_msg( m_info, _( "Your cash cards now hold %s." ), format_money( money ) );
5329  you.mod_moves( -to_moves<int>( 5_seconds ) );
5330  return;
5331  }
5332 
5333  if( hack == choice ) {
5334  try_start_hacking( you, examp );
5335  }
5336 
5337  if( refund == choice ) {
5338  std::vector<item *> cash_cards = you.cache_get_items_with( "is_cash_card", &item::is_cash_card );
5339  if( cash_cards.empty() ) {
5340  popup( _( "You do not have a cash card to refund money!" ) );
5341  return;
5342  }
5343 
5344  const std::optional<tripoint> pGasPump = getGasPumpByNumber( examp,
5345  uistate.ags_pay_gas_selected_pump );
5346  int amount_fuel = pGasPump ? fromPumpFuel( pTank, *pGasPump ) : -1;
5347  if( amount_fuel < 0 ) {
5348  popup( _( "Unable to refund, no fuel in pump." ) );
5349  return;
5350  }
5351  sounds::sound( you.pos(), 6, sounds::sound_t::activity, _( "Glug Glug Glug" ), true, "tool",
5352  "gaspump" );
5353 
5354  // getGasPricePerLiter( platinum_discount) min price to avoid exploit
5355  int amount_money = amount_fuel * getGasPricePerLiter( 3 ) / 1000.0f;
5356  std::sort( cash_cards.begin(), cash_cards.end(), []( item * l, const item * r ) {
5357  return l->ammo_remaining() > r->ammo_remaining();
5358  } );
5359  for( item * const &cc : cash_cards ) {
5360  if( amount_money == 0 ) {
5361  break;
5362  }
5363  const int transfer = std::min( amount_money, cc->remaining_ammo_capacity() );
5364  cc->ammo_set( cc->ammo_default(), transfer + cc->ammo_remaining() );
5365  amount_money -= transfer;
5366  }
5367  if( amount_money ) {
5368  add_msg( m_info, _( "All cash cards at maximum capacity." ) );
5369  // all fuel already removed from pump, so remaining amount_money simply ignored
5370  }
5371  add_msg( m_info, _( "Your cash cards now hold %s." ),
5372  format_money( you.charges_of( itype_cash_card ) ) );
5373  you.mod_moves( -to_moves<int>( 5_seconds ) );
5374  return;
5375  }
5376 }
5377 
5378 void iexamine::ledge( Character &you, const tripoint &examp )
5379 {
5380  enum ledge_actions {
5381  ledge_peek_down = 1,
5382  ledge_jump_across,
5383  ledge_fall_down,
5384  ledge_examine_furniture_below,
5385  ledge_glide,
5386  };
5387 
5388  map &here = get_map();
5389  tripoint jump_target( you.posx() + 2 * sgn( examp.x - you.posx() ),
5390  you.posy() + 2 * sgn( examp.y - you.posy() ),
5391  you.posz() );
5392  bool jump_target_valid = ( here.ter( jump_target ).obj().trap != tr_ledge );
5393  point jd( examp.xy() + point( -you.posx(), -you.posy() ) );
5394  int jump_direction = 0;
5395 
5396  if( jd.y > 0 && jd.x == 0 ) {
5397  jump_direction = 0; //south
5398  } else if( jd.y > 0 && jd.x < 0 ) {
5399  jump_direction = 1; //southwest
5400  } else if( jd.y == 0 && jd.x < 0 ) {
5401  jump_direction = 2; //west
5402  } else if( jd.y < 0 && jd.x < 0 ) {
5403  jump_direction = 3; //northwest
5404  } else if( jd.y < 0 && jd.x == 0 ) {
5405  jump_direction = 4; //north
5406  } else if( jd.y < 0 && jd.x > 0 ) {
5407  jump_direction = 5; //northeast
5408  } else if( jd.y == 0 && jd.x > 0 ) {
5409  jump_direction = 6; //east
5410  } else if( jd.y > 0 && jd.x > 0 ) {
5411  jump_direction = 7; //southeast
5412  }
5413 
5414  tripoint just_below = examp;
5415  just_below.z--;
5416 
5417  uilist cmenu;
5418  cmenu.text = _( "There is a ledge here. What do you want to do?" );
5419 
5420  // NOTE this menu is merged with the climb down menu, manage keys carefully.
5421  cmenu.addentry( ledge_peek_down, true, 'p', _( "Peek down." ) );
5422  g->climb_down_menu_gen( examp, cmenu );
5423  if( here.has_flag_furn( "EXAMINE_FROM_ABOVE", just_below ) ) {
5424  cmenu.addentry( ledge_examine_furniture_below, true, 'e',
5425  _( "Reach for the %s below." ), here.furn( just_below ).obj().name() );
5426  }
5427  cmenu.addentry( ledge_jump_across, jump_target_valid, 'j',
5428  ( jump_target_valid ? _( "Jump across." ) : _( "Can't jump across (need a small gap)." ) ) );
5429  cmenu.addentry( ledge_fall_down, true, 'f', _( "Fall down." ) );
5430  if( you.has_flag( json_flag_GLIDE ) || you.has_flag( json_flag_WING_GLIDE ) ||
5431  you.has_bodypart_with_flag( json_flag_WING_ARM ) ) {
5432  cmenu.addentry( ledge_glide, you.can_fly(), 'g',
5433  ( you.can_fly() ? _( "Glide away." ) : _( "You can't glide in your current state" ) ) );
5434  }
5435  cmenu.query();
5436 
5437 
5438  creature_tracker &creatures = get_creature_tracker();
5439  if( g->climb_down_menu_pick( examp, cmenu.ret ) ) {
5440  // This branch means the player chose some option generated by the climb menu.
5441  return;
5442  }
5443  switch( cmenu.ret ) {
5444  case ledge_jump_across: {
5445  // If player is grabbed, trapped, or somehow otherwise movement-impeded, first try to break free
5446  if( !you.move_effects( false ) ) {
5447  you.mod_moves( -to_moves<int>( 1_seconds ) );
5448  return;
5449  }
5450 
5451  if( you.get_str() < 4 ) {
5452  add_msg( m_warning, _( "You are too weak to jump over an obstacle." ) );
5453  } else if( 100 * you.weight_carried() / you.weight_capacity() > 25 ) {
5454  add_msg( m_warning, _( "You are too burdened to jump over an obstacle." ) );
5455  } else if( !here.valid_move( examp, jump_target, false, true ) ) {
5456  add_msg( m_warning, _( "You cannot jump over an obstacle - something is blocking the way." ) );
5457  } else if( creatures.creature_at( jump_target ) ) {
5458  add_msg( m_warning, _( "You cannot jump over an obstacle - there is %s blocking the way." ),
5459  creatures.creature_at( jump_target )->disp_name() );
5460  } else if( !jump_target_valid ) {
5461  add_msg( m_warning, _( "You are not going to jump over an obstacle only to fall down." ) );
5462  } else {
5463  add_msg( m_info, _( "You jump over an obstacle." ) );
5464  you.set_activity_level( BRISK_EXERCISE );
5465  g->place_player( jump_target );
5466  }
5467  break;
5468  }
5469  /*case ledge_climb_down: {
5470  g->climb_down( examp );
5471  break;
5472  }*/
5473  case ledge_peek_down: {
5474  // Peek
5475  tripoint where = examp;
5476  tripoint below = examp;
5477  below.z--;
5478  while( here.valid_move( where, below, false, true ) ) {
5479  where.z--;
5480  below.z--;
5481  }
5482 
5483  const int height = examp.z - where.z;
5484  add_msg_debug( debugmode::DF_IEXAMINE, "Ledge height %d", height );
5485  if( height == 0 ) {
5486  you.add_msg_if_player( _( "You can't peek down there." ) );
5487  return;
5488  }
5489 
5490  g->peek( where );
5491  you.add_msg_if_player( _( "You peek over the ledge." ) );
5492  break;
5493  }
5494  case ledge_examine_furniture_below: {
5495  // Examine the furniture below.
5496  here.furn( just_below ).obj().examine( you, just_below );
5497  break;
5498  }
5499  /*case ledge_cling_down: {
5500  // If player is grabbed, trapped, or somehow otherwise movement-impeded, first try to break free
5501  if( !you.move_effects( false ) ) {
5502  you.mod_moves( -to_moves<int>( 1_seconds ) );
5503  return;
5504  }
5505 
5506  if( !here.valid_move( you.pos(), examp, false, true ) ) {
5507  // Covered with something
5508  return;
5509  } else {
5510  you.setpos( examp );
5511  g->vertical_move( -1, false );
5512  if( here.has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_DEEP_WATER, you.pos() ) ) {
5513  you.set_underwater( true );
5514  g->water_affect_items( you );
5515  you.add_msg_if_player( _( "You crawl down and dive underwater." ) );
5516  }
5517  }
5518  break;
5519  }*/
5520  case ledge_glide: {
5521  int glide_distance = 5;
5522  const weather_manager &weather = get_weather();
5523  add_msg( m_info, _( "You soar away from the ledge." ) );
5524  int angledifference = std::abs( weather.winddirection - jump_direction * 45 );
5525  // Handle cases where the difference wraps around due to compass directions
5526  angledifference = std::min( angledifference, 360 - angledifference );
5527  if( angledifference <= 45 && weather.windspeed >= 12 ) {
5528  add_msg( m_warning, _( "Your glide is aided by a tailwind." ) );
5529  glide_distance += 1;
5530  }
5531  // Check if the directions are greater than 135 degrees apart
5532  else if( angledifference >= 135 && weather.windspeed >= 12 ) {
5533  add_msg( m_warning, _( "Your glide is hindered by a headwind." ) );
5534  glide_distance -= 1;
5535  }
5536  if( jump_direction == 1 || jump_direction == 3 || jump_direction == 5 || jump_direction == 7 ) {
5537  glide_distance = std::round( 0.7 * glide_distance );
5538  }
5539  you.as_avatar()->grab( object_type::NONE );
5540  glide_activity_actor glide( &you, jump_direction, glide_distance );
5541  you.remove_effect( effect_bouldering );
5542  you.assign_activity( glide );
5543  you.add_effect( effect_gliding, 1_turns, true );
5544  you.setpos( examp );
5545  break;
5546  }
5547  case ledge_fall_down: {
5548  if( query_yn( _( "Climbing might be safer. Really fall from the ledge?" ) ) ) {
5549  you.mod_moves( -to_moves<int>( 1_seconds ) );
5550  // If player is grabbed, trapped, or somehow otherwise movement-impeded, first try to break free
5551  if( !you.move_effects( false ) ) {
5552  return;
5553  }
5554  // Step into open air, then fall...
5555  if( you.has_effect_with_flag( json_flag_LEVITATION ) ) {
5556  you.add_effect( effect_slow_descent, 1_seconds, false );
5557  }
5558  you.setpos( examp );
5559  you.gravity_check();
5560  } else {
5561  // Just to highlight the trepidation
5562  popup( _( "You decided to step back from the ledge." ) );
5563  }
5564  break;
5565  }
5566  default:
5567  popup( _( "You decided to step back from the ledge." ) );
5568  break;
5569  }
5570 }
5571 
5572 static Character &player_on_couch( Character &you, const tripoint &autodoc_loc,
5573  Character &null_patient,
5574  bool &adjacent_couch, tripoint &couch_pos )
5575 {
5576  map &here = get_map();
5577  for( const tripoint &couch_loc : here.points_in_radius( autodoc_loc, 1 ) ) {
5578  if( here.has_flag_furn( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_AUTODOC_COUCH, couch_loc ) ) {
5579  adjacent_couch = true;
5580  couch_pos = couch_loc;
5581  if( you.pos() == couch_loc ) {
5582  return you;
5583  }
5584  for( const npc *e : g->allies() ) {
5585  if( e->pos() == couch_loc ) {
5586  return *g->critter_by_id<Character>( e->getID() );
5587  }
5588  }
5589  }
5590  }
5591  return null_patient;
5592 }
5593 
5594 static Character &operator_present( Character &you, const tripoint &autodoc_loc,
5595  Character &null_patient )
5596 {
5597  map &here = get_map();
5598  for( const tripoint &loc : here.points_in_radius( autodoc_loc, 1 ) ) {
5599  if( !here.has_flag_furn( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_AUTODOC_COUCH, loc ) ) {
5600  if( you.pos() == loc ) {
5601  return you;
5602  }
5603  for( const npc *e : g->allies() ) {
5604  if( e->pos() == loc ) {
5605  return *g->critter_by_id<Character>( e->getID() );
5606  }
5607  }
5608  }
5609  }
5610  return null_patient;
5611 }
5612 
5613 static item &cyborg_on_couch( const tripoint &couch_pos, item &null_cyborg )
5614 {
5615  for( item &it : get_map().i_at( couch_pos ) ) {
5616  if( it.typeId() == itype_bot_broken_cyborg || it.typeId() == itype_bot_prototype_cyborg ) {
5617  return it;
5618  }
5619  if( it.typeId() == itype_corpse ) {
5620  if( it.get_mtype()->id == mon_broken_cyborg || it.get_mtype()->id == mon_prototype_cyborg ) {
5621  return it;
5622  }
5623  }
5624  }
5625  return null_cyborg;
5626 }
5627 
5628 static Character &best_installer( Character &you, Character &null_player, int difficulty )
5629 {
5630  std::vector< std::pair<int, int>> ally_chances;
5631  ally_chances.reserve( g->allies().size() );
5632  for( size_t i = 0; i < g->allies().size() ; i ++ ) {
5633  std::pair<int, int> ally_skill;
5634  const npc *e = g->allies()[ i ];
5635 
5636  Character &ally = *g->critter_by_id<Character>( e->getID() );
5637  ally_skill.second = i;
5638  ally_skill.first = bionic_success_chance( true, -1, difficulty, ally );
5639  ally_chances.push_back( ally_skill );
5640  }
5641  std::sort( ally_chances.begin(), ally_chances.end(), [&]( const std::pair<int, int> &lhs,
5642  const std::pair<int, int> &rhs ) {
5643  return rhs.first < lhs.first;
5644  } );
5645  int player_cos = bionic_success_chance( true, -1, difficulty, you );
5646  avatar &player_character = get_avatar();
5647  for( size_t i = 0; i < g->allies().size() ; i ++ ) {
5648  if( ally_chances[ i ].first > player_cos ) {
5649  const npc *e = g->allies()[ ally_chances[ i ].second ];
5650  Character &ally = *g->critter_by_id<Character>( e->getID() );
5651  if( e->has_effect( effect_sleep ) ) {
5652  if( !player_character.query_yn(
5653  //~ %1$s is the name of the ally
5654  _( "<color_white>%1$s is asleep, but has a <color_green>%2$d<color_white> chance of success compared to your <color_red>%3$d<color_white> chance of success. Continue with a higher risk of failure?</color>" ),
5655  ally.disp_name(), ally_chances[i].first, player_cos ) ) {
5656  return null_player;
5657  } else {
5658  continue;
5659  }
5660  }
5661  //~ %1$s is the name of the ally
5662  add_msg( _( "%1$s will perform the operation with a %2$d chance of success." ), ally.disp_name(),
5663  ally_chances[i].first );
5664  return ally;
5665  } else {
5666  break;
5667  }
5668  }
5669 
5670  return you;
5671 }
5672 
5673 template<typename ...Args>
5674 inline void popup_player_or_npc( Character &you, const char *player_mes, const char *npc_mes,
5675  Args &&... args )
5676 {
5677  if( you.is_avatar() ) {
5678  popup( player_mes, std::forward<Args>( args )... );
5679  } else {
5680  popup( you.replace_with_npc_name( string_format( npc_mes, std::forward<Args>( args )... ) ) );
5681  }
5682 }
5683 
5684 void iexamine::autodoc( Character &you, const tripoint &examp )
5685 {
5686  enum options {
5687  INSTALL_CBM,
5688  UNINSTALL_CBM,
5689  BONESETTING,
5690  TREAT_WOUNDS,
5691  RAD_AWAY,
5692  BLOOD_ANALYSIS,
5693  };
5694 
5695  bool adjacent_couch = false;
5696  static avatar null_player;
5697  tripoint couch_pos;
5698  Character &patient = player_on_couch( you, examp, null_player, adjacent_couch, couch_pos );
5699  Character &Operator = operator_present( you, examp, null_player );
5700 
5701  static item null_cyborg;
5702  item &cyborg = cyborg_on_couch( couch_pos, null_cyborg );
5703 
5704  if( !adjacent_couch ) {
5705  popup( _( "No connected couches found. Operation impossible. Exiting." ) );
5706  return;
5707  }
5708  if( &patient == &null_player ) {
5709  if( &cyborg != &null_cyborg ) {
5710  if( cyborg.typeId() == itype_corpse && !cyborg.active ) {
5711  popup( _( "Patient is dead. Please remove corpse to proceed. Exiting." ) );
5712  return;
5713  } else if( cyborg.typeId() == itype_bot_broken_cyborg ||
5714  cyborg.typeId() == itype_corpse ) {
5715  popup( _( "ERROR Bionic Level Assessment: FULL CYBORG. Autodoc Mk. XI can't operate. Please move patient to appropriate facility. Exiting." ) );
5716  return;
5717  }
5718 
5719  uilist cmenu;
5720  cmenu.text = _( "Autodoc Mk. XI. Status: Online. Please choose operation." );
5721  cmenu.addentry( 1, true, 'i', _( "Choose Compact Bionic Module to install." ) );
5722  cmenu.addentry( 2, true, 'u', _( "Choose installed bionic to uninstall." ) );
5723  cmenu.query();
5724 
5725  switch( cmenu.ret ) {
5726  case 1: {
5727  popup( _( "ERROR NO SPACE AVAILABLE. Operation impossible. Exiting." ) );
5728  break;
5729  }
5730  case 2: {
5731  std::vector<std::string> choice_names;
5732  choice_names.emplace_back( _( "Personality_Override" ) );
5733  for( size_t i = 0; i < 6; i++ ) {
5734  choice_names.emplace_back( _( "C0RR#PTED?D#TA" ) );
5735  }
5736  int choice_index = uilist( _( "Choose bionic to uninstall" ), choice_names );
5737  if( choice_index == 0 ) {
5738  g->save_cyborg( &cyborg, couch_pos, you );
5739  } else {
5740  popup( _( "UNKNOWN COMMAND. Autodoc Mk. XI. Crashed." ) );
5741  return;
5742  }
5743  break;
5744  }
5745  default:
5746  return;
5747  }
5748  return;
5749  } else {
5750  popup( _( "No patient found located on the connected couches. Operation impossible. Exiting." ) );
5751  return;
5752  }
5753  } else if( patient.activity.id() == ACT_OPERATION ) {
5754  popup( _( "Operation underway. Please wait until the end of the current procedure. Estimated time remaining: %s." ),
5755  to_string( time_duration::from_moves( patient.activity.moves_left ) ) );
5756  you.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "The Autodoc is working on %s." ), patient.disp_name() );
5757  return;
5758  }
5759 
5760  const bool unsafe_usage = &Operator == &null_player || ( &Operator == &you && &patient == &you );
5761  std::string autodoc_header = _( "Autodoc Mk. XI. Status: Online. Please choose operation" );
5762  if( unsafe_usage ) {
5763  const std::string &warning_sign = colorize( " /", c_yellow ) + colorize( "!",
5764  c_red ) + colorize( "\\", c_yellow );
5765  const std::string &warning = warning_sign + colorize( _( " WARNING: Operator missing" ),
5766  c_red ) + warning_sign;
5767  autodoc_header = warning +
5768  _( "\n Using the Autodoc without an operator can lead to <color_light_cyan>serious injuries</color> or <color_light_cyan>death</color>.\n By continuing with the operation you accept the risks and acknowledge that you will not take any legal actions against this facility in case of an accident. " );
5769  }
5770 
5771  std::vector<item> arm_splints;
5772  std::vector<item> leg_splints;
5773 
5774  for( const item &supplies : get_map().i_at( examp ) ) {
5775  if( supplies.typeId() == itype_arm_splint ) {
5776  arm_splints.push_back( supplies );
5777  }
5778  if( supplies.typeId() == itype_leg_splint ) {
5779  leg_splints.push_back( supplies );
5780  }
5781  }
5782 
5783  autodoc_header +=
5784  string_format(
5785  _( "\n\n<color_white>Internal supplies:</color>\n Arm splints: %d\n Leg splints: %d" ),
5786  arm_splints.size(), leg_splints.size() );
5787 
5788  uilist amenu;
5789  amenu.text = autodoc_header;
5790  amenu.addentry( INSTALL_CBM, true, 'i', _( "Choose Compact Bionic Module to install" ) );
5791  amenu.addentry( UNINSTALL_CBM, true, 'u', _( "Choose installed bionic to uninstall" ) );
5792  amenu.addentry( BONESETTING, true, 's', _( "Splint broken limbs" ) );
5793  amenu.addentry( TREAT_WOUNDS, true, 'w', _( "Treat wounds" ) );
5794  amenu.addentry( RAD_AWAY, true, 'r', _( "Check radiation level" ) );
5795  amenu.addentry( BLOOD_ANALYSIS, true, 'b', _( "Conduct blood analysis" ) );
5796 
5797  amenu.query();
5798 
5799  bool needs_anesthesia = true;
5800  std::vector<tool_comp> anesth_kit;
5801 
5802  if( patient.has_flag( json_flag_PAIN_IMMUNE ) || patient.has_bionic( bio_painkiller ) ||
5803  amenu.ret > 1 ) {
5804  needs_anesthesia = false;
5805  } else {
5806  const inventory &crafting_inv = you.crafting_inventory();
5807  std::vector<const item *> a_filter = crafting_inv.items_with( []( const item & it ) {
5808  return it.has_quality( qual_ANESTHESIA );
5809  } );
5810  for( const item *anesthesia_item : a_filter ) {
5811  if( anesthesia_item->ammo_remaining() >= 1 ) {
5812  anesth_kit.emplace_back( anesthesia_item->typeId(), 1 );
5813  }
5814  }
5815  }
5816 
5817  switch( amenu.ret ) {
5818  case INSTALL_CBM: {
5819  item_location bionic = game_menus::inv::install_bionic( you, you, patient );
5820 
5821  if( !bionic ) {
5822  return;
5823  }
5824 
5825  const itype *itemtype = bionic.get_item()->type;
5826  const std::string bionic_name = bionic.get_item()->typeId().c_str();
5827 
5828  Character &installer = best_installer( you, null_player, itemtype->bionic->difficulty );
5829  if( &installer == &null_player ) {
5830  return;
5831  }
5832 
5833  std::vector<item_comp> progs;
5834  bool has_install_program = false;
5835 
5836  std::vector<const item *> install_programs = you.crafting_inventory().items_with( [itemtype](
5837  const item & it ) -> bool { return it.typeId() == itemtype->bionic->installation_data; } );
5838 
5839  if( !install_programs.empty() ) {
5840  has_install_program = true;
5841  progs.emplace_back( install_programs[0]->typeId(), 1 );
5842  }
5843 
5844  const int weight = units::to_kilogram( patient.bodyweight() ) / 10;
5845  const int surgery_duration = itemtype->bionic->difficulty * 2;
5846  const requirement_data req_anesth = *requirement_data_anesthetic *
5847  surgery_duration * weight;
5848 
5849  if( patient.can_install_bionics( ( *itemtype ), installer, true, has_install_program ? 10 : -1 ) ) {
5850  const time_duration duration = itemtype->bionic->difficulty * 20_minutes;
5851  patient.introduce_into_anesthesia( duration, installer, needs_anesthesia );
5852  bionic.remove_item();
5853  if( needs_anesthesia ) {
5854  for( const auto &e : req_anesth.get_components() ) {
5855  you.consume_items( e, 1, is_crafting_component );
5856  }
5857  for( const auto &e : req_anesth.get_tools() ) {
5858  you.consume_tools( e );
5859  }
5860  you.invalidate_crafting_inventory();
5861  }
5862  installer.mod_moves( -to_moves<int>( 1_minutes ) );
5863 
5864  patient.install_bionics( ( *itemtype ), installer, true, has_install_program ? 10 : -1 );
5865 
5866  if( has_install_program ) {
5867  you.consume_items( progs );
5868  }
5869  }
5870  break;
5871  }
5872 
5873  case UNINSTALL_CBM: {
5874  const bionic_collection &installed_bionics = *patient.my_bionics;
5875  if( installed_bionics.empty() ) {
5876  popup_player_or_npc( patient, _( "You don't have any bionics installed." ),
5877  _( "<npcname> doesn't have any bionics installed." ) );
5878  return;
5879  }
5880 
5881  std::vector<bionic_id> bio_list;
5882  std::vector<std::string> bionic_names;
5883  std::vector<const bionic *> bionics;
5884  for( const bionic &bio : installed_bionics ) {
5885  if( item::type_is_defined( bio.info().itype() ) ) {
5886  bio_list.emplace_back( bio.id );
5887  bionic_names.emplace_back( bio.info().name.translated() );
5888  bionics.push_back( &bio );
5889  }
5890  }
5891  int bionic_index = uilist( _( "Choose bionic to uninstall" ), bionic_names );
5892  if( bionic_index < 0 ) {
5893  return;
5894  }
5895 
5896  const bionic_id &bid = bio_list[bionic_index];
5897  const int difficulty = bid->itype()->bionic->difficulty;
5898  const float volume_anesth = difficulty * 20 * 2; // 2ml/min
5899 
5900  Character &installer = best_installer( you, null_player, difficulty );
5901  if( &installer == &null_player ) {
5902  return;
5903  }
5904 
5905  if( patient.can_uninstall_bionic( *bionics[bionic_index], installer, true ) ) {
5906  const time_duration duration = difficulty * 20_minutes;
5907  patient.introduce_into_anesthesia( duration, installer, needs_anesthesia );
5908  if( needs_anesthesia ) {
5909  you.consume_tools( anesth_kit, volume_anesth );
5910  }
5911  installer.mod_moves( -to_moves<int>( 1_minutes ) );
5912  patient.uninstall_bionic( *bionics[bionic_index], installer, true );
5913  }
5914  break;
5915  }
5916 
5917  case BONESETTING: {
5918  if( arm_splints.empty() && leg_splints.empty() ) {
5919  popup( _( "Internal supply of splints exhausted. Operation impossible. Exiting." ) );
5920  return;
5921  }
5922 
5923  int broken_limbs_count = 0;
5924  for( const bodypart_id &part :
5925  patient.get_all_body_parts( get_body_part_flags::only_main ) ) {
5926  const bool broken = patient.is_limb_broken( part );
5927  effect &existing_effect = patient.get_effect( effect_mending, part );
5928  // Skip part if not broken or already healed 50%
5929  if( !broken || ( !existing_effect.is_null() &&
5930  existing_effect.get_duration() >
5931  existing_effect.get_max_duration() - 5_days - 1_turns ) ) {
5932  continue;
5933  }
5934  broken_limbs_count++;
5935  patient.mod_moves( -to_moves<int>( 5_seconds ) );
5936  // TODO: fail here if unable to perform the action, i.e. can't wear more, trait mismatch.
5937  int quantity = 1;
5938  if( part == bodypart_id( "arm_l" ) || part == bodypart_id( "arm_r" ) ) {
5939  if( !arm_splints.empty() ) {
5940  for( const item &it : get_map().use_amount( examp, 1, itype_arm_splint, quantity ) ) {
5941  patient.wear_item( it, false );
5942  }
5943  } else {
5944  popup( _( "Internal supply of arm splints exhausted. Splinting broken arms impossible. Exiting." ) );
5945  continue;
5946  }
5947  } else if( part == bodypart_id( "leg_l" ) || part == bodypart_id( "leg_r" ) ) {
5948  if( !leg_splints.empty() ) {
5949  for( const item &it : get_map().use_amount( examp, 1, itype_leg_splint, quantity ) ) {
5950  patient.wear_item( it, false );
5951  }
5952  } else {
5953  popup( _( "Internal supply of leg splints exhausted. Splinting broken legs impossible. Exiting." ) );
5954  continue;
5955  }
5956  }
5957 
5958  if( patient.worn_with_flag( flag_SPLINT, part ) ) {
5959  patient.add_msg_player_or_npc( m_good, _( "The machine rapidly sets and splints your broken %s." ),
5960  _( "The machine rapidly sets and splints <npcname>'s broken %s." ),
5961  body_part_name( part ) );
5962  patient.add_effect( effect_mending, 0_turns, part, true );
5963  effect &mending_effect = patient.get_effect( effect_mending, part );
5964  mending_effect.set_duration( mending_effect.get_max_duration() - 5_days );
5965  }
5966  }
5967  if( broken_limbs_count == 0 ) {
5968  popup_player_or_npc( patient, _( "You have no limbs that require splinting." ),
5969  _( "<npcname> doesn't have limbs that require splinting." ) );
5970  }
5971  break;
5972  }
5973 
5974  case TREAT_WOUNDS: {
5975  if( !patient.has_effect( effect_bleed ) && !patient.has_effect( effect_infected ) &&
5976  !patient.has_effect( effect_bite ) ) {
5977  you.add_msg_player_or_npc( m_info, _( "You don't have any wounds that need treatment." ),
5978  _( "<npcname> doesn't have any wounds that need treatment." ) );
5979  return;
5980  }
5981 
5982  if( patient.has_effect( effect_infected ) || patient.has_effect( effect_tetanus ) ) {
5983  if( patient.has_effect( effect_strong_antibiotic ) ||
5984  patient.has_effect( effect_antibiotic ) ||
5985  patient.has_effect( effect_weak_antibiotic ) ) {
5986  patient.add_msg_player_or_npc( m_info,
5987  _( "The Autodoc detected a bacterial infection in your body, but as it also detected you've already taken antibiotics, it decided not to apply another dose right now." ),
5988  _( "The Autodoc detected a bacterial infection in <npcname>'s body, but as it also detected they've already taken antibiotics, it decided not to apply another dose right now." ) );
5989  } else {
5990  patient.add_effect( effect_strong_antibiotic, 12_hours );
5991  patient.add_effect( effect_strong_antibiotic_visible, rng( 9_hours, 15_hours ) );
5992  patient.mod_pain( 3 );
5993  patient.add_msg_player_or_npc( m_good,
5994  _( "The Autodoc detected a bacterial infection in your body and injected antibiotics to treat it." ),
5995  _( "The Autodoc detected a bacterial infection in <npcname>'s body and injected antibiotics to treat it." ) );
5996 
5997  if( patient.has_effect( effect_tetanus ) ) {
5998  if( one_in( 3 ) ) {
5999  patient.remove_effect( effect_tetanus );
6000  patient.add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "The muscle spasms start to go away." ) );
6001  } else {
6002  patient.add_msg_if_player( m_warning, _( "The medication does nothing to help the spasms." ) );
6003  }
6004  }
6005  }
6006  }
6007 
6008  for( const bodypart_id &bp_healed :
6009  patient.get_all_body_parts( get_body_part_flags::only_main ) ) {
6010  if( patient.has_effect( effect_bleed, bp_healed.id() ) ) {
6011  patient.remove_effect( effect_bleed, bp_healed );
6012  patient.add_msg_player_or_npc( m_good,
6013  _( "The Autodoc detected ongoing blood loss from your %s and administered you hemostatic drugs to stop it." ),
6014  _( "The Autodoc detected ongoing blood loss from <npcname>'s %s and administered them hemostatic drugs to stop it." ),
6015  body_part_name( bp_healed ) );
6016  }
6017 
6018  if( patient.has_effect( effect_bite, bp_healed.id() ) ) {
6019  patient.remove_effect( effect_bite, bp_healed );
6020  patient.add_msg_player_or_npc( m_good,
6021  _( "The Autodoc detected an open wound on your %s and applied disinfectant to sterilize it." ),
6022  _( "The Autodoc detected an open wound on <npcname>'s %s and applied disinfectant to sterilize it." ),
6023  body_part_name( bp_healed ) );
6024 
6025  // Fixed disinfectant intensity of 4 disinfectant_power + 10 first aid skill level of Autodoc.
6026  const int disinfectant_intensity = 14;
6027  patient.add_effect( effect_disinfected, 1_turns, bp_healed );
6028  effect &e = patient.get_effect( effect_disinfected, bp_healed );
6029  e.set_duration( e.get_int_dur_factor() * disinfectant_intensity );
6030  patient.set_part_damage_disinfected( bp_healed,
6031  patient.get_part_hp_max( bp_healed ) - patient.get_part_hp_cur( bp_healed ) );
6032  }
6033  }
6034  patient.mod_moves( -to_moves<int>( 5_seconds ) );
6035  break;
6036  }
6037 
6038  case RAD_AWAY: {
6039  patient.mod_moves( -to_moves<int>( 5_seconds ) );
6040  patient.add_msg_player_or_npc( m_info,
6041  _( "The Autodoc scanned you and detected a radiation level of %d mSv." ),
6042  _( "The Autodoc scanned <npcname> and detected a radiation level of %d mSv." ),
6043  patient.get_rad() );
6044  if( patient.get_rad() ) {
6045  if( patient.has_effect( effect_pblue ) ) {
6046  patient.add_msg_player_or_npc( m_info,
6047  _( "The Autodoc detected an anti-radiation drug in your bloodstream, so it decided not to administer you another dose right now." ),
6048  _( "The Autodoc detected an anti-radiation drug in <npcname>'s bloodstream, so it decided not to administer them another dose right now." ) );
6049  } else {
6050  add_msg( m_good,
6051  _( "The Autodoc administered an anti-radiation drug to treat radiation poisoning." ) );
6052  patient.mod_pain( 3 );
6053  patient.add_effect( effect_pblue, 1_hours );
6054  }
6055  }
6056  if( static_cast<int>( patient.get_leak_level() ) ) {
6057  popup( _( "Warning! Autodoc detected a radiation leak of %d mSv from items in patient's possession. Urgent decontamination procedures highly recommended." ),
6058  static_cast<int>( patient.get_leak_level() ) );
6059  }
6060  break;
6061  }
6062 
6063  case BLOOD_ANALYSIS: {
6064  patient.mod_moves( -to_moves<int>( 5_seconds ) );
6065  patient.conduct_blood_analysis();
6066  patient.add_msg_player_or_npc( m_info,
6067  _( "The Autodoc analyzed your blood." ),
6068  _( "The Autodoc analyzed <npcname>'s blood." ) );
6069  break;
6070  }
6071 
6072  default:
6073  return;
6074  }
6075 }
6076 
6077 //food avg. 1.1 kg/L, which would be 110u of smoking_heat or 686 charcoal. rounding down to 600 as there are likely some batch fuel savings involved. it's roughly 1:1-1:2 charcoal:food to smoke.
6078 namespace sm_rack
6079 {
6080 static const int MIN_CHARCOAL = 1200;
6081 static const int CHARCOAL_PER_LITER = 600;
6082 static const units::volume MAX_FOOD_VOLUME = units::from_liter( 20 );
6083 static const units::volume MAX_FOOD_VOLUME_PORTABLE = units::from_liter( 15 );
6084 } // namespace sm_rack
6085 
6086 static int get_charcoal_charges( units::volume food )
6087 {
6088  const int charcoal = to_liter( food ) * sm_rack::CHARCOAL_PER_LITER;
6089 
6090  return std::max( charcoal, sm_rack::MIN_CHARCOAL );
6091 }
6092 
6093 static bool is_non_rotten_crafting_component( const item &it )
6094 {
6095  return is_crafting_component( it ) && !it.rotten();
6096 }
6097 
6098 static void mill_activate( Character &you, const tripoint &examp )
6099 {
6100  map &here = get_map();
6101  const furn_id cur_mill_type = here.furn( examp );
6102  furn_id next_mill_type = furn_str_id::NULL_ID();
6103  if( cur_mill_type == furn_f_wind_mill ) {
6104  next_mill_type = furn_f_wind_mill_active;
6105  } else if( cur_mill_type == furn_f_water_mill ) {
6106  next_mill_type = furn_f_water_mill_active;
6107  } else {
6108  debugmsg( "Examined furniture has action mill_activate, but is of type %s",
6109  here.furn( examp ).id().c_str() );
6110  return;
6111  }
6112  bool food_present = false;
6113  map_stack items = here.i_at( examp );
6114  units::volume food_volume = 0_ml;
6115 
6116  std::map<itype_id, int> millable_counts;
6117 
6118  for( const item &iter : items ) {
6119  if( iter.type->milling_data && !iter.type->milling_data->into_.is_null() ) {
6120  if( millable_counts.find( iter.typeId() ) == millable_counts.end() ) {
6121  millable_counts.emplace( iter.typeId(), 1 );
6122  } else {
6123  millable_counts[iter.typeId()]++;
6124  }
6125  }
6126  }
6127 
6128  for( std::pair<const string_id<itype>, int> mill_type_count : millable_counts ) {
6129  item source( mill_type_count.first );
6130  const item product( source.type->milling_data->into_ );
6131  const recipe rec = *source.type->milling_data->recipe_;
6132 
6133  if( rec.is_null() ) {
6134  debugmsg( _( "Failed to find milling recipe for %s." ),
6135  source.tname( 1, false ) );
6136  add_msg( m_bad, _( "This mill contains %s, which can't be milled!" ), source.tname( 1, false ) );
6137  add_msg( _( "You remove the %s from the mill." ), source.tname() );
6138 
6139  for( int i = 0; i < mill_type_count.second; i++ ) {
6140  here.add_item_or_charges( you.pos(), source );
6141  you.mod_moves( -you.item_handling_cost( source ) );
6142  for( item &iter : items ) {
6143  if( iter.typeId() == source.typeId() ) {
6144  here.i_rem( examp, &iter );
6145  break;
6146  }
6147  }
6148  }
6149 
6150  } else {
6151  const requirement_data::alter_item_comp_vector &components =
6152  rec.simple_requirements().get_components();
6153  int lot_size = 0;
6154 
6155  // Making the assumption that milling only uses a single type of input product. Support for mixed products would require additional logic.
6156  // We also make the assumption that this is the only relevant input, so if lubricants etc. was to be added more logic would be needed.
6157  for( const std::vector<item_comp> &component : components ) {
6158  for( const item_comp &comp : component ) {
6159  if( comp.type == mill_type_count.first ) {
6160  lot_size = comp.count;
6161  break;
6162  }
6163  }
6164 
6165  if( lot_size > 0 ) {
6166  break;
6167  }
6168  }
6169 
6170  if( lot_size == 0 ) {
6171  debugmsg( _( "Failed to find milling recipe for %s. It can't be milled." ),
6172  source.display_name().c_str() );
6173  add_msg( m_bad, _( "This mill contains %s, which can't be milled!" ), source.tname( 1, false ) );
6174  add_msg( _( "You remove the %s from the mill." ), source.tname() );
6175 
6176  for( int i = 0; i < mill_type_count.second; i++ ) {
6177  here.add_item_or_charges( you.pos(), source );
6178  you.mod_moves( -you.item_handling_cost( source ) );
6179  for( item &iter : items ) {
6180  if( iter.typeId() == source.typeId() ) {
6181  here.i_rem( examp, &iter );
6182  break;
6183  }
6184  }
6185  }
6186  } else {
6187  const int batches = mill_type_count.second / lot_size;
6188  const int process_count = batches * lot_size;
6189 
6190  if( batches == 0 ) {
6191  add_msg( m_bad, _( "This mill contains too little of %s, which requires a batch size of %d." ),
6192  source.tname( 1, false ), lot_size );
6193  add_msg( _( "You remove the %s from the mill." ), source.tname() );
6194  for( int i = 0; i < mill_type_count.second; i++ ) {
6195  here.add_item_or_charges( you.pos(), source );
6196  you.mod_moves( -you.item_handling_cost( source ) );
6197  for( item &iter : items ) {
6198  if( iter.typeId() == source.typeId() ) {
6199  here.i_rem( examp, &iter );
6200  break;
6201  }
6202  }
6203  }
6204  } else if( process_count != mill_type_count.second ) {
6205  add_msg( m_bad,
6206  _( "This mill doesn't contain a full last batch of %s, which requires a batch size of %d." ),
6207  source.tname( 1, false ), lot_size );
6208  add_msg( _( "You remove the excess %s from the mill." ), source.tname() );
6209  for( int i = 0; i < mill_type_count.second - process_count; i++ ) {
6210  here.add_item_or_charges( you.pos(), source );
6211  you.mod_moves( -you.item_handling_cost( source ) );
6212  for( item &iter : items ) {
6213  if( iter.typeId() == source.typeId() ) {
6214  here.i_rem( examp, &iter );
6215  break;
6216  }
6217  }
6218  }
6219  }
6220  }
6221  }
6222  }
6223 
6224  for( item &it : items ) {
6225  if( it.type->milling_data && !it.type->milling_data->into_.is_null() ) {
6226  food_present = true;
6227  food_volume += it.volume();
6228  continue;
6229  } else {
6230  add_msg( m_bad, _( "This mill contains %s, which can't be milled!" ), it.tname( 1, false ) );
6231  add_msg( _( "You remove the %s from the mill." ), it.tname() );
6232  here.add_item_or_charges( you.pos(), it );
6233  you.mod_moves( -you.item_handling_cost( it ) );
6234  here.i_rem( examp, &it );
6235  return;
6236  }
6237  }
6238  if( !food_present ) {
6239  add_msg( _( "This mill is empty. Fill it with starchy products such as wheat, barley or oats and try again." ) );
6240  return;
6241  }
6242  // TODO: currently mill just uses sm_rack defined max volume
6243  if( food_volume > sm_rack::MAX_FOOD_VOLUME ) {
6244  add_msg( _( "This mill is overloaded with products, and the millstone can't turn. Remove some and try again." ) );
6245  add_msg( pgettext( "volume units", "You think that you can load about %s %s in it." ),
6246  format_volume( sm_rack::MAX_FOOD_VOLUME ), volume_units_long() );
6247  return;
6248  }
6249 
6250  for( item &it : here.i_at( examp ) ) {
6251  if( it.type->milling_data && !it.type->milling_data->into_.is_null() ) {
6252  // Do one final rot check before milling, then apply the PROCESSING flag to prevent further checks.
6253  it.process_temperature_rot( 1, examp, get_map(), nullptr );
6254  it.set_flag( flag_PROCESSING );
6255  }
6256  }
6257  here.furn_set( examp, next_mill_type );
6258  item result( "fake_milling_item", calendar::turn );
6259  result.item_counter = to_turns<int>( milling_time );
6260  result.activate();
6261  here.add_item( examp, result );
6262  add_msg( _( "You remove the brake on the millstone and it slowly starts to turn." ) );
6263 }
6264 
6265 static void smoker_activate( Character &you, const tripoint &examp )
6266 {
6267  map &here = get_map();
6268  furn_id cur_smoker_type = here.furn( examp );
6269  furn_id next_smoker_type = furn_str_id::NULL_ID();
6270  const bool portable = here.furn( examp ) == furn_f_metal_smoking_rack ||
6271  here.furn( examp ) == furn_f_metal_smoking_rack_active;
6272  if( cur_smoker_type == furn_f_smoking_rack ) {
6273  next_smoker_type = furn_f_smoking_rack_active;
6274  } else if( cur_smoker_type == furn_f_metal_smoking_rack ) {
6275  next_smoker_type = furn_f_metal_smoking_rack_active;
6276  } else {
6277  debugmsg( "Examined furniture has action smoker_activate, but is of type %s",
6278  here.furn( examp ).id().c_str() );
6279  return;
6280  }
6281  bool food_present = false;
6282  bool charcoal_present = false;
6283  map_stack items = here.i_at( examp );
6284  units::volume food_volume = 0_ml;
6285  item *charcoal = nullptr;
6286 
6287  for( item &it : items ) {
6288  if( it.has_flag( flag_SMOKED ) && !it.has_flag( flag_SMOKABLE ) ) {
6289  add_msg( _( "This rack already contains smoked food." ) );
6290  add_msg( _( "Remove it before firing the smoking rack again." ) );
6291  return;
6292  }
6293  if( it.has_flag( flag_SMOKABLE ) ) {
6294  food_present = true;
6295  food_volume += it.volume();
6296  continue;
6297  }
6298  if( it.typeId() == itype_charcoal ) {
6299  charcoal_present = true;
6300  charcoal = &it;
6301  }
6302  if( it.typeId() != itype_charcoal && !it.has_flag( flag_SMOKABLE ) ) {
6303  add_msg( m_bad, _( "This rack contains %s, which can't be smoked!" ), it.tname( 1,
6304  false ) );
6305  add_msg( _( "You remove %s from the rack." ), it.tname() );
6306  here.add_item_or_charges( you.pos(), it );
6307  you.mod_moves( -you.item_handling_cost( it ) );
6308  here.i_rem( examp, &it );
6309  return;
6310  }
6311  if( it.has_flag( flag_SMOKED ) && it.has_flag( flag_SMOKABLE ) ) {
6312  add_msg( _( "This rack has some smoked food that might be dehydrated by smoking it again." ) );
6313  }
6314  }
6315  if( !food_present ) {
6316  add_msg( _( "This rack is empty. Fill it with raw meat, fish or sausages and try again." ) );
6317  return;
6318  }
6319  if( !charcoal_present ) {
6320  add_msg( _( "There is no charcoal in the rack." ) );
6321  return;
6322  }
6323  if( portable && food_volume > sm_rack::MAX_FOOD_VOLUME_PORTABLE ) {
6324  add_msg( _( "This rack is overloaded with food, and it blocks the flow of smoke. Remove some and try again." ) );
6325  add_msg( _( "You think that you can load about %s %s in it." ),
6326  format_volume( sm_rack::MAX_FOOD_VOLUME_PORTABLE ), volume_units_long() );
6327  return;
6328  } else if( food_volume > sm_rack::MAX_FOOD_VOLUME ) {
6329  add_msg( _( "This rack is overloaded with food, and it blocks the flow of smoke. Remove some and try again." ) );
6330  add_msg( _( "You think that you can load about %s %s in it." ),
6331  format_volume( sm_rack::MAX_FOOD_VOLUME ), volume_units_long() );
6332  return;
6333  }
6334 
6335  int char_charges = get_charcoal_charges( food_volume );
6336 
6337  if( count_charges_in_list( charcoal->type, here.i_at( examp ) ) < char_charges ) {
6338  add_msg( _( "There is not enough charcoal in the rack to smoke this much food." ) );
6339  add_msg( _( "You need at least %1$s pieces of charcoal, and the smoking rack has %2$s inside." ),
6340  char_charges, count_charges_in_list( charcoal->type, here.i_at( examp ) ) );
6341  return;
6342  }
6343 
6344  if( !you.has_charges( itype_fire, 1 ) ) {
6345  add_msg( _( "This smoking rack is ready to be fired, but you have no fire source." ) );
6346  return;
6347  } else if( !query_yn( _( "Fire the smoking rack?" ) ) ) {
6348  return;
6349  }
6350 
6351  you.use_charges( itype_fire, 1 );
6352  for( item &it : here.i_at( examp ) ) {
6353  if( it.has_flag( flag_SMOKABLE ) ) {
6354  it.process_temperature_rot( 1, examp, get_map(), nullptr );
6355  it.set_flag( flag_PROCESSING );
6356  }
6357  }
6358  here.furn_set( examp, next_smoker_type );
6359  if( charcoal->charges == char_charges ) {
6360  here.i_rem( examp, charcoal );
6361  } else {
6362  charcoal->charges -= char_charges;
6363  }
6364  item result( "fake_smoke_plume", calendar::turn );
6365  result.item_counter = to_turns<int>( 6_hours );
6366  result.activate();
6367  here.add_item( examp, result );
6368 
6369  if( you.has_trait( trait_PYROMANIA ) ) {
6370  you.add_morale( MORALE_PYROMANIA_STARTFIRE, 5, 10, 3_hours, 2_hours );
6371  you.rem_morale( MORALE_PYROMANIA_NOFIRE );
6372  you.add_msg_if_player( m_good,
6373  _( "You happily light a small fire under the rack and it starts to smoke." ) );
6374  } else {
6375  add_msg( _( "You light a small fire under the rack and it starts to smoke." ) );
6376  }
6377 }
6378 
6379 void iexamine::mill_finalize( Character &, const tripoint &examp )
6380 {
6381  map &here = get_map();
6382  const furn_id cur_mill_type = here.furn( examp );
6383  furn_id next_mill_type = furn_str_id::NULL_ID();
6384  if( cur_mill_type == furn_f_wind_mill_active ) {
6385  next_mill_type = furn_f_wind_mill;
6386  } else if( cur_mill_type == furn_f_water_mill_active ) {
6387  next_mill_type = furn_f_water_mill;
6388  } else {
6389  debugmsg( "Furniture executed action mill_finalize, but is of type %s",
6390  here.furn( examp ).id().c_str() );
6391  return;
6392  }
6393 
6394  map_stack items = here.i_at( examp );
6395  if( items.empty() ) {
6396  here.furn_set( examp, next_mill_type );
6397  return;
6398  }
6399 
6400  std::map<itype_id, int> millable_counts;
6401 
6402  for( const item &iter : items ) {
6403  if( iter.type->milling_data && !iter.type->milling_data->into_.is_null() ) {
6404  if( millable_counts.find( iter.typeId() ) == millable_counts.end() ) {
6405  millable_counts.emplace( iter.typeId(), 1 );
6406  } else {
6407  millable_counts[iter.typeId()]++;
6408  }
6409  }
6410  }
6411 
6412  for( std::pair<const string_id<itype>, int> mill_type_count : millable_counts ) {
6413  const item source( mill_type_count.first );
6414  const item product( source.type->milling_data->into_ );
6415  const recipe rec = *source.type->milling_data->recipe_;
6416 
6417  if( rec.is_null() ) {
6418  debugmsg( _( "Failed to find milling recipe for %s. It wasn't milled." ),
6419  source.display_name().c_str() );
6420 
6421  } else {
6422  const requirement_data::alter_item_comp_vector &components =
6423  rec.simple_requirements().get_components();
6424  int lot_size = 0;
6425 
6426  // Making the assumption that milling only uses a single type of input product. Support for mixed products would require additional logic.
6427  // We also make the assumption that this is the only relevant input, so if lubricants etc. was to be added more logic would be needed.
6428  for( const std::vector<item_comp> &component : components ) {
6429  for( const item_comp &comp : component ) {
6430  if( comp.type == mill_type_count.first ) {
6431  lot_size = comp.count;
6432  break;
6433  }
6434  }
6435 
6436  if( lot_size > 0 ) {
6437  break;
6438  }
6439  }
6440 
6441  if( lot_size == 0 ) {
6442  debugmsg( _( "Failed to find milling recipe for %s. Milling of it failed." ),
6443  source.display_name().c_str() );
6444  mill_type_count.second = 0;
6445  } else {
6446  const int batches = mill_type_count.second / lot_size;
6447  const int process_count = batches * lot_size;
6448 
6449  if( batches == 0 ) {
6450  add_msg( m_info, _( "%s is milled in batches of %d, so none was processed." ),
6451  source.tname(), lot_size );
6452  } else if( process_count != mill_type_count.second ) {
6453  add_msg( m_info, _( "%s is milled in batches of %d, so %d remained unprocessed." ),
6454  source.tname(), lot_size, mill_type_count.second - batches * lot_size );
6455  }
6456 
6457  mill_type_count.second = process_count;
6458 
6459  item_components item_component_lot;
6460  int count = 0;
6461 
6462  for( item &iter : items ) {
6463  if( iter.typeId() == mill_type_count.first ) {
6464  item_component_lot.add( iter );
6465  count++;
6466  if( count == mill_type_count.second ) {
6467  break;
6468  }
6469  }
6470  }
6471 
6472  std::vector<item> results = rec.create_results( batches, &item_component_lot );
6473 
6474  for( const item &result : results ) {
6475  here.add_item( examp, result );
6476  }
6477 
6478  for( map_stack::iterator iter = items.begin(); iter != items.end(); ) {
6479  item &it = *iter;
6480 
6481  if( it.typeId() == mill_type_count.first && mill_type_count.second > 0 ) {
6482  iter = items.erase( iter );
6483  mill_type_count.second--;
6484  } else {
6485  ++iter;
6486  }
6487  }
6488  }
6489  }
6490  }
6491 
6492  here.furn_set( examp, next_mill_type );
6493 }
6494 
6495 static void smoker_finalize( Character &, const tripoint &examp, const time_point &start_time )
6496 {
6497  map &here = get_map();
6498  furn_id cur_smoker_type = here.furn( examp );
6499  furn_id next_smoker_type = furn_str_id::NULL_ID();
6500  if( cur_smoker_type == furn_f_smoking_rack_active ) {
6501  next_smoker_type = furn_f_smoking_rack;
6502  } else if( cur_smoker_type == furn_f_metal_smoking_rack_active ) {
6503  next_smoker_type = furn_f_metal_smoking_rack;
6504  } else {
6505  debugmsg( "Furniture executed action smoker_finalize, but is of type %s",
6506  here.furn( examp ).id().c_str() );
6507  return;
6508  }
6509 
6510  map_stack items = here.i_at( examp );
6511  if( items.empty() ) {
6512  here.furn_set( examp, next_smoker_type );
6513  return;
6514  }
6515 
6516  for( item &it : items ) {
6517  if( it.has_flag( flag_SMOKABLE ) && it.get_comestible() ) {
6518  if( it.get_comestible()->smoking_result.is_empty() ) {
6519  it.unset_flag( flag_PROCESSING );
6520  } else {
6521  it.calc_rot_while_processing( 6_hours );
6522 
6523  item result( it.get_comestible()->smoking_result, start_time + 6_hours );
6524  if( it.count_by_charges() ) {
6525  result.charges = it.charges;
6526  }
6527 
6528  // Set flag to tell set_relative_rot() to calc from bday not now
6529  result.set_flag( flag_PROCESSING_RESULT );
6530  result.set_relative_rot( it.get_relative_rot() );
6531  result.unset_flag( flag_PROCESSING_RESULT );
6532 
6533  recipe rec;
6534  result.inherit_flags( it, rec );
6535  if( !result.has_flag( flag_NUTRIENT_OVERRIDE ) ) {
6536  // If the item has "cooks_like" it will be replaced by that item as a component.
6537  if( !it.get_comestible()->cooks_like.is_empty() ) {
6538  // Set charges to 1 for stacking purposes.
6539  it = item( it.get_comestible()->cooks_like, it.birthday(), 1 );
6540  }
6541  result.components.add( it );
6542  // Smoking is always 1:1, so these must be equal for correct kcal/vitamin calculation.
6543  result.recipe_charges = it.count();
6544  result.set_flag_recursive( flag_COOKED );
6545  }
6546 
6547  it = result;
6548  }
6549  }
6550  }
6551  here.furn_set( examp, next_smoker_type );
6552 }
6553 
6554 static void smoker_load_food( Character &you, const tripoint &examp,
6555  const units::volume &remaining_capacity )
6556 {
6557  map &here = get_map();
6558  if( here.furn( examp ) == furn_f_smoking_rack_active ||
6559  here.furn( examp ) == furn_f_metal_smoking_rack_active ) {
6560  you.add_msg_if_player( _( "You can't place more food while it's smoking." ) );
6561  return;
6562  }
6563 
6564  furn_id rack = here.furn( examp );
6565  units::volume total_capacity = rack == furn_f_metal_smoking_rack ?
6566  sm_rack::MAX_FOOD_VOLUME_PORTABLE :
6567  sm_rack::MAX_FOOD_VOLUME;
6568  units::volume used_capacity = total_capacity - remaining_capacity;
6569 
6570  drop_locations locs = game_menus::inv::smoke_food( you, total_capacity, used_capacity );
6571 
6572  units::volume vol = remaining_capacity;
6573  for( const drop_location &dloc : locs ) {
6574  item_location original = dloc.first;
6575  original.overflow();
6576  item copy( *original );
6577  if( copy.count_by_charges() ) {
6578  copy.charges = clamp( copy.charges_per_volume( vol ), 1, dloc.second );
6579  }
6580 
6581  if( vol < copy.volume() ) {
6582  add_msg( m_info, _( "The %s doesn't fit in the rack." ), copy.tname( copy.count() ) );
6583  continue;
6584  }
6585 
6586  here.add_item( examp, copy );
6587  you.mod_moves( -you.item_handling_cost( copy ) );
6588  add_msg( m_info, _( "You carefully place %1$d %2$s in the rack." ), copy.count(),
6589  copy.tname( copy.count() ) );
6590 
6591  vol -= copy.volume();
6592  if( !copy.count_by_charges() || original->charges == copy.charges ) {
6593  original.remove_item();
6594  } else {
6595  original->charges -= copy.charges;
6596  }
6597  }
6598 }
6599 
6600 static void mill_load_food( Character &you, const tripoint &examp,
6601  const units::volume &remaining_capacity )
6602 {
6603  std::vector<item_comp> comps;
6604  map &here = get_map();
6605  if( here.furn( examp ) == furn_f_wind_mill_active ||
6606  here.furn( examp ) == furn_f_water_mill_active ) {
6607  you.add_msg_if_player( _( "You can't place more food while it's milling." ) );
6608  return;
6609  }
6610  // filter millable food
6611  inventory inv = you.crafting_inventory();
6612  inv.remove_items_with( []( const item & it ) {
6613  return it.rotten();
6614  } );
6615  std::vector<const item *> filtered = you.crafting_inventory().items_with( []( const item & it ) {
6616  if( !it.type->milling_data || it.type->milling_data->into_.is_null() ) {
6617  return false;
6618  }
6619 
6620  const item product( it.type->milling_data->into_ );
6621  const recipe rec = *it.type->milling_data->recipe_;
6622 
6623  if( rec.is_null() ) {
6624  debugmsg( _( "Failed to find milling recipe for %s. It can't be inserted into the mill." ),
6625  it.display_name().c_str() );
6626  return false;
6627  }
6628 
6629  const requirement_data::alter_item_comp_vector &components =
6630  rec.simple_requirements().get_components();
6631 
6632  // Making the assumption that milling only uses a single type of input product. Support for mixed products would require additional logic.
6633  // We also make the assumption that this is the only relevant input, so if lubricants etc. was to be added more logic would be needed.
6634  for( const std::vector<item_comp> &component : components ) {
6635  for( const item_comp &comp : component ) {
6636  if( comp.type == it.typeId() ) {
6637  return true;
6638  }
6639  }
6640  }
6641 
6642  debugmsg( _( "Failed to find milling recipe for %s. Cannot be placed into the mill." ),
6643  it.display_name().c_str() );
6644 
6645  return false;
6646  } );
6647 
6648  uilist smenu;
6649  smenu.text = _( "Load mill with what kind of product?" );
6650  // count and ask for item to be placed ...
6651  std::list<std::string> names;
6652  std::vector<const item *> entries;
6653  for( const item *millable_item : filtered ) {
6654  int count;
6655  if( millable_item->count_by_charges() ) {
6656  count = inv.charges_of( millable_item->typeId() );
6657  } else {
6658  count = inv.amount_of( millable_item->typeId() );
6659  }
6660  if( count != 0 ) {
6661  auto on_list = std::find( names.begin(), names.end(), item::nname( millable_item->typeId(), 1 ) );
6662  if( on_list == names.end() ) {
6663  smenu.addentry( item::nname( millable_item->typeId(), 1 ) );
6664  entries.push_back( millable_item );
6665  }
6666  names.push_back( item::nname( millable_item->typeId(), 1 ) );
6667  comps.emplace_back( millable_item->typeId(), count );
6668  }
6669  }
6670 
6671  if( comps.empty() ) {
6672  you.add_msg_if_player( _( "You don't have any products that can be milled." ) );
6673  return;
6674  }
6675 
6676  smenu.query();
6677 
6678  if( smenu.ret < 0 || static_cast<size_t>( smenu.ret ) >= entries.size() ) {
6679  add_msg( m_info, _( "Never mind." ) );
6680  return;
6681  }
6682  int count = 0;
6683  const item *what = entries[smenu.ret];
6684  for( const item_comp &c : comps ) {
6685  if( c.type == what->typeId() ) {
6686  count = c.count;
6687  }
6688  }
6689 
6690  const int max_count_for_capacity = remaining_capacity / what->base_volume();
6691  const int max_count = std::min( count, max_count_for_capacity );
6692 
6693  // ... then ask how many to put it
6694  const std::string popupmsg = string_format( _( "Insert how many %s into the mill?" ),
6695  item::nname( what->typeId(), count ) );
6696  int amount = string_input_popup()
6697  .title( popupmsg )
6698  .width( 20 )
6699  .text( std::to_string( max_count ) )
6700  .only_digits( true )
6701  .query_int();
6702 
6703  if( amount == 0 ) {
6704  add_msg( m_info, _( "Never mind." ) );
6705  return;
6706  } else if( amount > count ) {
