6707  add_msg( m_info, _( "You don't have that many." ) );
6708  return;
6709  } else if( amount > max_count_for_capacity ) {
6710  add_msg( m_info, _( "You can't place that many." ) );
6711  return;
6712  }
6713 
6714  // reload comps with chosen items and quantity
6715  comps.clear();
6716  comps.emplace_back( what->typeId(), amount );
6717 
6718  Character &player_character = get_player_character();
6719  // select from where to get the items from and place them
6720  inv.form_from_map( player_character.pos(), PICKUP_RANGE, &player_character );
6721  inv.remove_items_with( []( const item & it ) {
6722  return it.rotten();
6723  } );
6724 
6725  comp_selection<item_comp> selected = you.select_item_component( comps, 1, inv, true,
6726  is_non_rotten_crafting_component );
6727  std::list<item> moved = you.consume_items( selected, 1, is_non_rotten_crafting_component );
6728  for( const item &m : moved ) {
6729  here.add_item( examp, m );
6730  you.mod_moves( -you.item_handling_cost( m ) );
6731  add_msg( m_info, _( "You carefully place %1$d %2$s in the mill." ), m.count(),
6732  m.tname( m.count() ) );
6733  }
6734  you.invalidate_crafting_inventory();
6735 }
6736 
6737 void iexamine::on_smoke_out( const tripoint &examp, const time_point &start_time )
6738 {
6739  map &here = get_map();
6740  if( here.furn( examp ) == furn_f_smoking_rack_active ||
6741  here.furn( examp ) == furn_f_metal_smoking_rack_active ) {
6742  smoker_finalize( get_avatar(), examp, start_time );
6743  }
6744 }
6745 
6746 void iexamine::quern_examine( Character &you, const tripoint &examp )
6747 {
6748  map &here = get_map();
6749  if( here.furn( examp ) == furn_f_water_mill ) {
6750  if( !here.is_water_shallow_current( examp ) ) {
6751  add_msg( _( "The water mill needs to be over shallow flowing water to work." ) );
6752  return;
6753  }
6754  }
6755  if( here.furn( examp ) == furn_f_wind_mill ) {
6756  if( g->is_sheltered( examp ) ) {
6757  add_msg( _( "The wind mill needs to be outside in the wind to work." ) );
6758  return;
6759  }
6760  }
6761 
6762  const bool active = here.furn( examp ) == furn_f_water_mill_active ||
6763  here.furn( examp ) == furn_f_wind_mill_active;
6764  map_stack items_here = here.i_at( examp );
6765 
6766  if( items_here.empty() && active ) {
6767  debugmsg( "active mill was empty!" );
6768  if( here.furn( examp ) == furn_f_water_mill_active ) {
6769  here.furn_set( examp, furn_f_water_mill );
6770  } else if( here.furn( examp ) == furn_f_wind_mill_active ) {
6771  here.furn_set( examp, furn_f_wind_mill );
6772  }
6773  return;
6774  }
6775 
6776  if( items_here.size() == 1 && items_here.begin()->typeId() == itype_fake_milling_item ) {
6777  debugmsg( "f_mill_active was empty, and had fake_milling_item!" );
6778  if( here.furn( examp ) == furn_f_water_mill_active ) {
6779  here.furn_set( examp, furn_f_water_mill );
6780  } else if( here.furn( examp ) == furn_f_wind_mill_active ) {
6781  here.furn_set( examp, furn_f_wind_mill );
6782  }
6783  items_here.erase( items_here.begin() );
6784  return;
6785  }
6786 
6787  time_duration time_left = 0_turns;
6788  units::volume f_volume = 0_ml;
6789  bool f_check = false;
6790 
6791  for( const item &it : items_here ) {
6792  if( it.typeId() != itype_fake_milling_item ) {
6793  f_check = true;
6794  f_volume += it.volume();
6795  }
6796  if( active && it.typeId() == itype_fake_milling_item ) {
6797  time_left = time_duration::from_turns( it.item_counter );
6798  }
6799  }
6800 
6801  const bool empty = f_volume == 0_ml;
6802  const bool full = f_volume >= sm_rack::MAX_FOOD_VOLUME;
6803  const auto remaining_capacity = sm_rack::MAX_FOOD_VOLUME - f_volume;
6804 
6805  uilist smenu;
6806  smenu.text = _( "What to do with the mill?" );
6807  smenu.desc_enabled = true;
6808 
6809  smenu.addentry( 0, true, 'i', _( "Inspect mill" ) );
6810 
6811  if( !active ) {
6812  smenu.addentry_desc( 1, !empty, 'r',
6813  empty ? _( "Remove brake and start milling… insert some products for milling first" ) :
6814  _( "Remove brake and start milling" ),
6815  string_format( _( "Remove brake and start milling, milling will take about %s." ),
6816  to_string( milling_time ) ) );
6817 
6818  smenu.addentry_desc( 2, !full, 'p',
6819  full ? _( "Insert products for milling… mill is full" ) :
6820  string_format( _( "Insert products for milling… remaining capacity is %s %s" ),
6821  format_volume( remaining_capacity ), volume_units_abbr() ),
6822  _( "Fill the mill with starchy products such as wheat, barley or oats." ) );
6823 
6824  if( f_check ) {
6825  smenu.addentry( 3, f_check, 'e', _( "Remove products from mill" ) );
6826  }
6827 
6828  } else {
6829  smenu.addentry_desc( 4, true, 'x',
6830  _( "Apply brake to mill" ),
6831  _( "Applying the brake will stop milling process." ) );
6832  }
6833 
6834  smenu.query();
6835 
6836  switch( smenu.ret ) {
6837  case 0: { //inspect mill
6838  std::string pop;
6839  if( active ) {
6840  pop = colorize( _( "There's a mill here. It is turning and milling." ), c_green ) + "\n";
6841  if( time_left > 0_turns ) {
6842  pop += string_format( _( "It should take about %s to finish milling." ),
6843  to_string_clipped( time_left ) ) + "\n";
6844  }
6845  } else {
6846  pop += colorize( _( "There's a mill here." ), c_green ) + "\n";
6847  }
6848  pop += colorize( _( "You inspect its contents and find: " ), c_green ) + "\n\n";
6849  if( items_here.empty() ) {
6850  pop += _( "…that it is empty." );
6851  } else {
6852  for( const item &it : items_here ) {
6853  if( it.typeId() == itype_fake_milling_item ) {
6854  pop += "\n" + colorize( _( "You see some grains that are not yet milled to fine flour." ),
6855  c_red ) + "\n";
6856  continue;
6857  }
6858  pop += "-> " + it.display_name() + "\n";
6859  }
6860  }
6861  popup( pop, PF_NONE );
6862  break;
6863  }
6864  case 1:
6865  //activate
6866  if( active ) {
6867  add_msg( _( "It is already milling." ) );
6868  } else {
6869  mill_activate( you, examp );
6870  }
6871  break;
6872  case 2:
6873  // load food
6874  mill_load_food( you, examp, remaining_capacity );
6875  break;
6876  case 3:
6877  // remove food
6878  for( map_stack::iterator it = items_here.begin(); it != items_here.end(); ) {
6879  if( it->typeId() != itype_fake_milling_item ) {
6880  // get handling cost before the item reference is invalidated
6881  const int handling_cost = -you.item_handling_cost( *it );
6882 
6883  add_msg( _( "You remove %s from the mill." ), it->tname() );
6884  here.add_item_or_charges( you.pos(), *it );
6885  it = items_here.erase( it );
6886  you.mod_moves( handling_cost );
6887  } else {
6888  ++it;
6889  }
6890  }
6891  if( active ) {
6892  if( here.furn( examp ) == furn_f_water_mill_active ) {
6893  here.furn_set( examp, furn_f_water_mill );
6894  } else if( here.furn( examp ) == furn_f_wind_mill_active ) {
6895  here.furn_set( examp, furn_f_wind_mill );
6896  }
6897  add_msg( m_info, _( "You stop the milling process." ) );
6898  }
6899  break;
6900  default:
6901  add_msg( m_info, _( "Never mind." ) );
6902  break;
6903  case 4:
6904  if( here.furn( examp ) == furn_f_water_mill_active ) {
6905  here.furn_set( examp, furn_f_water_mill );
6906  } else if( here.furn( examp ) == furn_f_wind_mill_active ) {
6907  here.furn_set( examp, furn_f_wind_mill );
6908  }
6909  for( map_stack::iterator it = items_here.begin(); it != items_here.end(); ) {
6910  if( it->typeId() == itype_fake_milling_item ) {
6911  it = items_here.erase( it );
6912  } else {
6913  ++it;
6914  }
6915  }
6916  add_msg( m_info, _( "You stop the milling process." ) );
6917  break;
6918  }
6919 }
6920 
6921 void iexamine::smoker_options( Character &you, const tripoint &examp )
6922 {
6923  map &here = get_map();
6924  const bool active = here.furn( examp ) == furn_f_smoking_rack_active ||
6925  here.furn( examp ) == furn_f_metal_smoking_rack_active;
6926  const bool portable = here.furn( examp ) == furn_f_metal_smoking_rack ||
6927  here.furn( examp ) == furn_f_metal_smoking_rack_active;
6928  map_stack items_here = here.i_at( examp );
6929 
6930  if( portable && items_here.empty() && active ) {
6931  debugmsg( "f_metal_smoking_rack_active was empty!" );
6932  here.furn_set( examp, furn_f_metal_smoking_rack );
6933  return;
6934  } else if( items_here.empty() && active ) {
6935  debugmsg( "f_smoking_rack_active was empty!" );
6936  here.furn_set( examp, furn_f_smoking_rack );
6937  return;
6938  }
6939  if( portable && items_here.size() == 1 && items_here.begin()->typeId() == itype_fake_smoke_plume ) {
6940  debugmsg( "f_metal_smoking_rack_active was empty, and had fake_smoke_plume!" );
6941  here.furn_set( examp, furn_f_metal_smoking_rack );
6942  items_here.erase( items_here.begin() );
6943  return;
6944  } else if( items_here.size() == 1 && items_here.begin()->typeId() == itype_fake_smoke_plume ) {
6945  debugmsg( "f_smoking_rack_active was empty, and had fake_smoke_plume!" );
6946  here.furn_set( examp, furn_f_smoking_rack );
6947  items_here.erase( items_here.begin() );
6948  return;
6949  }
6950 
6951  bool rem_f_opt = false;
6952  time_duration time_left = 0_turns;
6953  int hours_left = 0;
6954  int minutes_left = 0;
6955  units::volume f_volume = 0_ml;
6956  bool f_check = false;
6957 
6958  for( const item &it : items_here ) {
6959  if( it.is_food() ) {
6960  f_check = true;
6961  f_volume += it.volume();
6962  }
6963  if( active && it.typeId() == itype_fake_smoke_plume ) {
6964  time_left = time_duration::from_turns( it.item_counter );
6965  hours_left = to_hours<int>( time_left );
6966  minutes_left = to_minutes<int>( time_left ) + 1;
6967  }
6968  }
6969 
6970  const furn_t &f = here.furn( examp ).obj();
6971  const itype *type = f.crafting_pseudo_item_type();
6972  std::vector<const itype *> ammo_list = f.crafting_ammo_item_types();
6973  const bool empty = f_volume == 0_ml;
6974  const bool full = f_volume >= sm_rack::MAX_FOOD_VOLUME;
6975  const bool full_portable = f_volume >= sm_rack::MAX_FOOD_VOLUME_PORTABLE;
6976  const auto remaining_capacity = sm_rack::MAX_FOOD_VOLUME - f_volume;
6977  const auto remaining_capacity_portable = sm_rack::MAX_FOOD_VOLUME_PORTABLE - f_volume;
6978  const bool has_coal_in_inventory = you.crafting_inventory().charges_of( itype_charcoal ) > 0;
6979  const int coal_charges = count_charges_in_list( item::find_type( itype_charcoal ), items_here );
6980  const int need_charges = get_charcoal_charges( f_volume );
6981  const int max_charges = type == nullptr || ammo_list.empty() ||
6982  !ammo_list[0]->ammo ? 0 : item( type ).ammo_capacity( ammo_list[0]->ammo->type );
6983  const bool has_coal = coal_charges > 0;
6984  const bool has_enough_coal = coal_charges >= need_charges;
6985 
6986  uilist smenu;
6987  smenu.text = _( "What to do with the smoking rack:" );
6988  smenu.desc_enabled = true;
6989 
6990  smenu.addentry( 0, true, 'i', _( "Inspect smoking rack" ) );
6991 
6992  if( !active ) {
6993  smenu.addentry_desc( 1, !empty && has_enough_coal, 'l',
6994  empty ? _( "Light up and smoke food… insert some food for smoking first" ) :
6995  !has_enough_coal ? string_format(
6996  _( "Light up and smoke food… need extra %d charges of charcoal" ),
6997  need_charges - coal_charges ) :
6998  _( "Light up and smoke food" ),
6999  _( "Light up the smoking rack and start smoking. Smoking will take about 6 hours." ) );
7000  if( portable ) {
7001  smenu.addentry_desc( 2, !full_portable, 'f',
7002  full_portable ? _( "Insert food for smoking… smoking rack is full" ) :
7003  string_format( _( "Insert food for smoking… remaining capacity is %s %s" ),
7004  format_volume( remaining_capacity_portable ), volume_units_abbr() ),
7005  _( "Fill the smoking rack with raw meat, fish or sausages for smoking or fruit or vegetable or smoked meat for drying." ) );
7006 
7007  smenu.addentry_desc( 8, !active, 'z',
7008  active ? _( "You cannot disassemble this smoking rack while it is active!" ) :
7009  _( "Disassemble the smoking rack" ), "" );
7010 
7011  } else {
7012  smenu.addentry_desc( 2, !full, 'f',
7013  full ? _( "Insert food for smoking… smoking rack is full" ) :
7014  string_format( _( "Insert food for smoking… remaining capacity is %s %s" ),
7015  format_volume( remaining_capacity ), volume_units_abbr() ),
7016  _( "Fill the smoking rack with raw meat, fish or sausages for smoking or fruit or vegetable or smoked meat for drying." ) );
7017  }
7018 
7019  if( f_check ) {
7020  smenu.addentry( 4, f_check, 'e', _( "Remove food from smoking rack" ) );
7021  }
7022 
7023  smenu.addentry_desc( 3, has_coal_in_inventory && coal_charges < max_charges, 'r',
7024  !has_coal_in_inventory ? _( "Reload with charcoal… you don't have any" ) :
7025  ( coal_charges >= max_charges ? _( "Reload with charcoal… at maximum capacity" ) :
7026  _( "Reload with charcoal" ) ),
7027  string_format(
7028  _( "You need %d charges of charcoal for %s %s of food. Minimal amount of charcoal is %d charges." ),
7029  sm_rack::CHARCOAL_PER_LITER, format_volume( 1_liter ), volume_units_long(),
7030  sm_rack::MIN_CHARCOAL ) );
7031 
7032  } else {
7033  smenu.addentry_desc( 7, true, 'x',
7034  _( "Quench burning charcoal" ),
7035  _( "Quenching will stop smoking process, but also destroy all used charcoal." ) );
7036  }
7037 
7038  if( has_coal ) {
7039  smenu.addentry( 5, true, 'c',
7040  active ? string_format( _( "Rake out %d excess charges of charcoal from smoking rack" ),
7041  coal_charges ) :
7042  string_format( _( "Remove %d charges of charcoal from smoking rack" ), coal_charges ) );
7043  }
7044 
7045  smenu.query();
7046 
7047  switch( smenu.ret ) {
7048  case 0: { //inspect smoking rack
7049  std::string pop;
7050  if( active ) {
7051  pop += colorize( _( "There's a smoking rack here. It is lit and smoking." ), c_green ) + "\n";
7052  if( time_left > 0_turns ) {
7053  if( minutes_left > 60 ) {
7054  pop += string_format( n_gettext( "It will finish smoking in about %d hour.",
7055  "It will finish smoking in about %d hours.",
7056  hours_left ), hours_left ) + "\n\n";
7057  } else if( minutes_left > 30 ) {
7058  pop += _( "It will finish smoking in less than an hour." ) + std::string( "\n" );
7059  } else {
7060  pop += string_format( n_gettext( "It should take about %d minute to finish smoking.",
7061  "It should take about %d minutes to finish smoking.",
7062  minutes_left ), minutes_left ) + "\n ";
7063  }
7064  }
7065  } else {
7066  pop += colorize( _( "There's a smoking rack here." ), c_green ) + "\n";
7067  }
7068  pop += colorize( _( "You inspect its contents and find: " ), c_green ) + "\n";
7069  if( items_here.empty() ) {
7070  pop += _( "…that it is empty." );
7071  } else {
7072  for( const item &it : items_here ) {
7073  if( it.typeId() == itype_fake_smoke_plume ) {
7074  pop += "\n" + colorize( _( "You see some smoldering embers there." ), c_red ) + "\n";
7075  continue;
7076  }
7077  pop += "-> " + it.display_name() + "\n";
7078  }
7079  }
7080  popup( pop, PF_NONE );
7081  break;
7082  }
7083  case 1:
7084  //activate
7085  if( active ) {
7086  add_msg( _( "It is already lit and smoking." ) );
7087  } else {
7088  smoker_activate( you, examp );
7089  }
7090  break;
7091  case 2:
7092  // load food
7093  if( portable ) {
7094  smoker_load_food( you, examp, remaining_capacity_portable );
7095  } else {
7096  smoker_load_food( you, examp, remaining_capacity );
7097  }
7098  break;
7099  case 3:
7100  // load charcoal
7101  reload_furniture( you, examp, false );
7102  break;
7103  case 4:
7104  // remove food
7105  rem_f_opt = true;
7106  /* fallthrough */
7107  case 5: {
7108  //remove charcoal
7109  for( map_stack::iterator it = items_here.begin(); it != items_here.end(); ) {
7110  if( ( rem_f_opt && it->is_food() ) || ( !rem_f_opt && ( it->typeId() == itype_charcoal ) ) ) {
7111  // get handling cost before the item reference is invalidated
7112  const int handling_cost = -you.item_handling_cost( *it );
7113 
7114  add_msg( _( "You remove %s from the rack." ), it->tname() );
7115  here.add_item_or_charges( you.pos(), *it );
7116  it = items_here.erase( it );
7117  you.mod_moves( handling_cost );
7118  } else {
7119  ++it;
7120  }
7121  }
7122  if( portable && active && rem_f_opt ) {
7123  here.furn_set( examp, furn_f_metal_smoking_rack );
7124  add_msg( m_info, _( "You stop the smoking process." ) );
7125  } else if( active && rem_f_opt ) {
7126  here.furn_set( examp, furn_f_smoking_rack );
7127  add_msg( m_info, _( "You stop the smoking process." ) );
7128  }
7129  }
7130  break;
7131  default:
7132  add_msg( m_info, _( "Never mind." ) );
7133  break;
7134  case 7:
7135  if( portable ) {
7136  here.furn_set( examp, furn_f_metal_smoking_rack );
7137  add_msg( m_info, _( "You stop the smoking process." ) );
7138  } else {
7139  here.furn_set( examp, furn_f_smoking_rack );
7140  add_msg( m_info, _( "You stop the smoking process." ) );
7141  }
7142  break;
7143  case 8:
7144  here.furn_set( examp, furn_f_metal_smoking_rack );
7145  deployed_furniture( you, examp );
7146  break;
7147  }
7148 }
7149 
7150 void iexamine::open_safe( Character &, const tripoint &examp )
7151 {
7152  add_msg( m_info, _( "You open the unlocked safe." ) );
7153  get_map().furn_set( examp, furn_f_safe_o );
7154 }
7155 
7156 void iexamine::workbench( Character &you, const tripoint &examp )
7157 {
7158  if( get_option<bool>( "WORKBENCH_ALL_OPTIONS" ) ) {
7159  workbench_internal( you, examp, std::nullopt );
7160  } else {
7161  if( !get_map().i_at( examp ).empty() ) {
7162  g->pickup( examp );
7163  }
7164  if( item::type_is_defined( get_map().furn( examp ).obj().deployed_item ) ) {
7165  deployed_furniture( you, examp );
7166  }
7167  }
7168 }
7169 
7170 void iexamine::workbench_internal( Character &you, const tripoint &examp,
7171  const std::optional<vpart_reference> &part )
7172 {
7173  std::vector<item_location> crafts;
7174  std::string name;
7175  bool is_undeployable = false;
7176  bool items_at_loc = false;
7177  map &here = get_map();
7178 
7179  if( part ) {
7180  name = part->part().name();
7181  for( item &it : part->items() ) {
7182  if( it.is_craft() ) {
7183  crafts.emplace_back( vehicle_cursor( part->vehicle(), part->part_index() ), &it );
7184  }
7185  }
7186  } else {
7187  name = here.furn( examp ).obj().name();
7188  if( item::type_is_defined( here.furn( examp ).obj().deployed_item ) ) {
7189  is_undeployable = true;
7190  }
7191 
7192  map_stack items_at_furn = here.i_at( examp );
7193  items_at_loc = !items_at_furn.empty();
7194 
7195  for( item &it : items_at_furn ) {
7196  if( it.is_craft() ) {
7197  crafts.emplace_back( map_cursor( examp ), &it );
7198  }
7199  }
7200  }
7201 
7202  uilist amenu;
7203 
7204  enum option : int {
7205  start_craft = 0,
7206  repeat_craft,
7207  start_long_craft,
7208  work_on_craft,
7209  get_items,
7210  undeploy
7211  };
7212 
7213  amenu.text = string_format( pgettext( "furniture", "What to do at the %s?" ), name );
7214  amenu.addentry( start_craft, true, '1', _( "Craft items" ) );
7215  amenu.addentry( repeat_craft, true, '2', _( "Recraft last recipe" ) );
7216  amenu.addentry( start_long_craft, true, '3', _( "Craft as long as possible" ) );
7217  amenu.addentry( work_on_craft, !crafts.empty(), '4', _( "Work on craft or disassembly" ) );
7218  if( !part && here.has_items( examp ) ) {
7219  amenu.addentry( get_items, items_at_loc, 'g', _( "Get items" ) );
7220  }
7221  if( is_undeployable ) {
7222  amenu.addentry( undeploy, true, 't', _( "Take down the %s" ), name );
7223  }
7224 
7225  amenu.query();
7226 
7227  const option choice = static_cast<option>( amenu.ret );
7228  bool in_shell = you.has_active_mutation( trait_SHELL2 ) ||
7229  you.has_active_mutation( trait_SHELL3 );
7230  switch( choice ) {
7231  case start_craft: {
7232  if( in_shell ) {
7233  you.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You can't craft while you're in your shell." ) );
7234  } else if( you.has_effect( effect_incorporeal ) ) {
7235  add_msg( m_info, _( "You lack the substance to affect anything." ) );
7236  } else {
7237  you.craft( examp );
7238  }
7239  break;
7240  }
7241  case repeat_craft: {
7242  if( in_shell ) {
7243  you.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You can't craft while you're in your shell." ) );
7244  } else if( you.has_effect( effect_incorporeal ) ) {
7245  add_msg( m_info, _( "You lack the substance to affect anything." ) );
7246  } else {
7247  you.recraft( examp );
7248  }
7249  break;
7250  }
7251  case start_long_craft: {
7252  if( in_shell ) {
7253  you.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You can't craft while you're in your shell." ) );
7254  } else if( you.has_effect( effect_incorporeal ) ) {
7255  add_msg( m_info, _( "You lack the substance to affect anything." ) );
7256  } else {
7257  you.long_craft( examp );
7258  }
7259  break;
7260  }
7261  case work_on_craft: {
7262  std::vector<std::string> item_names;
7263  for( item_location &it : crafts ) {
7264  if( it ) {
7265  item_names.emplace_back( it.get_item()->tname() );
7266  }
7267  }
7268  uilist amenu2( _( "Which craft or disassembly to work on?" ), item_names );
7269 
7270  if( amenu2.ret == UILIST_CANCEL ) {
7271  break;
7272  }
7273 
7274  item *selected_craft = crafts[amenu2.ret].get_item();
7275 
7276  if( !selected_craft ) {
7277  break;
7278  }
7279 
7280  if( selected_craft->typeId() == itype_disassembly ) {
7281  you.disassemble( crafts[amenu2.ret], true );
7282  } else {
7283  if( !you.can_continue_craft( *selected_craft ) ) {
7284  break;
7285  }
7286  const recipe &rec = selected_craft->get_making();
7287  if( !you.has_recipe( &rec ) ) {
7288  you.add_msg_player_or_npc(
7289  _( "You don't know the recipe for the %s and can't continue crafting." ),
7290  _( "<npcname> doesn't know the recipe for the %s and can't continue crafting." ),
7291  rec.result_name() );
7292  break;
7293  }
7294  you.add_msg_player_or_npc(
7295  pgettext( "in progress craft", "You start working on the %s." ),
7296  pgettext( "in progress craft", "<npcname> starts working on the %s." ),
7297  selected_craft->tname() );
7298  you.assign_activity( craft_activity_actor( crafts[amenu2.ret], false ) );
7299  }
7300  break;
7301  }
7302  case get_items: {
7303  g->pickup( examp );
7304  break;
7305  }
7306  case undeploy: {
7307  deployed_furniture( you, examp );
7308  break;
7309  }
7310  }
7311 }
7312 
7313 void iexamine::workout( Character &you, const tripoint &examp )
7314 {
7315  if( !query_yn( _( "Use the %s to exercise?" ), get_map().furnname( examp ) ) ) {
7316  none( you, examp );
7317  return;
7318  }
7319  you.assign_activity( workout_activity_actor( examp ) );
7320 }
7321 
7322 void iexamine::invalid( Character &/*you*/, const tripoint &examp )
7323 {
7324  debugmsg( "Called invalid iexamine function on %s!", get_map().tername( examp ) );
7325 }
7326 
7327 /**
7328  * Given then name of one of the above functions, returns the matching function
7329  * pointer. If no match is found, defaults to iexamine::none but prints out a
7330  * debug message as a warning.
7331  * @param function_name The name of the function to get.
7332  * @return A function pointer to the specified function.
7333  */
7334 iexamine_functions iexamine_functions_from_string( const std::string &function_name )
7335 {
7336  static const std::map<std::string, iexamine_examine_function> function_map = {{
7337  { "none", &iexamine::none },
7338  { "attunement_altar", &iexamine::attunement_altar },
7339  { "deployed_furniture", &iexamine::deployed_furniture },
7340  { "cvdmachine", &iexamine::cvdmachine },
7341  { "change_appearance", &iexamine::change_appearance },
7342  { "nanofab", &iexamine::nanofab },
7343  { "gaspump", &iexamine::gaspump },
7344  { "atm", &iexamine::atm },
7345  { "vending", &iexamine::vending },
7346  { "elevator", &iexamine::elevator },
7347  { "controls_gate", &iexamine::controls_gate },
7348  { "cardreader_robofac", &iexamine::cardreader_robofac },
7349  { "cardreader_fp", &iexamine::cardreader_foodplace },
7350  { "intercom", &iexamine::intercom },
7351  { "rubble", &iexamine::rubble },
7352  { "chainfence", &iexamine::chainfence },
7353  { "bars", &iexamine::bars },
7354  { "portable_structure", &iexamine::portable_structure },
7355  { "pit", &iexamine::pit },
7356  { "pit_covered", &iexamine::pit_covered },
7357  { "safe", &iexamine::safe },
7358  { "bulletin_board", &iexamine::bulletin_board },
7359  { "pedestal_wyrm", &iexamine::pedestal_wyrm },
7360  { "pedestal_temple", &iexamine::pedestal_temple },
7361  { "door_peephole", &iexamine::door_peephole },
7362  { "fswitch", &iexamine::fswitch },
7363  { "flower_poppy", &iexamine::flower_poppy },
7364  { "flower_cactus", &iexamine::flower_cactus },
7365  { "fungus", &iexamine::fungus },
7366  { "flower_dahlia", &iexamine::flower_dahlia },
7367  { "flower_marloss", &iexamine::flower_marloss },
7368  { "dirtmound", &iexamine::dirtmound },
7369  { "aggie_plant", &iexamine::aggie_plant },
7370  { "fvat_empty", &iexamine::fvat_empty },
7371  { "fvat_full", &iexamine::fvat_full },
7372  { "compost_empty", &iexamine::compost_empty },
7373  { "compost_full", &iexamine::compost_full },
7374  { "keg", &iexamine::keg },
7375  { "harvest_furn_nectar", &iexamine::harvest_furn_nectar },
7376  { "harvest_furn", &iexamine::harvest_furn },
7377  { "harvest_ter_nectar", &iexamine::harvest_ter_nectar },
7378  { "harvest_ter", &iexamine::harvest_ter },
7379  { "clear_overgrown", &iexamine::clear_overgrown },
7380  { "harvest_plant_ex", &iexamine::harvest_plant_ex },
7381  { "harvested_plant", &iexamine::harvested_plant },
7382  { "shrub_marloss", &iexamine::shrub_marloss },
7383  { "translocator", &iexamine::translocator },
7384  { "tree_marloss", &iexamine::tree_marloss },
7385  { "tree_hickory", &iexamine::tree_hickory },
7386  { "tree_maple", &iexamine::tree_maple },
7387  { "tree_maple_tapped", &iexamine::tree_maple_tapped },
7388  { "shrub_wildveggies", &iexamine::shrub_wildveggies },
7389  { "water_source", &iexamine::water_source },
7390  { "finite_water_source", &iexamine::finite_water_source },
7391  { "reload_furniture", &iexamine::reload_furniture },
7392  { "curtains", &iexamine::curtains },
7393  { "sign", &iexamine::sign },
7394  { "pay_gas", &iexamine::pay_gas },
7395  { "gunsafe_el", &iexamine::gunsafe_el },
7396  { "locked_object", &iexamine::locked_object },
7397  { "locked_object_pickable", &iexamine::locked_object_pickable },
7398  { "kiln_empty", &iexamine::kiln_empty },
7399  { "kiln_full", &iexamine::kiln_full },
7400  { "stook_empty", &iexamine::stook_empty },
7401  { "stook_full", &iexamine::stook_full },
7402  { "arcfurnace_empty", &iexamine::arcfurnace_empty },
7403  { "arcfurnace_full", &iexamine::arcfurnace_full },
7404  { "autoclave_empty", &iexamine::autoclave_empty },
7405  { "autoclave_full", &iexamine::autoclave_full },
7406  { "fireplace", &iexamine::fireplace },
7407  { "ledge", &iexamine::ledge },
7408  { "autodoc", &iexamine::autodoc },
7409  { "quern_examine", &iexamine::quern_examine },
7410  { "smoker_options", &iexamine::smoker_options },
7411  { "open_safe", &iexamine::open_safe },
7412  { "workbench", &iexamine::workbench },
7413  { "workout", &iexamine::workout },
7414  { "invalid", &iexamine::invalid },
7415  }
7416  };
7417 
7418  static const std::set<std::string> harvestable_functions = {
7419  "harvest_furn_nectar",
7420  "harvest_furn",
7421  "harvest_ter_nectar",
7422  "harvest_ter",
7423  "harvest_plant",
7424  };
7425 
7426  auto iter = function_map.find( function_name );
7427  if( iter != function_map.end() ) {
7428  iexamine_examine_function func = iter->second;
7429  if( function_name == "none" ) {
7430  return iexamine_functions{&iexamine::always_false, func};
7431  } else if( function_name == "invalid" ) {
7432  return iexamine_functions{&iexamine::false_and_debugmsg, func};
7433  } else if( harvestable_functions.find( function_name ) != harvestable_functions.end() ) {
7434  return iexamine_functions{&iexamine::harvestable_now, func};
7435  } else {
7436  return iexamine_functions{&iexamine::always_true, func};
7437  }
7438  }
7439 
7440  //No match found
7441  debugmsg( "Could not find an iexamine function matching '%s'!", function_name );
7442  return iexamine_functions{&iexamine::always_false, &iexamine::none};
7443 }
7444 
7445 void iexamine::practice_survival_while_foraging( Character &who )
7446 {
7447  ///\EFFECT_INT Intelligence caps survival skill gains from foraging
7448  const int max_forage_skill = who.int_cur / 3 + 1;
7449  ///\EFFECT_SURVIVAL decreases survival skill gain from foraging (NEGATIVE)
7450  const int max_exp = 2 * ( max_forage_skill - static_cast<int>( who.get_skill_level(
7451  skill_survival ) ) );
7452  // Award experience for foraging attempt regardless of success
7453  who.practice( skill_survival, rng( 1, max_exp ), max_forage_skill );
7454 }
